text: Dressed in stark white spacesuits against DT backdrop of a desolate , auburn terrain of stony plains and sand dunes , two NNS test a geo - radar by dragging DT flat box across DT rocky sand . Communication from mission command in DT Alps is delayed 10 minutes , so when DT geo - radar stops working , DT two walk back to their all - terrain vehicles and radio colleagues nearby at base camp for guidance . But this is n't DT Red NNP - PRP 's DT Arabian Peninsula . DT desolate desert in southern Oman , near DT borders of Yemen and Saudi Arabia , resembles Mars so much IN more than 200 NNS from 25 nations chose PRP as their location for DT next four weeks , to field - test technology for a manned mission to Mars . JJ and private ventures are racing toward Mars - both former NNP Barack Obama and SpaceX founder Elon Musk declared humans MD walk on DT Red NNP in a few decades . JJ challengers IN NNP are joining DT NNP NNPS and Russia in space with an ambitious , if vague , Mars program . Aerospace corporations IN BlueOrigin have published schematics of future bases , ships and suits . DT successful launch of SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket this week " puts PRP in a completely different realm of what PRP can put into deep space , what PRP can send to Mars , " VBD analog astronaut Kartik Kumar . DT next step to Mars , he says , is to tackle non-engineering problems IN JJ emergency responses and isolation . " These are things I VBP can't be underestimated , " Kumar VBD . While cosmonauts and astronauts are learning valuable spacefaring skills on DT International Space Station - and DT NNP is using virtual reality to train NNS - DT majority of work to prepare for interplanetary expeditions is being done on NNP . And where best to field - test equipment and NNS for DT journey to Mars but on some of DT NN 's most forbidding spots ? Seen from space , DT Dhofar Desert is a flat , brown expanse . Few animals or plants survive in DT desert expanses of DT Arabian Peninsula , where temperatures can top 125 degrees Fahrenheit , or 51 degrees Celsius . On DT eastern edge of a seemingly endless dune is DT Oman Mars Base : a giant 2.4 - ton inflated habitat surrounded by shipping containers turned into labs and crew quarters . EX are no airlocks . DT desert 's surface resembles Mars so much , PRP 's hard to tell DT difference , Kumar VBD , his spacesuit caked in dust . " But PRP goes deeper than DT : DT types of geomorphology , all DT structures , DT salt domes , DT riverbeds , DT wadis , PRP parallels a lot of what PRP see on Mars . " DT Omani NN offered to host DT Austrian Space Forum 's next Mars simulation during a meeting of DT NNP Nation 's Committee On DT Peaceful Uses of Outer Space . Gernot Groemer , commander of DT Oman Mars simulation and a veteran of 11 NN missions on NNP , VBD DT forum quickly accepted . NNS from across DT NN sent ideas for experiments and DT mission , named AMADEE - 18 , quickly grew to 16 scientific experiments , such as testing a " tumbleweed " whip - fast robot rover and a JJ space suit called Aouda . DT cutting - edge spacesuit , weighing about 50 kilograms , is called a " personal spaceship " because PRP can breathe , eat and do hard NN inside PRP . DT suit 's visor displays maps , communications and sensor data . A blue piece of foam in front of DT chin can be used to wipe your nose and mouth . " No matter who is VBG to this grandest voyage of our society yet to come , I VBP a few things PRP learn here will be actually implemented in those missions , " Groemer VBD . DT Soviet Union 's 1957 launch of Sputnik ignited a space race between Moscow and Washington to land a crew on DT Moon . But before DT U.S. got RB first , astronauts IN Neil Armstrong trained suspended on pulleys to simulate CD - sixth of NNP 's gravity . Hostile environments from Arizona to Siberia were used to fine - tune capsules , landers , rovers and suits - simulating otherworldly dangers to be found beyond NNP . Space agencies call them " analogues " because PRP resemble extraterrestrial extremes of cold and remoteness . " PRP can test systems on those locations and see where DT breaking points are , and PRP can see where things start to fail and which design option PRP need to take in order to assure IN PRP does not fail on Mars , " VBD João Lousada , CD of DT Oman simulation 's deputy field commanders who is a flight controller for DT International Space Station . Faux space stations have been built underwater off DT coast of Florida , on frigid dark deserts of Antarctica , and in volcanic craters in Hawaii , according to " Packing For Mars , " a favourite book among JJ Mars NNS , written by Mary Roach . " Terrestrial analogs are a tool in DT toolkit of space exploration , but PRP are not a panacea , " VBD Scott Hubbard , known as " Mars Czar " back when he lead DT NNP space agency 's Mars program . Some simulations have helped developed cameras , rovers , suits and closed - loop life - support systems , he VBD . NASA used DT Mojave Desert to test rovers destined for DT Red NNP but PRP RB discovered much about how humans can adapt . " Human 's adaptability in an unstructured environment is still far , far better than any robot PRP can send to space , " Hubbard VBD , adding IN NNS , not just robots , are DT key to exploring Mars . DT European Space Agency 's list of " planetary analogues " includes projects in Chile , Peru , South Africa , Namibia , Morocco , Italy , Spain , Canada , Antarctica , Russia , NNP , Australia , India , Germany , Norway , Iceland , and nine NNP NNS . Next Thursday , Israeli NNS are to run a shorter simulation in a nature preserve called D Mars . However , EX remain so JJ unknowns IN simulations " are not in any way a replacement for being RB , " Hubbard VBD . " DT first person to walk on Mars has in fact already been born , and might be VBG to elementary school now in Oman , or back in Europe , in DT NNP or NNP , " Lousada VBD .

Google ’s search algorithm and Facebook ’s NN Feed algorithm RB serve as filters for information for billions of NNS . “ EX is an infrastructure built since DT Renaissance to ensure DT integrity of information and knowledge in libraries , JJ layers of gatekeepers thick , ” wrote David Carroll , an associate professor of NN design at DT NNP School and a known critic of online platforms , in an email . “ PRP$ Tube dispenses with all of PRP in DT name of frictionless content acquisition and an algorithm optimized for watch - NN to sell ads . ” Chaslot , a software engineer in artificial intelligence , worked on a project to introduce diversity to YouTube ’s video recommendations starting in 2010 . " and " BEST FLAT NNP PROOF 2017 - PRP CANT DENY THIS EVIDENCE . " Searching tragedies can turn up even more disturbing results . Even so , DT concept of heaven ( wherever PRP is located ) continues in Christian theology as DT place where God dwells and a theological claim WDT this NN is not all WDT EX is . PRP is not escapism from this NN but rather an affirmation of all WDT is created , material , and earthly but now healed and renewed . text: A JJ NN of DT Milky Way shows IN our home galaxy is significantly warped . Instead of forming a relatively flat disk , DT hundreds of billions of stars WDT make up DT Milky Way form a disk WDT 's noticeably twisted at DT edges , a bit IN a flattened letter " S . DT JJ research , which was published Aug. 2 in DT journal NNP , confirms recent research showing IN DT galaxy is warped but RB shows IN DT distortion is more pronounced than astronomers had suspected . DT Milky Way is estimated to have a diameter of just over 100,000 light - NNS , and our solar system is embedded within PRP about 25,000 light - NNS from DT galaxy 's center . So PRP 's hard to see DT bend from our vantage point — and vast clouds of interstellar gas and dust within DT galaxy make DT task even harder , Poleski VBD . But Poleski and astronomers at DT University of Warsaw in Poland created a JJ super - detailed map of DT Milky Way using so - called variable stars known as classical Cepheids , which brighten and dim over a period of days at a rate corresponding to their size . At their brightest , classical Cepheids can be 10,000 brighter than our sun , so PRP 're visible across vast distances and through DT clouds of gas and dust . " Then PRP can compare PRP with DT light WDT PRP are getting , and by comparing those two PRP VBP DT distance . " What explains our galaxy 's weird shape ? text: " Lights All Askew in DT Heavens , " proclaimed a headline in DT NNP York Times on Nov. 10 , 1919 . DT reason : results had just come in from DT very first test of Albert Einstein 's JJ general theory of relativity . " Men of NN More or Less Agog over Results of Eclipse Observations , " DT headline continued , in what passed for breathless excitement back then . DT key theory WDT had DT NNS so giddy was Einstein 's claim IN space and NN were elastic , and MD be warped and stretched IN taffy . DT test WDT proved PRP involved observing stars whose position in DT sky makes them appear to be close to DT sun and measuring whether solar gravity warped space - NN enough to distort DT starlight slightly . A 1919 solar eclipse allowed NNS to see DT stars clearly and make DT necessary measurements  proving IN DT great man 's theories were correct . PRP might VB IN when a scientific finding has n't been seriously challenged for 93 NNS DT matter MD be pretty much settled , but experimentalists have been poking and prodding Einstein 's premises ever since . EX 's more than just stubborn skepticism at work : some of relativity 's more esoteric implications are fiendishly hard to confirm , so DT physicists keep devising more and more sensitive and difficult studies  even though DT theory keeps passing them all . Which explains a recent announcement out of NASA headquarters . After no fewer than seven cancellations , followed by seven reprieves , DT space agency 's orbiting Gravity Probe B mission , or GP - B for short , has at last confirmed not CD , but two of relativity 's more subtle predictions  and PRP took only 51 NNS and three - quarters of a billion dollars to do PRP . To understand what DT probe found , PRP first need to VB about space - NN , DT four - dimensional stage on which everything in DT universe plays out . What PRP VBP of as gravity , Einstein VBD , is n't a force WDT pulls two objects toward each other . Rather , PRP 's a warping of space - NN itself WDT makes objects VB to move . DT classic real - NN analogy is a bowling ball on a trampoline : DT ball makes DT trampoline 's surface dip . DT 's something vaguely IN DT way a star or a NN makes space - NN warp . DT big difference is IN space - NN is n't a flat surface , but something WDT fills DT universe . This makes DT warping pretty much impossible to visualize , even for physicists , so do n't try . In any case , if PRP roll a marble close to DT bowling ball , PRP will naturally fall into DT depression  just as a passing meteorite falls to NNP . DT 's part CD . Part two is IN since DT bowling ball represents NNP , PRP is n't just sitting but spinning , which makes DT surface of DT trampoline twist a little in DT direction of DT spin . DT same goes for DT space - NN surrounding our spinning NN . What GP - B did was to measure both DT dip and DT twist . DT spacecraft managed DT impressive feat by carrying four of DT most perfect gyroscopes ever built  actually , PRP 're superconducting balls of niobium  into orbit around NN NNP while DT ship itself pointed unerringly at DT star IM Pegasi for 17 months , starting in 2004 . DT balls , meanwhile , floated independently inside , supported only by magnetic fields . If DT gyroscopes kept DT same orientation as DT spacecraft WDT bore them , Einstein MD have been refuted . But PRP wandered a bit , meaning DT satellite was flying through gently twisted space . Relativity had come through once again . PRP took NNS to figure DT out , though , because DT experiment turned out to be flawed . Patches of electric charge had built up on DT surface of DT balls , adding an extra force WDT proved extremely tricky to unravel . And even when DT physicists had done so , PRP found PRP MD measure DT dip in space - NN only to an accuracy of 1 % , and DT twist , formally known as frame dragging , to a flabby CD % . In DT half - century since GP - B was first proposed , moreover , other physicists have confirmed both effects . " I have to compliment DT Gravity Probe B team for their result because Gravity Probe B is a very difficult and very beautiful experiment , " DT Italian physicist Ignazio Ciufolini told DT website ScienceNOW . He was clearly being polite , considering IN his own LAGEOS satellite measured frame dragging with higher precision a few NNS ago . LAGEOS and DT other experiments WDT yielded similar findings were n't necessarily cheap , but PRP did n't cost $ 750 million either  a price WDT even NASA was finally unable to afford . PRP backed away from funding DT last stages of DT project , relying on a Saudi scientist to kick in DT final few million . So was Gravity Probe B worth PRP ? To hear GP - B NNS tell PRP , DT experiment was a resounding success . But in order to justify DT judgment in DT face of DT high cost , slow progress and imprecise results , PRP knew PRP MD n't simply invoke Einstein . Instead , PRP RB felt DT need to point out IN NNS who had worked on GP - B as grad students had gone on to do important things ( Sally Ride became DT first American woman in space ! ) , and IN DT technology developed for GP - B had widespread applications  including , believe PRP or not , GPS systems WDT now help farmers plant very straight rows of corn . For anyone familiar with DT NASA press office , this is n't a huge vote of confidence . If PRP need agriculture to justify a fundamental physics experiment , PRP 're clearly feeling a little desperate . And with sharply declining budgets , better corn rows wo n't likely persuade DT agency to spring for more big - ticket tests of general relativity . But money for such studies did n't seem to be forthcoming anyway . Just last month , NASA announced PRP was backing out of a proposed space mission called DT Laser Interferometer Space Antenna , designed to look for gravitational waves  yet another of relativity 's strange predictions . PRP MD be a while , in other words , before men of NN  and DT women who long since broke into DT once exclusive club  VB to be more or less agog again . See NNP 's Pictures of DT Week .

text: oseph Sobran , with whom I almost always agree , recently wrote a column on DT absence of any real contemporary anti-war movement . In PRP , he cited three differences between 2005 and 1968 . • Todays 18 - 21 NN olds are not worried about being drafted . • DT opposition to this war WDT does exist is not part of any larger cultural NN . Now , PRP hear IN DT Army and Marine Corps are having trouble meeting their recruiting goals . PRP are witnessing an anti-war movement of a different type . I cannot remember either of DT parties to this story , but I will tell PRP anyway . Someone once VBD of a famous philosopher , IN he loved humanity , but he hated NNS . He cared deeply about humanity in DT abstract , but he was frustrated unmercifully by DT unwillingness of NNS to behave in accordance with his ideals . Oh , if PRP werent for those pesky , inconvenient NNS ! PRP Americans love to talk about war . JJ of PRP cheerlead for perpetual war . PRP stand behind our NN and our troops . PRP brand anyone who criticizes our military policies as liberal , communist , pro-terror and a lover of al - Qaeda . PRP always speak in DT first person when promoting war . (  We ought to bomb DT crap out of this country and we ought to pulverize DT country ! ) But PRP never VBP to talk about what actually happens in war . For a refresher , let me recommend DT first 20 minutes of . Talking to CD segment of America about war is IN talking to another segment of America about abortion . Heaven forbid IN PRP actually VBP fight PRP ourselves . PRP deride John Kerry , Ted Kennedy and other limousine liberals  for not parting with their wealth while PRP tax DT rest of PRP into poverty . Yet , JJ of DT most vocal war hawks in DT executive branch , in congress and in DT NN have never lifted a finger to serve CD day in DT military . DT same goes for JJ of these same war hawks at work , at church and in your neighborhood . I cannot speak for NNS half my age . However , I am VBG to put myself in DT shoes of a CD - NN - old looking at his options , with DT military being CD of them . Iraq never attacked PRP . PRP never threatened to attack PRP . If PRP had attacked PRP PRP MD have whipped them good . PRP never had DT means to do so anyway . EX were no WMDs . PRP got Saddam . PRP have had their election . And now , PRP are so busy fighting among themselves IN PRP arent about to attack anyone . Why are PRP even over RB ? If some other country comes and invades , then I will VB fight . Gladly ! But , I am not VBG to risk my life in Iraq . He speaks for DT anti-war movement of 2005 . Youll note no social commentary here . No ulterior motives . He just is not willing to be meat on DT hoof when he sees no threat to himself or his country . Who can blame him ? In 1993 , someone told Hillary NNP IN DT costs imposed by her husbands national NN care proposal MD put a lot of small business out of business . She responded IN PRP was not ( her ) job to VB out and save every undercapitalized businessman in America .  Conservative commentators rightfully compared her arrogance to DT of Marie Antoinette . When someone asked Vice NNP Cheney why he never served in DT military , he answered ,  I had other priorities .  These same commentators ought to be similarly indignant about his arrogance . EX is a black wall in Washington , DC , with 58,000 names on PRP . JJ of these NNS had other priorities  as well . War is easy to talk about and easy to be self - righteous about . However , PRP has consequences . This is nt DT hood . This is not DT South Bronx , South Central Los Angeles or Five Points here in Denver . This is WAR !!! To quote DT Talking Heads , " This ai n't no party . This ai n't no disco . This ai n't no fooling around . " Chuck Baldwin , another CD of my internet punditry faves , recently wrote eloquently of DT scourge of war :  To those who are engaged in war , DT consequences can be nightmarish ! Arms and legs cut off . Eyes put out . Flesh burned . Intestines ripped out . Backs broken . Skulls crushed . Lives lost . Families torn apart . Homes destroyed . NNS left without parents . Parents never able to see their NNS again . Wives without husbands . Husbands without wives . Souls snuffed into eternity . Emotional scars WDT never heal . These are DT realities of war . And this is what DT neo-cons who profit from war never have to see up close and personal .  Instead , pro-war neo-cons sit in their comfortable , air - conditioned offices and send other husbands , other wives , other parents , other NNS , other NNS to incur DT " scourge " of war . But DT neo-cons who trumpet war , who promote war , and who finance war never actually experience war .  This is America . PRP can have whatever opinion PRP VBP . If PRP VBP to believe DT NN is flat or worship Mungabunga , VB ahead . However , PRP does not mean your opinion has any worth . PRP can support perpetual war all PRP VBP , but if PRP yourself have never served , your opinion is of no interest to me . If PRP feel threatened by some fourth - rate , tin pot , Third NN potentate , fight him yourself . DT late Pat Tillman gave up a pro football career to become and Army Ranger . Colorado NNP Treasurer Mike Coffman , a retired Marine reservist , took a leave of absence to rejoin DT Corps in Iraq . So why dont PRP drop what PRP re doing , head to Baghdad and bust a few caps ? Yeah PRP , Rambo ! DT War of Northern Aggression ( 1861 -1865 ) was once ridiculed as a rich mans war and a poor mans fight . PRP was easy to talk about PRP , but hard to find NNS to fight PRP . Indeed , DT worst riots in American history were DT 1863 anti-draft riots in NNP York City . Before PRP whine about France not joining PRP in Iraq and before PRP say a word about DT need  for a draft , do PRP yourself ! Why is PRP  wimping out " only when Ill say CD thing about DT draft dodgers in Vietnam : PRP had DT courage to act on their convictions . Ill say CD thing and CD thing only on behalf of John Kerry : he was in harms way for four and a half months during  Nam . I VBP a great place where DT military can find tons and tons of fresh meat to be ground pounders in whatever war is next . PRP need to put recruiters in DT evangelical churches in this country and see how JJ folks actually enlist . Each Sunday , PRP MD set up tables in DT lobby . DT pastors shouldnt have a problem with this . Come on , now ! Raise your hand ! Swear DT oath ! Sign DT paper ! Ship out and destroy some country in order to save PRP . PRP s your Christian duty ! Dude , this is a jihad for Jesus . I VBP PRP is based on DT book of Jebediah or Pauls letter to DT Estonians . If PRP are too old , or for some other reason not qualified to join DT military , form your own expeditionary force . Call PRP DT Sword of DT Lord . EX are precedents of Americans volunteering to fight in other NNS for causes PRP support . PRP is easy to talk about your Great Christian NNP and to praise his wars as doing Gods work around DT globe . PRP is easy to have a yellow ribbon and a W04 bumper sticker on your car . PRP is , as PRP say , a whole nother thing to support his policies by participating in them . If PRP wish to post this or link to this , please include DT URL as well as my e-mail address .

text: Though EX was no obstinate mechanical shark to contend with , Close Encounters was an arduous picture to make . PRP was shot during a five - month period in early 1976 and took more than a NN to edit . DT locations — several of them deserts — spread from California to India ; DT launching - pad set in Mobile , Ala. , used in DT film 's climax is six times as large as Hollywood 's biggest sound stage , Spielberg " was forever screwing up schedules IN a whirlwind , " says Melinda Dillon , DT film 's female lead , recalling DT strain . " He worked all night , every night — catching a few hours ' sleep when he MD . He had his Winnebago trailer set up to screen films , and he was always running 2001 , and when he got tired of DT , he MD run cartoons . " null Truffaut , DT French director whom Spielberg persuaded to act in DT film , was RB dazzled by Spielberg 's stamina — though he was somewhat baffled by DT movie itself . " I never really tried to figure out what my role meant , " he says . " I VBP I was RB a lot , but IN Greta Garbo , I can say only IN I had DT feeling of waiting . " EX were a few incidents of unexpected — and largely unwanted — excitement . Star Richard Dreyfuss , after criticizing DT Ku Klux Klan in an Alabama newspaper interview , received a death threat and had to be whisked away for two weeks . Dillon 's son received a kidnaping threat WDT brought in DT FBI . Then , late CD night , shooting halted abruptly so IN everyone MD observe what Spielberg believed to be a UFO cruising DT sky . " Everyone was lying RB on their backs with binoculars , " says Dillon . " I remember thinking IN if EX were extraterrestrial beings up RB observing PRP , PRP MD VB IN NN creatures were flat beings with strange eyes . " DT object turned out to be an Echo satellite . Despite Spielberg 's preoccupation with UFOs in Close Encounters , he prefers to call DT film an " adventure thriller " rather than NN fiction , and he MD have a point . DT movie 's conception is pure Hitchcock — on an intergalactic scale . DT hero , Roy Neary ( Dreyfuss ) , is a Middle American variant on DT kind of man - in - DT - middle played by Gary Grant and James Stewart in films IN North by Northwest and Vertigo . A power - company worker who lives with his wife ( Teri Garr ) and three kids in Muncie , Ind. , Roy is engulfed CD night by phenomena he cannot understand : searing lights burn him from above , a road sign shakes and twists , DT contents of his truck move about in violent defiance of gravity , DT needles on his dashboard dials spin past VB . Roy is sure IN he has had an encounter with alien life forms — but , of course , no NN will believe his story . DT rest of Close Encounters ' plot follows Roy and several other UFO sighters , including a mysterious international scientist ( Truffaut ) and a neighborhood woman ( Dillon ) , as PRP overturn their lives in a mad attempt to arrange a rendezvous with DT extraterrestrial visitors . When an earthling makes actual contact with aliens , DT is " a close encounter of DT third kind . " ( DT first kind is sighting ; DT second , physical evidence . )

text: Open - circuit faults MD be caused by DT failure of joints on cables or overhead lines or DT failure of all DT three phases of a circuit - breaker or disconnector to open or close . For example , during a closing operation , two phases of a circuit - breaker MD close and latch successfully but not DT third phase , or , during an opening operation , two phases MD properly open but DT third remains stuck in DT closed position . Except on mainly underground systems , DT vast majority of short - circuit faults are weather - related , followed by equipment failure . DT weather factors WDT usually cause short - circuit faults are : lightning strikes , accumulation of snow or NN , heavy rain , strong winds or gales , salt pollution depositing on insulators on overhead lines and in substations , floods and fires adjacent to electrical equipment , for example , beneath overhead lines . Vandalism MD RB be a cause of short - circuit faults as well as contact with or breach of minimum clearances between overhead lines and trees due to current overload . Lightning strikes discharge steep - fronted impulse currents with peak values in DT range of a few kiloamps up to 100 or 200 kA for a duration of several microseconds . If DT strike hits an overhead line or its NN wire , DT voltage produced across DT insulator MD be so large IN a back - flashover and short circuit occurs . This MD involve CD or all three phases of a three - phase electrical circuit and as a result a transient power frequency short - circuit current flows . For example , consider a 132 - kV three - phase overhead transmission line of steel tower construction and CD NN wire . DT surge impedances of DT tower , line phase conductors and NN wire are given as 220 , 350 and 400 Ω , respectively , and DT tower ’s earthing or footing resistance is 50 Ω . DT line ’s rated lightning impulse withstand voltage to NN is 650 kV peak phase to NN ( nominal peak phase to NN voltage is ) . A lightning strike with a modest peak current of 10 kA hits a tower on DT line and , to a reasonable approximation , ‘ sees ’ half DT surge impedance of DT NN wire in parallel with DT surge impedance of DT tower . DT voltage produced across DT line ’s insulator is approximately equal to 10 kA×105 Ω=1050 kV . This significantly exceeds DT line ’s insulation strength , causes back - flashover on all three phases of DT line and a three - phase to NN short - circuit fault . If DT shielding of DT NN wire fails and DT lightning strike hits CD of DT phase conductors near a tower , then DT voltage produced across DT line ’s insulator is approximately equal to 10 kA ×175 Ω=1750 kV . In this case , a smaller lightning current in DT order of 3.8 kA MD be sufficient to cause a back - flashover and hence a short - circuit fault . On lower - voltage distribution lines , even ‘ indirect ’ lightning strikes , DT is , those WDT hit nearby objects to DT line MD produce a sufficiently large voltage on DT line to cause an insulator flashover and a short - circuit fault . Other causes of short - circuit faults are fires . DT smoke of fires beneath overhead lines consists of small particles which encourage DT breakdown of DT air WDT is subjected to DT intense electric field of a high - voltage power line . DT hot air in DT flames of a fire has a much lower insulation strength than air at ambient temperature . A flashover across an insulator to NN or from a phase conductor to a tree MD occur . Equipment failure of machines , transformers , reactors , cables , etc. , causes JJ short - circuit faults . These MD be caused by failure of internal insulation due to ageing and degradation , breakdown due to high switching or lightning over - voltages , by mechanical incidents or by inappropriate installation . An example is a breakdown of a cable ’s polymer insulation due to ageing or DT creation of voids within DT insulation caused by an external mechanical force being accidentally applied on DT cable . Short - circuit faults MD RB be caused by human error . A classical example is CD where maintenance staff inadvertently leave isolated equipment connected through safety NN clamps when maintenance work is completed . A three - phase to NN short - circuit fault occurs when DT equipment is re-energised to return PRP to service . On mainly overhead line systems , DT majority of short - circuit faults , typically 80 % –90 % , tend to occur on overhead lines and DT rest on cables , substation equipment and busbars combined . Typically , on a high - voltage transmission system with overhead line steel tower construction , such as DT England and Wales transmission system , long - term average short - circuit fault statistics show IN around 300 short - circuit faults occur per annum . Of these , 67 % are CD - phase to NN , 25 % are phase to phase , 5 % are three - phase to NN and three - phase clear of NN , and 3 % are two - phase to NN . About 77 % of CD - phase to NN faults are caused by lightning strikes followed by wind and gales then salt pollution on insulators . Although lightning can cause some phase - to - phase faults , by far DT most common causes of these faults are snow / NN followed by wind / gales WDT cause two line conductors to clash . DT majority of three - phase to NN and two - phase to NN faults in England and Wales are caused by lightning then wind and gales . On wood - pole overhead lines , for example , some 132 kV and lower voltages in England and Wales , between 50 % and 67 % of short - circuit faults are two - phase and three - phase faults .

text: MYTH : DT moon 's gravity pulling on NN causes DT tides . This is only partly true . DT moon does pull on ocean NN , but DT tug at any CD point is about 10 million times weaker than NNP 's gravity . PRP 's really DT interplay of gravity between DT moon , NNP , and sun WDT creates a tidal force , and PRP 's more of a " push " than a " pull . text: Among DT most striking discoveries of modern physics — if not DT most striking — is IN , in nature , NN works differently from DT familiar intuition PRP have of PRP . NN , for instance , is not uniform : PRP flows at a different speed depending on where PRP are and how PRP move . In DT 2014 film Interstellar , DT hero travels to DT vicinity of a black hole . On his return to NNP , he finds his daughter older than himself : she is an elderly lady , he is still middle - aged . This is not Hollywood fantasy , PRP is how DT NN truly works . DT film ’s scientific consultant Kip Thorne has since received DT Nobel Prize in physics , for his role in detecting DT gravitational waves emitted by merging black holes . He knows his topic . If PRP do not experience similar NN distortions in our daily life , PRP is only because here on NNP PRP are too small for PRP to notice . PRP is not DT first NN NN has shown our intuitions to be mistaken . NN is constantly learning something JJ , and more often than not such learning means jettisoning wrong ideas . DT is why NN often clashes with common sense — our intuition wants NNP to be flat and still , and NN to be DT same everywhere . None of this is true . NN is a mystery WDT has always troubled PRP , stirring deep emotions . Perhaps PRP is because , as Buddha put PRP , our difficulty in dealing with impermanence ( or DT passage of NN ) is at DT root of our suffering . Hans Reichenbach , in CD of DT most lucid books on DT matter , DT Direction of NNP , suggested IN PRP might have been in order to escape from this anxiety IN DT Greek philosopher Parmenides denied NN ’s existence , Plato imagined a NN of ideas outside PRP and Hegel spoke of DT moment in which DT spirit transcends temporality . PRP MD be because of this IN PRP have imagined DT existence of “ eternity ” , a NN outside NN WDT PRP imagine inhabited by gods , a God or immortal souls . Our deeply emotional attitude towards DT subject MD have contributed more to DT construction of cathedrals of philosophy than logic or reason did . DT opposite emotional attitude — DT veneration of NN by thinkers such as Heraclitus or Henri Bergson — has given rise to just as JJ philosophies but still not brought PRP much nearer to understanding its reality . Physics helps PRP to penetrate some layers of DT mystery . But our grasp of DT NN is shaped by DT vast dialogue WDT involves DT whole of our culture , from physics to philosophy , literature to DT neuro - sciences . All these crafts MD be needed here . Physics has conclusively shown IN DT temporal structure of DT NN is different from our perception of PRP . PRP has given PRP DT hope of being able to VB DT nature of NN free from our emotional fog . But in advancing towards quantum theories of gravity with a temporal structure far removed from our intuition , PRP end up losing our own sense of NN . Just as Copernicus , by studying DT revolutions of DT heavens , ended up understanding IN PRP is PRP rather than DT sky WDT turns , exploring DT nature of NN leads PRP to discover something about ourselves . Perhaps , ultimately , DT emotional dimension of NN is not DT film of mist WDT prevents PRP from apprehending its nature objectively . Perhaps DT emotion of NN is precisely what NN is for PRP . DT uniform nature of NN is scarcely DT only feature where our intuition has turned out to be mistaken . To everybody ’s surprise , DT difference between past and future fails to show up in DT elementary equations WDT govern DT physical NN . But DT discovery WDT has been DT most disconcerting of all has been finding out IN DT notion of “ present ” does not make sense in DT larger universe ; PRP only makes sense in DT vicinity of PRP slow human critters . “ Here - and - now ” is a well - defined notion in NN , but “ now ” on its own is not . Philosophers are struggling greatly with this discovery : if PRP call reality WDT which exists now , what is reality after PRP have realised IN EX is n’t a well - defined “ now ” all over DT universe ? DT very grammar PRP use to talk about things , in which verbs have only a past , future and present tense , is inadequate to describe DT ways of nature . In physics , a great debate on DT nature of physical NN has developed in an arc spanning from Aristotle to Newton and from Newton to Einstein . Our understanding has repeatedly deepened in DT course of this process . For Aristotle , NN is just a way to count what happens , but PRP becomes an autonomous flowing variable for Newton and is then reinterpreted by Einstein as a feature of DT gravitational field . Einstein ’s great theory , general relativity , keeps receiving spectacular empirical support — confirming such counter - intuitive predictions as black holes , expansion of DT universe , NN dilation , gravitational waves and more . These give strong credibility to Einstein ’s picture and continue to rule out alternative conjectures . But EX is certainly more to learn . PRP do not yet VB DT fate of matter falling into DT black holes PRP see in DT sky , where Einstein ’s theory says IN NN comes to an end . And DT full complexity of what PRP perceive as DT flow of NN is not accounted for by general relativity alone : PRP involves quantum theory , thermodynamics and probably more , including neuroscience and DT cognitive sciences . My own work in NN has been concentrated on DT effort to understand how DT quantum nature of DT NN affects space and NN . EX is not yet agreement on a solution ; but EX is a rather large consensus around DT expectation IN DT concept of physical NN is likely to move even further away from our intuition , when its quantum properties are taken into account . This is why reflecting on DT nature of NN is a constant concern for myself and JJ of my colleagues . Tentative theories of quantum spacetime have little WDT resembles NN as PRP experience PRP . DT basic equations of DT theory on which I work , loop quantum gravity , have no special “ NN ” variable at all . PRP describe processes in which things VBP but no single NN variable can track all possible changes . Does all this suggest our perception of NN is illusory ? PRP does not . But PRP indicates IN what PRP perceive as NN MD not be a simple and elementary aspect of nature , but rather a complex phenomenon with JJ layers , each needing to be addressed by a different chapter of NN . This is DT true question about DT nature of NN : which aspects of our sense of PRP pertain to which domain of NN ? Key aspects of NN are described by DT NN of heat , thermodynamics . Any NN DT future is definitely distinguishable from DT past , EX is something IN heat involved . Thermodynamics traces DT direction of NN to something called DT “ low entropy of DT past ” , a still mysterious phenomenon on which discussions rage . I have studied DT hypothesis IN some aspects of DT solution might come from recognising a perspectival aspect for NN . VB of DT magnificent spectacle of DT daily rotation of DT sky : PRP see DT sun , moon and stars , DT entire cosmos , majestically rotating . PRP has taken millennia for PRP to understand why . To figure this out , PRP had to consider ourselves . PRP is not DT vast cosmos WDT is rotating , PRP is PRP who live on a spinning rock . This is a perspectival explanation . Something similarly perspectival , I VBP , underpins our peculiar perception of DT flow of NN . Entropy growth orients NN and permits DT existence of traces of DT past , and these permit DT possibility of memories , which hold together our sense of identity . I suspect IN what PRP call DT “ flowing ” of NN has to be understood by studying DT structure of our brain rather than by studying physics : evolution has shaped our brain into a machine WDT feeds off memory in order to anticipate DT future . This is what PRP are listening to when PRP listen to DT passing of NN . Understanding DT “ flowing ” of NN is therefore something WDT MD pertain to neuroscience more than to fundamental physics . Searching for DT explanation of DT feeling of flow in physics might be a mistake . Our understanding depends on DT neural structures shaped by DT peculiar environment in which PRP live . PRP capture a very imprecise version of DT actual temporal structure of reality . Our experience is an approximation of an approximation of a description of DT NN from our particular perspective as beings dependent on DT growth of entropy , anchored to DT thermodynamical arrow of NN . For PRP , EX is , as Ecclesiastes has PRP , a NN to be born and a NN to die . DT NN PRP experience is a multilayered , complex concept with distinct properties rooted in distinct layers of reality . JJ parts of DT full story are still far from being clear . NN remains , to a large extent , a mystery , perhaps DT greatest NN . A mystery WDT relates to issues ranging from DT fate of black holes to DT enigma of our individual identity and consciousness . Will PRP be able to understand things better in DT future ? I VBP so . Our understanding of nature has increased vertiginously over DT course of DT centuries , and PRP are continuing to learn . PRP are glimpsing something about DT mystery of NN . PRP can see DT NN described by quantum theories of gravity : PRP can perceive with DT mind ’s eye DT profound structure of DT NN where NN as PRP VBP PRP no longer exists — just as Paul McCartney ’s “ Fool on DT Hill ” sees DT NN spinning round when he sees DT sun VBG down . I RB VBP PRP are beginning to see IN PRP are NN . PRP are this clearing opened by DT traces of memory inside DT connections between our neurons . PRP are memory . PRP are nostalgia . PRP are longing for a future WDT will not come . Horace , DT greatest poet of Roman antiquity and perhaps DT greatest cantor of NN , calls PRP our “ brief circle ” ( “ PRP must be wise . Pour DT wine / and enclose in this brief circle / your long - cherished hope ” ) . This clearing , opened up for PRP by memory and anticipation , is our NN : a source of anguish on occasion , but in DT end DT marvellous gift of our existence . text: ( CNN ) Protests at a high school this week have shown what was true since before she was even sworn in as education secretary : Betsy DeVos is a lightning rod . EX was a dramatic outcry by Senate Democrats and a never - before - seen , tiebreaking vote to confirm her . Gun control groups rejected her comments on firearms on campus and critics VBD she 'd spent her career undermining JJ schools . After nearly four months on DT job , DT fires have only been stoked . Critics seized on DeVos from DT start . While her mother was a JJ school teacher , she never taught or worked in school administration herself . Instead , she founded organizations WDT pumped millions of dollars into efforts to promote charter schools , voucher programs and other alternatives to traditional JJ schools known collectively as school choice . DeVos ' believes her own remarks have " not at all " hurt her ability to transform DT education system , spokeswoman Elizabeth Hill VBD , providing a list of accomplishments so far . Those include rolling back education regulations proposed by DT Obama administration , reforms to DT student loan program , and a pro-school choice budget proposal for DT federal NN . Here 's a look at her most controversial moments so far : DeVos landed back in DT headlines this week after teachers and Connecticut 's Democratic governor rallied against her outside East Hartford High School , protesting her characterization of DT school in a recent appearance before Congress . She quoted a former student named Michael , who she VBD was shunted from grade - to - grade with barely passing marks while being bullied . " This constant fear made him hate school . He described DT school he was assigned to as and I quote ' nothing more than adult daycare , a dangerous daycare , ' " DeVos VBD . Teachers sent a " message IN PRP did n't VB Michael MD amount to much " and EX are " countless other students IN him . " Gov. Dannel Malloy VBD DT student 's story " undoubtedly had some validity for DT individual " but was an unfair characterization of DT school and education system . " To have those words WDT were repeated about this institution this community without any fact checking without any background does n't speak well , " VBD Malloy . Once in office , DeVos visited a middle school in Washington , and later described DT teachers she met as being in " receive mode " and are " waiting to be told what PRP have to do , " rather than " empowered to facilitate great teaching . " DT school , Jefferson Academy , blasted DeVos in return , saying she 's right only if " PRP mean PRP ' receive ' students at a 2nd grade level and move them to an 8th grade level . " Her confirmation hearing answer to a gun-related question was made all DT more memorable because of how she answered PRP . DeVos has long advocated for voucher systems WDT give parents funds towards enrolling students at private schools . DT position is already controversial , with critics saying a voucher system MD undercut JJ schools . " What if PRP VBD PRP are not accepting African - American students , but DT was OK with DT NN , " Rep. Katherine Clark , D - Massachusetts pressed her . " Do PRP see any situation where PRP MD step in ? " DeVos replied IN DT " Office of Civil Rights and our Title IX ( anti- discrimination ) protections are broadly applicable across DT board . " " I am shocked IN PRP cannot come up with CD example of discrimination WDT PRP MD stand up for students , " responded Clark . Colleges founded because of segregation were ' pioneers ' of school choice DeVos was accused of glossing over history after a meeting with officials from historically black colleges and universities . Critics pointed out IN Jim Crow laws and racist policies barred African - Americans from enrolling , prompting DT creation of HBCUs . DeVos appeared to respond by later saying HBCUs were " born not out of mere choice , but out of necessity , in DT face of racism , and in DT aftermath of DT Civil War . " In a recent speech , DeVos took blasted critics of her school choice vision . " PRP will be hurting DT NNS and families who can least afford PRP . If politicians in a NN block education choice , PRP means those politicians do not support equal opportunity for all kids , " she VBD .

text: This article is DT third in a series of three by Michael D'Antonio and Peter Eisner , DT authors of DT JJ book , " DT Shadow NNP : DT Truth About Mike Pence . " DT opinions expressed in this commentary are their own . View more opinion articles on CNN . ( CNN ) This is DT third in a series of three op - eds tracing DT long path of Vice NNP Mike Pence 's ambition , from college , where he found a form of evangelicalism WDT weds theology to Republican politics , to DT national stage -- and a job WDT puts him a short step away from DT presidency . Part CD : Mike Pence 's plan to outlast NNP Part two : Mike Pence went to college and found God Mike Pence won his first political campaign in 2000 using what became his basic strategy of guns , God , and money . He raised lots of cash by appealing to big - NN conservative donors -- among them , Betsy DeVos , Charles and David Koch , and Erik Prince -- with hawkish positions on taxes and regulation . He found his voters at churches and gun clubs . He spiced his recipe with attacks on NN WDT placed him to DT right of JJ of his fellow Republicans . IN a handful of Republicans , Pence made an issue of DT pending agreement to settle NN lawsuits against tobacco companies for lying for decades about DT dangers of their addictive products . Pence did n't just oppose DT deal . He insisted PRP was based on a lie and DT result of a pernicious NN plot . " Despite DT hysteria from DT political class and DT NN , " Pence wrote in 2000 , " smoking does n't kill . In fact , 2 out of every three smokers does not die from a smoking related illness and 9 out of ten smokers do not contract lung cancer . " Pence 's first bit of data was simply wrong . Two - thirds of smokers actually do die of smoking - related illnesses . His second was misleading . Lung cancer is a relatively rare illness , but PRP is still vastly more common among smokers . In fact , PRP is CD of DT few cancers for which NN has established a very well - known cause , and Pence 's column was published after industry leaders had acknowledged DT NN risks of their product . Why MD a candidate for Congress speak so falsely and recklessly ? Pence 's motivation MD have been connected to his family 's ownership stake in a chain of convenience stores called Tobacco Road , which sold cigarettes alongside soft drinks and chips . But he was RB eager to establish some libertarian street cred . " A NN big enough to VB after smokers is big enough to VB after PRP , " he wrote . If Pence 's vocabulary was a bit 19th - century , so was his thinking . After calling Charles Darwin " a sincere biologist , " Pence attacked DT NN of evolution , which , in his telling , was conjecture and thus no worthier of respect than other notions about DT origins of life . Darwin " hoped IN some day PRP MD be proven by DT fossil record but did not live to see DT , " declared Pence , " nor have PRP . " Of course , EX is nothing uncertain in DT prevailing NN on DT origins of life on NNP . As DT National Academy of NNP explains , a scientific theory is not merely conjecture . PRP is " a comprehensive explanation of some aspect of nature WDT is supported by a vast body of evidence . " This is why physicists still talk about a " theory " of gravity WDT explains why objects fall down and not up and biologists speak of " cell theory , " even though DT fact IN living things are composed of cells is established truth . A willful denial of DT facts was required for Pence to press his case against Darwin , but he was clearly devoted to this cause . Having cast doubt on DT NN of evolution , he VBD IN he was only asking for everyone to be open - minded . " I MD simply and humbly ask ... can PRP RB consider teaching other theories of DT origin of species ? " Then , he declared IN his own mind was shut . " DT Bible tells PRP IN God created man in his own imagine , male and female , " VBD Pence . " He created them . And I believe DT . " Pence 's speech on evolution , preserved on C - SPAN , was delivered in DT cadence of a radio preacher . Pence had developed this way of speaking during his NNS as a broadcaster , when he pitched himself as " Rush Limbaugh on decaf . " But as friendly as he sounded , Pence was determined to impose his religious views through JJ policy and to do PRP through DT manipulation of language . Another example was his proposal to use federal funds to turn gay NNS straight . So - called " conversion therapy , " promoted by quacks and religious bigots , assumes IN homosexuality is a medically treatable pathology , which PRP is not . Pence 's proposal never gained traction in Congress , but PRP was a loud dog whistle to those on DT homophobic Christian right . With his sights set on DT White House , Pence sought executive experience back home in Indiana , where a GOP advantage in registration helped him win a narrow victory in DT 2012 governor 's race . He installed his wife , Karen , in an office at DT NN house , a first for first ladies of DT NN , and had a pair of red phones wired to connect his desk directly with hers . Pence was unremarkable as governor , save for his commitment to DT causes of Christian conservatives in pushing a NN law WDT permitted discrimination against gay customers by businesses . When Indiana 's Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 2015 was approved , Pence signed PRP into law in a rare , private ceremony where he was flanked by clergy from a variety of religions . text: Flat Earthers debunked : How PRP VBP DT NNP and Moon are spheres , not discs DT rapper B.o.B. declared on Twitter last month IN NNP is flat , claiming to have pictures to back up his outlandish claims . DT incident provoked responses from high profile NNS IN Neil deGrasse Tyson , who noted such statements made by a JJ figure are responsible for a strain of anti-intellectualism plaguing DT nation . Unfortunately , few NNS seized DT opportunity to explain why PRP VBP DT NNP is in fact a globe . DT following , therefore , highlights some of DT foremost reasons why PRP VBP DT NNP is round . DT moon is not made of cheese and DT NN is not flat . This can be observed during a lunar eclipse , which occurs whenever DT NNP ’s orbit places PRP in - between DT sun and moon . DT NNP casts a round shadow on DT moon . Since DT NNP is rotating and consistently casting a round shadow on DT moon during every eclipse , its proves beyond a shadow ( forgive DT pun ) of a doubt WDT DT NNP is in fact round . Anyone who has ever waited for a ship to dock will notice IN a ship does not sporadically appear off DT horizon but gradually emerges from beneath DT ocean . DT reason ships do not emerge from DT ocean – nor fall off DT edge of NNP – is because DT NN is round . DT fact IN ships appear to emerge from DT depths of DT NN is an illusion cast by NNP ’s curvature . If PRP place a stick upright , PRP will cast a shadow . DT length of DT shadow changes throughout DT day . If DT NN was flat , then two sticks at different places should produce DT same shadows . DT problem is PRP do n’t , which only makes sense if DT NNP is round . In fact , Eratosthenes took note of this phenomena to calculate DT circumference of DT NNP nearly 2,200 NNS ago . DT curvature of DT NNP If DT NNP were flat , then PRP all MD stand on an equal playing field . DT problem , as anyone who has ever stood atop of a hill knows , is IN DT higher elevated PRP are , DT more PRP can see . At certain heights , PRP can actually see DT curvature of DT NNP . text: During DT period of roughly February 1992 to mid 1994 , I was making frequent trips to Moscow , Russia , in DT process of starting a software development joint - venture company with some NNS from DT Russian scientific community . CD of DT men in charge on DT Russian side was named V. M. ; he had a wife named T.M. V. was a level - headed scientist while his wife was rather deeply committed to DT losing Communist cause - a cause she obviously was not abandoning . CD evening , during a trip early in 1992 , DT American half of our venture were invited to V. & T.'s Moscow flat as PRP were about to return to DT NNPS . DT party went well and PRP had DT normal dinner discussions . As DT evening wore on , T. developed a decidedly rough anti-American edge - CD her husband tried to quietly rein in . DT bottom line of DT tirade she started against DT NNP NNPS went something IN this : " PRP Americans always VBP to VB IN PRP have DT perfect NN and your NNS are always so perfect . Well then , why have n't PRP had a woman NN by now ? PRP had a chance to vote for a woman vice - NN and PRP did n't do PRP . " DT general response went something along DT lines WDT PRP do n't vote for someone just because of their sex . Besides , PRP do n't vote for vice - NN , but DT NN and vice - NN as a ticket . " Well , I VBP PRP are VBG to be surprised when PRP VBP a black NN very soon . " DT consensus PRP expressed was IN PRP did n't VB EX was anything innately barring DT . DT right person at DT right NN and sure , America MD try to vote for DT right person , be he or she black or not . " What if I told PRP IN PRP will have a black NN very soon and he will be a Communist ? " DT out - of - DT - blue remark was met by our stares . She continued , " Well , PRP will ; and he will be a Communist . " PRP was then IN DT husband unsuccessfully tried to VB DT subject ; but she was on a roll and MD have nothing of PRP . CD of PRP asked , " PRP sounds IN PRP VBP something PRP do n't VB . " " Yes , PRP is true . This is not some idle talk . He is already born and he is educated and being groomed to be NN right now . PRP will be impressed to VB IN he has gone to DT best schools of Presidents . He is what PRP call " Ivy League " . PRP do n't believe me , but he is real and I even VBP his name . His name is Barack . His mother is white and American and his father is black from Africa . DT 's right , a chocolate baby ! And he 's VBG to be your NNP . " She became more and more smug as she presented her stream of detailed knowledge and predictions so matter - of - factly - as though all were foregone conclusions . " PRP 's all been thought out . His father is not an American black so he wo n't have DT social slave stigma . He is intelligent and he is half white and has been raised from DT cradle to be an atheist and a Communist . He 's gone to DT finest schools . He is being guided every step of DT way and he will be irresistible to America . " PRP sat RB not knowing what to say . She was obviously very happy IN DT Communists were doing this and IN PRP MD somehow be a thumbing of their collective noses at America : PRP MD give PRP a black NN and he'd be a Communist to boot . She made PRP quite obvious IN she thought IN this was VBG to breathe JJ life into NN Communism . From this and other conversations with her , she always asserted IN Communism was far from dead . She rattled off a complete litany . He was from Hawaii . He went to school in California . He lived in Chicago . He was soon to be elected to DT legislature . " Have no doubt : he is CD of PRP , a Soviet . " At CD point , she related some sort of San Francisco connection , but I did n't understand what DT point was and do n't recall much about DT . I was just left with DT notion IN she considered DT city to be some sort of a center for their activity here . Since I had dabbled in languages , I knew a smattering of Arabic . I made a comment : " If I remember correctly , ' Barack ' comes from DT Arabic word for ' Blessing . ' DT seems to be an odd name for an American . " She replied quickly , " Yes . PRP is ' African ' " , she insisted , " and he will be a blessing for NN Communism . PRP will regain our strength and become DT number CD power in DT NN . " She continued with something to DT effect IN America was at DT same NN DT great hope and DT great obstacle for Communism . America MD have to be converted to Communism and Barack was VBG to pave DT way . So , what does this conversation from 1992 prove ? Well , PRP 's definitely anecdotal . PRP does n't prove IN Obama has had Soviet Communist training nor IN he was groomed to be DT first black American NN , but PRP does show CD thing WDT I VBP is very important . PRP shows IN Soviet Russian Communists knew of Barack from a very early date . PRP RB shows IN PRP truly believed among themselves IN he was raised and groomed Communist to pave DT way for their future . What PRP MD not VB is IN DT NNP Department of Defense has reportedly spent roughly $ 20 million conducting studies aimed at learning how to manipulate online behavior in order to influence opinion . DT initiative was launched in 2011 by DT Pentagon ’s Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency , otherwise known as DARPA . text: Stocks declined Wednesday as DT euro got a boost from NN IN Greece was considering leaving DT European Union . Industrials were DT day 's worst performers , along with consumer discretionary and materials . NN care and telecoms were DT best performers . DT Dow was down about 80 points at mid-morning , led by Caterpillar , Boeing and DuPont . Bank of America and JPMorgan were DT top two gainers on DT Dow . DT euro clawed backagainst DT dollar and other currencies amid buzz in DT market IN Greece is considering leaving DT European Union . A spokesperson for Greece categorically denied DT debt - riddled nation is considering such a move . Earlier , DT euro hit a four - NN low against DT dollar after German Chancellor Angela Merkel VBD DT euro was in dangerand as Germany banned naked short sellingof some securities . This came as DT SEC released proposed JJ rules on single stock trading , to prevent a stock being driven down to a penny IN some were during DT NNP 6 market freefall . And Congress is about to make a preliminary vote on financial reform . Oil popped above $ 69 a barrelafter a report showed crude inventories rose by just 200,000 barrels last week , far less than expected . Earlier , crude had fallen to around $ 68 . Gold continued its descent to back to NN , falling below $ 1,200 an ounce . DT precious metal recently went as high as $ 1,250 . Hewlett - Packard advanced after beating earnings expectations and raising its full - NN outlook . Target RB topped forecastsas consumers have begun to spend more on discretionary items such as clothing and electronics . This came as Walmart reported a same - store sales declineas more shoppers are trading up . Lawnmower maker Deere RB topped forecasts and raised its full - NN outlook . Chips retreated after an early pop . DT sector took a beating on Tuesday amid buzz IN overseas sales of computers and gadgets MD not live up to expectations . Still , Sterne Agee initiated coverage of Apple with a " buy " ratingand slapped a $ 300 price target on DT stock , saying PRP does n't see a slowdown for DT iPhone and iPad maker . Consumer prices slipped 0.1 percentin April and were flat excluding volatile food and NN costs . This came after DT Labor Department reported Tuesday IN DT producer price index rose 0.2 percent last month . Some dismal NN on DT housing front : Mortgage applications tumbled more than 27 percentto their lowest level since NNP 1997 as DT NN stimulus expired , and CD in seven U.S. mortgages is now deliquent or headed for foreclosure . text: From NN shells and spiral galaxies to DT structure of human lungs , DT patterns of chaos are all around PRP . Fractals are patterns formed from chaotic equations and contain self - similar patterns of complexity increasing with magnification . If PRP divide a fractal pattern into parts PRP VBP a nearly identical reduced - size copy of DT whole . DT mathematical beauty of fractals is IN infinite complexity is formed with relatively simple equations . By iterating or repeating fractal - generating equations JJ times , random outputs create beautiful patterns WDT are unique , yet recognizable . PRP have pulled together some of DT most stunning natural examples PRP MD find of fractals on our NN . Above : This variant form of cauliflower is DT ultimate fractal vegetable . Its pattern is a natural representation of DT Fibonacci or golden spiral , a logarithmic spiral where every quarter turn is farther from DT origin by a factor of phi , DT golden ratio . Image : Flickr / Tin.G. DT San Francisco Bay salt flats pictured above have been used for commercial salt production for over a century . Below , an image from DT largest salt flat in DT NN , Salar de Uyuni , located in southern Bolivia . DT encrusted salt shows a remarkably consistent but random pattern , a characteristic of fractals . Images : 1 ) Flickr / Tolka Rover . 2 ) Flickr / Mike D. Green . Extinct for 65 million NNS , ammonites were marine cephalopods WDT built chambered spiral shells . DT walls between these chambers , called sutures , were complex fractal curves . Stephen Jay Gould used DT complexity of ammonite sutures over NN to argue IN EX is no evolutionary drive toward greater complexity and IN PRP are a " glorious accident , " alone in DT universe . DT shells of ammonites RB grow as a logarithmic spiral , a pattern WDT appears often in nature , as with romanesco broccoli . Ammonites RB inspired this cathedral staircase in Barcelona , Spain . Images : 1 ) Flickr / cobalt123 . 2 ) Flickr / Didier.bier . 3 ) Flickr / Edgley Cesar Mountains are DT result of tectonic forces pushing DT crust upward and erosion tearing some of DT crust down . DT resulting pattern is a fractal . Above is an image of DT Himalayan Mountains , home to JJ of DT tallest peaks on NNP . DT Himalayas are still being uplifted by DT collision of India with DT Eurasian plate , which began about 70 million NNS ago . Image : NASA / GSFC / JPL , MISR Team . Ferns are a common example of a self - similar set , meaning IN their pattern can be mathematically generated and reproduced at any magnification or reduction . DT mathematical formula WDT describes ferns , named after Michael Barnsley , was CD of DT first to show IN chaos is inherently unpredictable yet generally follows deterministic rules based on nonlinear iterative equations . In other words , random numbers generated over and over using Barnsley 's Fern formula ultimately produce a unique fern - shaped object . Images : 1 ) Flickr / cobalt123 . 2 ) Flickr / CatDancing . DT marine stratus clouds above were photographed by DT Aqua satellite over DT South Atlantic Ocean , off DT west coast of Africa . A fractal cloud pattern is interrupted by a series of diagonal grooves . According DT NASA NNP Observatory , PRP is highly unusual to see such a sharp boundary in a continual cloud formation such as this , and NNS have yet to explain how PRP MD form . Below , DT 200 - mile long series of cloud vortexes is perhaps DT longest of these formations ever photographed , according to NASA . These cloud vortexes are RB called von Kármán cloud streets , for DT late fluid dynamicist Theodore von Kármán . Cloud streets form when low - lying clouds are interrupted by an object such as an island . Similar patterns occur in DT wind flow downstream of airplane wings . Images : 1 ) Jeff Schmaltz / MODIS Land Rapid Response Team / NASA . 2 ) NASA . JJ plants follow simple recursive formulas in generating their branching shapes and leaf patterns . Ironically , deforestation patterns WDT occur along primary , secondary and tertiary roadways form a similar pattern , IN DT pictured below from DT NN of Rondonia in western Brazil , CD of DT most deforested regions of DT Amazon . Images : 1 ) Flickr / CatDancing . 2 ) NASA . This false - color image above , of DT Grand Canyon , displays DT fractal pattern created by DT Colorado River over millions of NNS . Red indicates areas of vegetation in DT image . Below , a false - color image of Canyon de Chelly National Monument in Arizona . DT National Park Service calls PRP CD of DT longest continually inhabited landscapes in North America . Images : 1 ) GeoEye / Space Imaging . 2 ) NASA . DT path lightning takes is formed step by step as PRP moves towards DT ground , turning air into plasma . Images : 1 ) Flickr / thefost . 2 ) Flickr / Brujo +. Peacocks attract mates with DT repeating patterns in their plumage . Images : 1 ) Flickr / Digimist . 2 ) Flickr / Maia C . Crystallizing NN forms repeating patterns in snowflakes and on frosty surfaces . DT patterns have inspired claims about DT power of consciousness to affect matter , as well as CD of DT first described fractal curves , DT Koch snowflake . Images : 1 ) Flickr / mommamia . 2 ) Flickr / monteregina . Similar to canyons , a combination of rock irregularity and gravity produces repeating patterns as NN flows over DT side of a sharp ledge . Image : Flickr / catdancing DT Yukon River branches into thousands of distributary channels as PRP drains into DT Bering NNP off DT coast of Alaska . DT river is flowing right to left in DT image , with DT Bering NNP visible in DT far left side of DT image . Image : NASA .

text: HOLLYWOOD ( CNN ) -- Any student of Shakespeare MD have told " Xena , Warrior Princess " fans what was VBG to happen to Julius Caesar in last season 's cliffhanger episode , " DT Ides of March . And then PRP start to come up with a plan to figure out how PRP 're actually VBG to achieve all DT shots -- how PRP 's all VBG to come together . " DT special - effects crew gets involved in every part of a production of this kind , from piecing together real elements to embellishing DT truth with realistic - looking fakes . In CD shot , PRP might start off with Lawless as an archdemon , shot against a blue screen . DT 's part of DT " chroma key " process WDT allows DT development of composite images used in television in JJ weather forecasts and in film for special effects . And what effects -- behind Lawless goes a painted background : some digital rocky pillars , a squadron of flying digital demons , and after a few hundred hours of work , magic . " PRP wanted to give PRP DT impression IN maybe PRP was from a helicopter , or some kind of a gliding mechanism or something . " Some of DT flying sequences MD n't be done with real actors on wires , so digital stand - ins were created on DT drafting board . " What PRP deliver is different elements , " says Mark Kochinski , another 3 - D effects supervisor , as he shows off his work . " UH , this is Xena flying , and then this is DT beam of light she 's flying through . And then when DT shot is composited , PRP can see her flying through DT clouds , which are a separate element . " Some effects executed on film in NNP Zealand needed some high - tech touch ups in California , among them archangel Gabrielle 's wings , which did n't work on film . " PRP went into DT shot , " says Kochinski , " removed DT wings WDT she was wearing , created some three - dimensional wings WDT were a bit more animated and then married them to her body for DT shot . " " Xena , Warrior Princess " carries DT battle way beyond real life almost every week . But in order to VB this far -- IN past life itself -- and come back next week , PRP sure helps to VB some special - effects wizards . text: On February 3 , 1851 , a 32 - NN - old Frenchman — who ’d dropped out of JJ school and dabbled in photography — definitively demonstrated IN DT NNP indeed rotated , surprising DT Parisian scientific establishment . Acting on a hunch , Léon Foucault had determined IN he MD use a pendulum to illustrate DT effect of DT NNP ’s movement . He called together a group of NNS , enticing them with a note declaring , “ PRP are invited to see DT NNP turn . ” Foucault hung a pendulum from DT ceiling of DT Meridian Room of DT Paris Observatory . As PRP swept through DT air , PRP traced a pattern WDT effectively proved DT NN was spinning about an axis . A month later , Foucault shared his experiment with all of Paris at DT majestic Pantheon building . According to DT American Physical Society , he suspended from DT Pantheon ’s lofty dome a 61 - pound brass bob on a 220 - foot cable . As PRP swung back and forth , DT pointed end of DT bob traced lines in sand WDT had been poured on a wooden platform . Over NN , DT angle of these lines changed , suggesting to audience members IN DT direction of DT pendulum ’s travel was shifting under DT influence of an unperceived rotational motion — WDT of NNP . Foucault was able to demonstrate a scientific concept in a way IN DT average person MD easily grasp , says Rebecca C. Thompson , head of JJ outreach for DT APS . For centuries , PRP was a commonly held belief IN DT NNP rotated on an axis . But PRP was Foucault who dispelled lingering doubts once and for all , establishing DT phenomenon firmly in DT realm of fact . “ PRP really started DT cultural shift to fundamentally understanding our universe differently , ” Thompson says . DT experiment was a hit , drawing flocks of fascinated Parisians and catapulting Foucault to fame . Pendulums based on Foucault ’s calculations began appearing worldwide — and are still iconic features of JJ NN museums in DT U.S. and other NNS . DT Smithsonian Institution made a pendulum a focal point of its Museum of History and Technology ( which later became DT National Museum of American History ) . DT building — which opened in 1964 on DT National Mall in Washington , D.C. — was designed purposely to accommodate a pendulum . As PRP moved back and forth — facilitated by an electromagnetic push to keep PRP continuously swinging despite air resistance and vibrations in DT cable — PRP MD knock down inch - or - so - high pins standing at fixed points along DT circumference of a small circle . Over NN , viewers MD see DT direction of DT pendulum ’s swing NN , implying IN DT NNP was rotating beneath them . DT Smithsonian pendulum , IN all pendulums , moved in accordance with Foucault ’s sine law , which predicts how much a pendulum ’s path will distort each day based on its latitude . Absent any exterior forces , a pendulum MD swing back and forth in a single plane forever — EX MD be no gradual angular shift . But DT NNP is rotating , so DT story is n’t RB simple . Since all points on NNP ’s surface rotate as a unit , PRP follows IN those located on DT wider portions of DT NN — nearer to DT equator — must cover more meters each second ( i.e. , VB faster ) to “ keep up ” with DT points tracing smaller circles each day at DT extreme northern and southern latitudes . Though PRP do n’t feel PRP , a person standing in Quito , Ecuador , is moving with appreciably higher velocity than CD in Reykjavik , Iceland . Because each swing of a pendulum takes PRP from a point farther from DT equator to a point nearer to DT equator and vice versa , and DT velocities at these points differ , DT path of DT pendulum is subtly distorted with every swing , gradually torqued away from its original orientation . DT extent of this effect depends on where on NNP DT pendulum is swinging . text: Last NN , retired Sacramento paramedic and firefighter Jesse Beltran says he visited a dentist for what he thought was a standard procedure . Upon waking nearly four hours later , unbeknownst to Beltran , he believes a Radio - Frequency IDentification ( RFID ) chip had been implanted in DT rear area of his mouth where DT lower and upper jaws connect . During a November 29 interview , Beltran told this writer , “ A recent girlfriend of mine WDT was associated with law enforcement took me to a dentist WDT I ’d never before visited . Without my consent , DT dentist used a very unusual looking syringe and knocked me out for between three and four hours . Since I ’d been in DT JJ field for over 20 NNS , I ’m familiar with syringes , and this large - gauge needle looked IN DT old - style equipment WDT military doctors used . ” DT horrors got worse during this procedure . Beltran continued his account : “ When I regained consciousness three to four hours later , my entire chest was drenched in saliva . Supposedly , I had received two root canals and had two teeth capped . But after visiting a different dentist earlier this NN , his X - rays revealed IN only CD root canal had been performed , and no crowns put in place . ” In an extensive portfolio presented to this newspaper , Beltran provided a series of X - rays and MRI scans WDT show what appear to be two foreign bodies in DT back portion of his mouth . Beltran claims two different doctors have confirmed these results . When asked if he has experienced any physical afflictions as a result , Beltran replied , “ A former Marine told me IN similar RFID chips are used by DT U.S. military on prisoners in Afghanistan to send and receive information . DT device in my mouth is approximately DT size of a grain of rice , and depending on DT frequencies being transmitted , I undergo nausea , vertigo , hearing loss and swollen glands . Plus , because [ I have a ] technical background , I can hear a ‘ 60 - cycle whine . ’ ” To clarify this phenomenon , Beltran explained , “ This 60 - cycle whine is an electrical sound emitted from DT device , but with a higher pitch WDT I hear originating from around my right ear , but not exactly . ” When Beltran visited a local district attorney with his X - rays , he was told , “ This was done because of something PRP VBP IN somebody wants , or PRP do n’t VB PRP to say something . ” DT district attorney then told Beltran about S.B. 362 , introduced by NN senator Joe Simitian ( D - Palo Alto ) , which VBZ IN “ subdermal implantation of RFID chips in DT NN of California against a person ’s consent ” is illegal . Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed this legislation in 2007 . “ Why MD EX need to be such a law in DT first place unless these procedures were already being performed ? ” asked Beltran . DT obvious question at this point is : Why MD someone VB to implant an RFID device in Beltran ’s mouth ? This is where DT story gets eerie . Beltran provided DT answer . “ In 1991 I was DT supervisor for a private ambulance company in Sacramento when PRP were dispatched to DT scene of a high - speed pursuit involving DT potential kidnapping of a four - or five - NN - old girl , ” he VBD . “ DT suspect was apprehended and dragged from his car by law enforcement officers and then beaten to death . However , PRP turned out IN DT suspect was actually DT little girl ’s father , and PRP was n’t a kidnapping , but a custody issue . So , this child ’s father was beaten to death with billy clubs before her very eyes . ” He added : “ After I tried to write a report about what I ’d witnessed , my supervisor told me to keep my mouth shut or I ’d be blacklisted . DT ’s when DT cover - up began . ” Still , why MD this incident affect Beltran nearly two decades later to DT extent IN an invasive JJ procedure was perhaps conducted without his knowledge and against his will ? “ DT motive leads back to me witnessing a murder WDT now affects DT candidates ( in a local 2010 sheriff ’s election ) who were in charge of DT cover - up , ” he VBD . “ Last NN , I emailed CD of DT candidates and asked : If a law enforcement officer is informed of a murder , are PRP required to report PRP ? Twenty minutes later I received a phone call from CD of DT officers associated with DT cover - up of this murder . If this information is divulged , PRP will completely ruin DT sheriff ’s election [ in November 2010 ] . A colleague has RB told me IN DT sheriff ’s department and local FBI are behind what has happened to me . ” Although California politicians such as Senator Barbara Boxer ( D - Calif . ) and Representative Dan Lungren ( D - Calif . ) have offered no help , nor has local NN , Beltran says TruTV and Jesse Ventura have shown an interest in filming DT surgery when DT RFID device is removed from his mouth . Beltran has RB met with an area district attorney , who has yet to decide whether DT crimes committed against him fall under local jurisdiction or DT of DT USA PATRIOT Act and domestic terrorism .
