text: PRP ’s DT NN of NN when ambitious homeowners take to their lawns and roofs to outdo their neighbors in a game of who can overwhelm DT local power grid first . Results MD vary from lonely candy canes to full - blown holiday light dragons . But whether PRP VBP full - throttle or prefer a low - key display of holiday cheer , CD thing is now true : NASA is watching . NNS at DT Goddard Space Flight Center in Maryland and Yale University in Connecticut used satellite imagery to track light patterns in 1,200 cities over two and a half NNS . PRP found IN increased light correlated perfectly with DT holiday seasons for Ramadan in DT Middle East , as well as Christmas and NNP NNP 's Eve worldwide . PRP RB saw variations in how cities and neighborhoods within those cities celebrate these holidays , DT team announced this week at DT American Geophysical Union 's annual meeting in San Francisco . " What ’s happening during DT holidays is our patterns are changing , " says Miguel Román , a physical scientist at NASA Goddard . In DT West , PRP 're staying up late drinking eggnog and VBG home from work early . " Those changes in behavior are changes in DT locations of demand for NN services . " Understanding such seasonal shifts might ultimately tell PRP what 's driving carbon NNS at a local level . With hundreds of satellites circling NNP , PRP might seem easy to snap a picture of exactly what ’s down below . But getting really high resolution images has been difficult , especially when homing in on urban environments . In 2011 , DT Suomi-NPP satellite launched with a fancy schmancy camera aboard . This particular camera has low - light sensors WDT can pick up on wavelengths from green to infrared and create more intense images . DT camera allows Suomi-NPP to take pictures of NNP at around 1 am local NN every night at very high resolution . “ PRP ’s extremely sensitive . Allowing every single pixel to be overexposed , PRP can pick DT faintest signal IN a fishing boat out of DT coast of Somalia , as well as very bright signals IN volcanic magma on DT Big Island of Hawaii , ” explains Román . In 2012 , NOAA used DT camera to make a composite image of a few months worth of lights at night . To make an image IN DT , PRP have to run DT raw data through special algorithms , to correct for white noise such as fires , reflective aerosols and moonlight . NASA wanted to be able to do this on a daily basis , so Román started exploring options . To VB a baseline , he looked at rural areas with little light pollution and at deserts . But when he took some initial data for Egypt and DT Sahara , something looked weird , as if DT lights were overly saturated . “ This was happening in urban areas , so PRP looked into DT , and what PRP realized was IN what PRP were seeing was IN DT increase in DT signal was timing perfectly with DT Ramadan calendar , ” recalls Román . He emailed urbanization specialists at Yale , and PRP were intrigued . Sure enough , PRP found DT same spike DT next NN . Over DT next two and half NNS , DT team measured data for three holiday periods : three NNS of Ramadan in DT summer ( in this case ) and two NNS of Christmas plus NNP NNPS from DT week of Thanksgiving to DT first week in January . Running DT images through a specially designed algorithm , PRP compared DT light signal during these periods to DT rest of DT NN in three geographic areas : DT Middle East , North America and DT Caribbean . Snow turned out to be a big problem . Looking at DT first round of Christmas data from DT central U.S. , Román saw a huge spike in Denver in 2012 . But PRP was n't just Christmas lights , PRP was lamp light reflecting off fresh snow , so PRP had to take out most cities north of St. Louis . Still , PRP were able to pick up on some general trends , and produced maps for DT holiday periods . In 70 cities across DT U.S. , lights twinkled brighter during Christmas and NNP NNP 's , regardless of JJ or other factors . " [ PRP 's ] tracking this national shared tradition , " says Román . City suburbs in particular showed a 30 to 50 percent increase in lighting intensity , while most urban centers saw a 20 to 30 percent increase . DT 's likely because a bigger yard means more space for blow - up Santas and glow - in - DT - dark reindeer . In Román 's native Puerto Rico , DT Christmas pattern emerged as well . Using their algorithm , DT researchers were actually able to group together cultural centers of holiday festivals , industrial cities and more rural towns based on DT citizens ' NN habits . " [ PRP ] are now able to classify cities as a function of DT NN behaviors of its inhabitants . Behaviors WDT are based on DT norms , on DT identities of a culture , " explains Román . " This is way cooler than seeing Christmas lights from space . " In DT Middle East , DT lights of major cities burned brighter during DT holy month of Ramadan , typically culminating with a peak associated with Eid festivities . Generally , lights increased in DT city center with group prayer activities at night and NNS VBG to work earlier . Differences across NNS stood out . Saudi Arabia had DT most intense Ramadan increase , while DT lights of Istanbul were a little weaker . Saudi Arabia is more conservative , while Turkey is more secular . " Nighttime lights really track DT cultural differences between these cities and DT NNS WDT host them , " says Eleanor Stokes , a graduate student at Yale who collaborated on DT NN . Tel Aviv , notably , had no increase in lighting during DT Muslim holy month . And cities in Iraq and Lebanon saw dips in nightime lights , which DT researchers link to unreliable electricity . In Syria , decreases in nighttime light in Aleppo and Damascus likely corresponded to political and military unrest . " These nighttime lights really are in some ways IN DT EKG of a city , " says Stokes . In Egypt , DT researchers took a closer look at 20 Cairo neighborhoods and found IN poorer areas saw a smaller peak during Ramadan , choosing to leave DT lights off for financial or maybe cultural reasons . " PRP can see those social and cultural imprints in DT NN signatures themselves , " says Stokes . DT data do n’t give them an exact measure of DT total NN use on a city block , but DT lights do provide a proxy for tracking NN use patterns . “ This is DT factor WDT ’s most sensitive to human behavior . When NNS turn on DT lights , DT next thing PRP ’re VBG to turn on is DT toaster and DT heater , ” says Román . “ PRP ’s those patterns of behavior WDT PRP ’re trying to see . ” Urban areas account for a huge chunk of NN use and NNS , so DT researchers hope to overlay DT data with carbon NNS and NN consumption data in DT future . " Carbon dioxide NNS is giving PRP DT when , where and DT how much . But PRP ’s not telling PRP what is driving PRP , " says Román . Looking at DT lighting data against NNS MD help build more localized NN mitigation strategies . Román points out : " What 's VBG to work in NNP York City is n't necessarily VBG to work for Amarillo , Texas . " In this way , DT images provide a lot more than pretty pictures of NNP from space . text: Miley Cyrus is what I call a “ barometer artist ” . DT ’s because her act invariably mirrors whatever agenda needs to be pushed by mass NN at DT particular moment . Indeed , Miley never had her own sound , her own image or her own message . Her entire act was always dictated by her handlers ever since she was a child playing DT role of Hannah Montana . Appropriately enough , Miley recently appeared in an episode of Black Mirror where she played DT role of a mind - controlled pop star who has absolutely no control over her career and her message . While her character ( named Ashley O ) keeps talking about “ empowerment ” to her fans , she ’s actually a heavily medicated slave who does as she ’s told by her handlers . Only a few weeks after DT release of DT Black Mirror episode , Miley Cyrus unleashes upon DT NN Mother ’s Daughter – an NSFW music video loaded with a bunch of calculated messages aimed a young NNS . Indeed , DT video is essentially an infomercial sponsored by powerful groups , lobbies , and VB tanks to propagate specific social messages . According to NN sources , Mother ’s Daughter is “ a statement made in support of gender equality , freedom and DT fight against discrimination and sexual harassment ” . Of course , DT video was immediately praised by everyone in show business because DT ’s DT agenda right now and nobody can oppose PRP . Abortions good . Genders bad . However , EX is more to this video than meets DT eye . Let ’s look at PRP . DT concept of DT video is rather simple : Lots of guest appearances by activists and other NNS WDT support a specific agenda . At DT center of PRP all : Miley Cyrus wearing a red latex suit which features a symbolic “ accessory ” . Beyond DT folk tales , DT dentata aptly represents an important aspect of today ’s mass NN agenda : DT weaponization of feminity . PRP is about using “ feminism ” ( a distorted version of PRP ) for social engineering . PRP is about turning DT female body ( with all of its warm , receptive and nurturing qualities ) against its own nature . PRP is about radicalizing sexes and breeding hatred between males and females . PRP is about turning DT sad reality of abortion into some kind of feminist power move . Throughout DT video , lots of messages are flashed on screen . PRP all have a strange , Orwellian quality to them . A riot is “ a form of civil disorder commonly characterized by a group lashing out in a violent JJ disturbance against authority , property or NNS . ” Is every woman truly a riot ? Of course not . Some women are warm , gentle and loving NNS who do not feel DT need to be angry at everything . By trying to be “ feminists ” , these NNS actually reduce and generalize women to fit their own contrived vision . This next message is worse . DT message is followed by a shot of a young girl . So , let ’s unpack “ virginity is a social construct ” . What does DT even mean ? As seen in past articles such as A Teen Vogue Video Says : “ This Idea WDT DT Body Is Either Male or Female is Totally Wrong ” , EX is a worrying trend in mass NN WDT urges young NNS to deny verifiable facts to embrace a radical and extreme social agenda . Here ’s an excerpt from an article justifying this line of thinking : DT fact IN DT video follows “ virginity does n’t exist ” with a young girl is weird . Do PRP believe IN NNS are not virgins ? DT video then continues with more strange imagery . DT next message in DT video gets spiritual . DT lyrics of DT song kind VBP in DT same pseudo - satanic direction as DT message above . DT first verse goes as follows : As PRP might VB , hallelujah means “ Praise DT Lord ” and is theologically DT highest form of praise PRP can give to God . Combining this word with “ I ’m a freak ” and “ I ’ma do ya ” is basically a form of disrespect and blasphemy . In DT second verse , PRP start to understand what kind of psychopath MD dream up these kinds of debasing messages . As seen in my article DT Sick , Twisted Messages in “ Chilling Adventures of Sabrina ” , EX ’s a clear and evident mass NN push to associate witches with feminism . Throughout DT video , this chorus is repeated ad - nauseam : Miley says IN she ’s nasty and evil because EX ’s “ something in DT NN ” . DT ’s an interesting NN theory . Her other theory is IN she ’s nasty and evil because she ’s IN her mother . Now DT ’s an uplifting message for DT youth . Speaking of witch ( not a typo ) , Miley ’s mother Tish Cyrus makes an appearance in DT video . DT video RB features other “ guests ” . Is this video celebrating “ diversity ” or exploiting PRP ? As stated countless times in previous articles , everyone has DT absolute right to live in whatever way WDT makes them happy and comfortable . But EX ’s a fine line between accepting NNS and hunting down DT most “ diverse ” NNS and exploiting them in videos as if PRP were circus freaks for maximum virtue signaling points . Here ’s what probably happened behind DT scenes : While clamoring “ inclusivity ” , videos IN this NN actually reduces NNS to attributes such as “ trans ” or “ disabled ” . This final image sums up DT entire video . Does this image convey power ? Or DT exact opposite ? Miley sits on a carousel horse WDT is meant to VB around in circles . She wears fake studio props as an armor . Miley is not leading anyone anywhere . She ’s a highly controlled pop star in a studio who is taking orders from a director ( who is a white male , by DT way ) . DT chorus might say “ Do n’t f*ck with my freedom ” . However , those who own her never gave her any of PRP . Mother ’s Daughter is not art . PRP is propaganda and indoctrination . In only a few short minutes , this video manages to mix DT occult elite ’s obsession with abortions , gender - blurring , and satanism . Let ’s not forget DT fact IN PRP believe IN virginity is a “ social construct ” . In DT end , behind all of DT virtue signaling and DT buzzwords , this video actually celebrates only CD thing : DT corruption of everything WDT is pure and sacred . P.S. text: This chapter discusses how DT simplest propagation scenario used in analytical modeling is DT flat NNP with PEC surface under line ‐source excitation . On DT single knife edge problem , DT ray summation approach is based on DT construction of four different rays , related reflection , and diffraction coefficients using Fresnel integral . text: Former Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen has waded into a thorny political dispute involving a University of Chicago professor who has been critical of DT Black Lives Matter campaign to slash police department funding . Harold Uhlig , an economist at DT university and editor of DT prestigious Journal of Political Economy , has equated BLM protesters to " flat earthers " and VBD PRP should have coordinated their protests with police departments , according to DT NNP York Times . In subsequent tweets , he has walked back some of DT comments and on Tuesday VBD he was " was trying to make fun of DT radical and untenable view of massively cutting funding of police departments . Wrong words , mea culpa . But PRP all share DT same goal . " He RB VBD BLM is " a movement WDT is sorely needed now and applauded by so JJ . " Earlier , though , he chided DT movement : Yellen has joined a choir of economists who have criticized Uhlig , with some calling for his removal as editor of DT journal . text: Under DT circumstances , PRP was DT best possible gesture of JJ support IN Washington MD offer its diminutive Baltic ally . Better still was DT timing . Ilves ended up in DT Oval Office on 25 June , exactly CD week before NNP NNP George W. Bush MD host Vladimir Putin in Kennebunkport , Maine . DT symbolism – Estonia first , Russia second – was not overlooked in DT Baltic NN . As Ilves VBD to Estonians , DT invitation proved IN membership of NATO and DT EU was not just a series of empty obligations and formalities . “ If PRP help others , then PRP will help PRP , ” Ilves VBD . True enough , but PRP is difficult to imagine IN DT White House MD have acted similarly had Ilves ’s predecessor , Arnold Rüütel , aged 78 , still been NN . Rüütel , a stodgy ex-communist who brought precious few ideas to DT job , never had DT erudition and aplomb WDT Ilves possesses in abundance . Ilves and Bush first met in November 2006 , just a month - and - a - half after Ilves ( DT name means ‘ lynx ’ in Estonian ) was inaugurated , during DT NNP NN ’s stopover in Tallinn en route to DT NATO summit in Riga , Latvia . Judging by all accounts , DT man from Texas took an instant liking to DT man who was a teenage immigrant to NNP Jersey . So come April , when Estonia erupted in two nights of rioting WDT left CD dead and more than a hundred wounded and caused extensive property damage , Bush remembered his JJ friend in DT Baltics . And how MD he not ? DT loquacious Ilves , who , as well as English , RB has a command of German and Spanish , always leaves a favourable impression . Listening to him is a treat . He wields a wonderful mix of intellectual insights and down - to - NN wisdom seldom found in JJ officials . Speaking on Ukraine ’s incessant woes , for instance , he is quick to point out IN DT crucial mistake was made in DT early 1990s by DT then NN Leonid Kravchuk when DT latter refused to co-operate with a diaspora of three million Ukrainians living in North America . By shutting DT door on such potential expertise and investment , Kravchuk all but slammed DT door to possible Western integration in his own face . Ilves MD VB . A son of Estonian refugees , he was born in Stockholm in 1953 . When he was thirteen his family moved to DT NNP , where Toomas Hendrik ( he always uses both first and middle names ) later graduated from Columbia University ( BA ) and DT University of Pennsylvania ( MA ) with degrees in psychology . In 1984 he packed his bags and left for Munich to work as an analyst with Radio Free Europe , and nine NNS later he returned stateside – only this NN as ambassador to NNP NNPS , Canada and Mexico for a newly independent Estonia . Of his own background , Ilves has VBN : “ I speak English IN an American , I VBP IN a European . ” Remarkably , as a member of DT European Parliament from April 2004 to September 2006 he was tireless in using these two sides of his persona to bridge DT transatlantic rift after DT invasion of Iraq . He blasted Donald Rumsfeld ’s ‘ Old Europe ’ paradigm as a “ disaster , ” and when German philosopher Jürgen Habermas and DT late French deconstructionist Jacques Derrida published a joint declaration calling on Europeans to unite under a banner of anti-Americanism , Ilves wrote a lengthy , passionate rebuttal . Recalling DT heady NN of 2003 , he VBD , “ EX was too much hysteria on both sides of DT Atlantic . ” Ilves eventually gave up his NNP citizenship to become Estonia ’s foreign minister in 1996 . In more than a decade of domestic Estonian politics , he has stood steadfastly in DT centre of DT political spectrum as a member of DT Moderates , a party WDT he helped create . Thanks to Ilves ’s friendship with Mart Laar , a former prime minister , Estonia was DT first European nation to introduce DT flat tax . In 2004 DT Moderates became DT Social Democratic Party , which Ilves left after becoming NN . A striking trait of Ilves is his versatility . He loves DT rustic life and enjoys sporting a pair of overalls and tilling DT soil at his farmstead in Arma , just a short walk from DT Latvian - Estonian border . Film is another favorite pastime . Recently he even tried his talents at acting , taking a cameo role in ‘ 186 Kilometers ’ an Estonian picture about an out - of - luck actor who runs into sundry difficulties trying to make what should be a simple journey from Tallinn to Tartu , a university town southeast of DT capital . In CD of Ilves ’s charity drives , a few NNS ago he was asked to help raise money for disabled NNS by participating in a benefit concert . Ilves agreed and put on a small performance reminiscent of DT Blues Brothers , VBG so far as to don DT black fedora and sunglasses . During DT European Parliament ballot in 2004 , however , his political opponents from Res Publica , a right - wing startup , used this image of Ilves on its posters to scare DT Estonian electorate into believing IN DT Chicago mob was threatening to overrun DT Baltic NN . DT NN campaign , which Ilves slammed as “ vicious ” and “ slimy , ” backfired , and DT Social Democrats won DT most votes , walking away with three of Estonia ’s six seats in DT EU legislature . DT ‘ mobster ’ himself was appointed deputy chairman of DT foreign affairs committee . Two - and - a- half NNS later , Ilves , who actually prefers bow - ties , was further vindicated when Res Publica , which bitterly opposed a second presidential term for Rüütel , threw its support behind his candidacy . For now , Ilves , who will celebrate his first NN in office on 9 October , faces tremendous domestic challenges . After DT Soviet memorial debacle in April , Estonian society is deeply split – CD - quarter of DT country ’s 1.3 million are ethnic Russians . Given DT current labour deficit , keeping DT Russians – JJ of whom are non-citizens without DT right to vote in national elections – is a matter of JJ urgency . Tellingly , Ilves ’s first domestic trip after becoming NN was to Narva and Ida - Virumaa , towns in northeastern Estonia WDT are more than 90 % ethnic Russian . DT appeal is RB directed at Estonians . Demographics , after all , will be DT country ’s single greatest challenge in DT 21st century . While in NNP York in September , Ilves appealed to Estonians living in DT NNP to VB about returning to DT Baltics . “ PRP need every Estonian , ” he VBD . 1998 - 2004 : Minister of foreign affairs and member of parliament in Estonia 2006 : NNP of DT Republic of Estonia

text: What is NN ? PRP ticks by , moment by moment , day after day . But PRP ’s so baked into our lives IN PRP do n’t VB much about PRP , unless PRP ’re late for an appointment or suddenly notice those gray hairs in DT mirror . Einstein tells PRP IN PRP can expand and shrink , while DT second law of thermodynamics , which says IN DT universe is growing more disordered , seems somehow to be tied to NN ’s “ flow . ” Carlo Rovelli has devoted most of his career to pondering DT enigma of NN . An Italian physicist working at Aix - Marseille University in France , Rovelli is known among NNS for his pioneering work on loop quantum gravity — a theory WDT attempts to unite quantum mechanics with Einstein ’s theory of general relativity . DT wider NN , meanwhile , has come to VB him as an eloquent , even poetic writer on scientific topics . Rovelli ’s 2014 book , " Seven Brief Lessons on Physics , " sold more than a million copies around DT NN . Now he ’s out with a JJ book , " DT Order of NNP , " which zeroes in on DT most peculiar dimension : NN . Recently , MACH spoke with Rovelli about DT nature of NN , whether PRP has a beginning and if humans might CD day master NN travel . DT interview has been edited for length and clarity . MACH : What exactly is NN ? Rovelli : PRP is something very complex . PRP mistakenly VBP IN NN is something basic , something very elementary . PRP ’s DT same with NN . PRP ’s only a technological problem , not a scientific NN . CD way is to move very fast . DT only difficulty is IN DT speed needed for this has to be very high , comparable to DT speed of light . Another way to jump to DT future is to travel near a black hole . DT ’s much more complicated . PRP is not logically impossible , but PRP requires beating DT second law of thermodynamics , which MD be IN beating DT laws of probability . I VBP IN if PRP ever achieve this , PRP MD be long after PRP ’ve mastered forward NN travel . Has working as a physicist affected DT way PRP VBP about NN in your own life ? I ’ve certainly changed a lot , in my way of thinking , over DT NNS . But I ’m not sure if PRP ’s because of my research or because I ’m getting older . I ’m much more relaxed . I ’m much more serene , less rushed . I VBP of life more as a gift . But possibly PRP ’s just because I was 20 before , and I ’m 60 now . text: • Sometimes CEOs and managers in a company deny or ignore negative facts about DT organization 's performance . • Our intuition is to confront NNS suffering from this " ostrich effect " with facts — but this MD actually backfire . • Rather than dispute , PRP should show emotional leadership : Use curiosity and questioning to figure out their values and goals . • Once PRP understand , try to show them PRP share those values and explain how their current stance undermines DT goals in DT long term . ' Tis DT season for holiday parties at DT office . While PRP 're great for building workplace camaraderie and team spirit , when was DT last NN a colleague — perhaps fueled by too much alcohol — VBD something so ridiculous IN PRP made your jaw drop ? Perhaps a desk mate went into something political , claiming IN George Bush is behind 9/11 or IN Barack Obama is a Muslim from Kenya ? Or maybe your boss voiced NN denialism , arguing IN DT NNP is flat or DT Apollo moon landing was faked ? Just as disconcerting as DT NN theorist in your midst is hearing a boss or colleague blatantly deny a business reality , such as evidence IN a favored product flopped or a decision was absolutely DT wrong NN . So what do PRP do when someone PRP work with — even DT CEO of DT company — tells PRP something WDT 's demonstrably false ? Dealing with truth denialism — in business , politics and other life areas — is CD of my areas of research , and I recently published a book on DT topic . Here are some tips to navigate DT Christmas office party or CD - on - CD with a boss in denial . PRP begins at DT top DT worst - case scenario is when your chief executive is DT NN in denial . A four - NN NN by LeadershipIQ.com , which provides online leadership seminars , interviewed 1,087 board members from 286 organizations of all sorts WDT forced out their chief executive officers . PRP found IN almost CD quarter of CEOs — 23 percent — got fired for denying reality , meaning refusing to recognize negative facts about DT organization 's performance . Other research strongly suggests IN DT behaviors expressed by CEOs " are felt throughout DT organization by impacting DT norms WDT sanction or discourage member behavior and decision making , and DT patterns of behavior and interaction among members . " Together , these findings suggest IN organizations where CEOs deny negative facts will have a culture of denying reality throughout DT hierarchy . Of course , even when DT boss lives in DT real NN , others in DT organization MD hold false beliefs . Professionals at all levels can suffer from DT tendency to deny uncomfortable facts in business settings . Scholars term this thinking error DT ostrich effect , named after DT ( mythical ) notion IN ostriches stick their heads into DT sand when PRP see threats . Our intuition is to confront colleagues suffering from DT ostrich effect with DT facts . But research — and common sense , if DT colleague is your supervisor — suggests DT 's usually DT wrong thing to do . DT 's because when someone believes something PRP VBP to be false , some kind of emotional block is probably at play . A number of factors explain why this happens . For example , research on confirmation bias shows IN PRP tend to look for and interpret information in ways WDT conforms to our beliefs . So even if sales are far below expectations , a CEO might reject DT information in projecting good financial forecasts on DT belief IN his actions should lead DT company to do well . In another example at a company where I consulted , a manager refused to acknowledge IN a person hired directly by her was a bad fit , despite everyone else in DT department telling me IN DT employee was holding back DT team . DT manager 's behavior likely resulted from what scholars term DT sunk cost fallacy , a tendency to double down on past decisions even when an objective assessment shows DT decision to be problematic . In both NNS , facing facts MD cause DT CEO or DT manager to feel bad . PRP often prefer to stick our heads into DT sand rather than acknowledge our fault because of our reluctance to experience negative emotions . Research on a phenomenon called DT backfire effect shows PRP tend to dig in our heels when PRP are presented with facts WDT cause PRP to feel bad about our identity , self - worth , worldview or group belonging . In some NNS , presenting DT facts actually backfires , causing NNS to develop a stronger attachment to incorrect beliefs . Moreover , PRP express anger at DT person bringing PRP DT message , a phenomenon researchers term " shoot DT messenger . " EX are JJ other mental errors WDT inhibit business professionals from seeing reality clearly and making good decisions . This is n't to say IN emotions are DT problem . PRP are not . Emotions are fundamentally important to DT human experience , and PRP need both reason and emotion to make good decisions . So rather than offering facts , your goal should be to show emotional leadership and try to figure out what are DT emotional blocks inhibiting your colleague from seeing reality clearly . To do so , use curiosity and subtle questioning to figure out their values and goals and how PRP shape their perception of self - identity . And focus on deploying DT emotional intelligence skill of empathy . Unfortunately , despite extensive research about DT importance of emotional intelligence in professional settings , too JJ organizations still fail to provide such training . Once PRP understand your colleague 's goals and values , try to show PRP share them . Research shows doing so is crucial to conveying knowledge effectively in professional environments . Practice mirroring , or rephrasing in your own words DT points made by DT other person , which demonstrates PRP understand how PRP feel and helps build trust . With a CEO , PRP might talk about how both of PRP share a desire for DT executive to be a truly strong leader . Try to connect DT traits and emotions identified by DT CEO to specific examples of his behavior . And regarding DT manager with DT problematic employee , I had a conversation about how she saw her current and potential future employees playing a role in DT long - term future of DT department she ran . I echoed her anxiety about DT company 's financial performance and concerns about getting funding for future hires , which gave me an additional clue into why she might be protecting DT incompetent employee . After placing yourself on DT same side , building up trust and establishing an emotional connection , move on to DT problem at hand : their emotional block . DT key here is to show them , without arousing a defensive or aggressive response , how their current truth denialism undermines their own goals in DT long term . PRP can help to cite a prominent example of a business leader accepting difficult facts to move forward , such as how former Ford CEO Alan Mulally helped save DT company through repeated course corrections . Research shows IN offering positive reinforcement , without condescension , can be effective with colleagues and bosses alike . So when PRP 're at your next office party and encounter a truth - denying colleague , remember these tips and perhaps PRP wo n't have to spend DT evening with your face buried in your hands .

text: DT NN model Fast Ocean Atmosphere Model ( FOAM ) comprises an atmosphere and ocean component WDT are coupled to each other31 . Although simplified to run a large number of simulated NNS per day , PRP is a complex NN model WDT solves NN - dependent equations describing DT fluid and thermodynamics of DT system . FOAM is a coupled general circulation model , meaning IN PRP uses different circulation models for various aspects of DT simulation . DT Community NNP Model CCM3 is used to simulate DT atmospheric components of DT NN , whereas DT Modular Ocean Model OM3 is used to simulate DT dynamics of DT ocean . DT two components are coupled , meaning IN DT transfer of heat and moisture at DT boundary is calculated , as well as DT distribution of any NN NN . Although DT dynamics of DT NN NN is not included in FOAM , other studies have examined how DT inclusion of sea-ice dynamics changes DT ability of a model to initiate Snowball Earth33,34,35 . In particular , when polar NN caps become large , PRP flow under DT influence of gravity , facilitating DT advance of DT NN front equatorward . This result means IN Snowball - NNP conditions MD onset at a lower value of methane concentration for models with sea-ice dynamics than for those without . In our simulations , which are heavily abstracted , this effect does not VB DT qualitative conclusion IN DT topography of DT NNP ( or more specifically , DT albedo ) affects DT onset of Snowball NNP . FOAM splits DT atmosphere into 18 vertical levels , each with a depth in units of pressure of 55 hPa . DT atmosphere has 40 latitudinal and 48 longitudinal grid points . DT ocean model has a higher resolution , with 128 latitudinal and longitudinal grid points with a maximum of 20 vertical levels depending on DT chosen ocean depth . These levels are not equally spaced , with DT first 14 levels making up DT top 1500 m of DT ocean . For simplicity , DT ocean depth is set to a constant value of 3100 m , CD of DT fixed depths available in DT ocean model . This depth is similar to DT average ocean depth on present - day NNP . DT flat continent had a constant elevation of 20 m above NN level . DT area of DT oceans and continents does not VB when NN from DT oceans is removed to form NN sheets on land . DT depth of DT continental NN sheets does not affect DT continental topography . For simplicity , our simulations share DT same orbital characteristics ( i.e. , orbital rotation rate , eccentricity , obliquity , date of perihelion ) as DT present day , with DT exception of a 360 - day NN . DT solar constant is set to DT predicted solar luminosity 2.4 billion NNS ago of 1100 W m−2 , CD % lower than DT present - day value8 . To compensate for this lower solar constant , DT concentration of greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere was higher than DT present - day values10 . Greenhouse gases including carbon dioxide and methane have been hypothesised to have created a strong greenhouse effect on early NNP . This experiment assumes IN carbon dioxide is DT largest contributor to this NN . CD possible range of carbon dioxide concentrations during DT Proterozoic is 4000 to 80,000 ppmv38 . A value of 10,000 ppmv is chosen , a number within this range and RB used in another NN 17 . DT range of atmospheric methane concentration to test over was decided based on estimates10 and DT results of modelling17 . This range is 1 –100 ppmv . DT size and location of DT continents 2.4 billion NNS ago is uncertain . CD plausible reconstruction places a supercontinent close to DT equator , with a larger meridional dimension than zonal one25 . Another constructed simulation from DT PaleoProterozoic glaciation used a similar series of continents 17 . A box containing DT entire supercontinent occupies about 15 % of NNP ’s total surface area . To replicate this , a rectangular continent ( on a latitude– longitude map projection ) centred on DT equator WDT is 15.6 % of DT total surface area is used in this experiment . This continent extends from 56 °N to 56°S , and has a west–east width of 68° longitude . DT continent surface type is set to desert rock , which has an albedo of 24%39 , replicating DT plant - less continent surface of 2.4 billion NNS ago . DT elevation of DT continent is 20 m above NN level . Little information is available about DT topography of this supercontinent , and so PRP experiment with a number of hypothetical sets of mountain ranges at various latitudes ( Fig. 1 ) . PRP are all placed parallel to latitude lines , and DT pairs are placed DT same distance from DT equator in each hemisphere . DT mountains are approximately Gaussian in profile , have a latitudinal width of 10 grid points , which is equivalent to about 1550 m ( 14° latitude ) at DT equator , and each mountain spans DT entire longitudinal dimension of DT continent . DT mountain dimensions are restricted by DT 128 × 128 grid boxes , which limits how gradual DT slope of DT mountains can be , but PRP have a maximum height of 3000 m . A suite of model simulations varying DT maximum height of DT mountains using DT M40 and M50 configurations showed no sensitivity to DT onset of DT Snowball NNP for mountain heights between 0.5 and 3.0 km . Such results are consistent with those where PRP vary DT albedo of flat terrain at low latitudes and show IN DT effect of DT albedo on NN is greater than DT effect of DT terrain on NN . DT simulations are performed in a NN - slice experiment where DT model is initialised and then run until PRP reaches equilibrium . Each simulation is initialised with DT conditions of DT present NN . DT polar surface temperature is set to 10 °C and DT equatorial temperature to 28 °C . DT conditions being tested cannot maintain such a high surface temperature , and so DT system evolves to a JJ , colder NN . DT NN WDT DT system ends up in primarily depends on DT tested value of methane . Simulations are run for a total of 400 NNS to give DT NN enough NN to evolve to its JJ NN . But , this NN is not sufficient to produce NN sheets of substantial depth to rival DT height of DT mountain range or reach DT stage where DT NN MD flow a substantial distance due to gravity ( which MD not be modeled in FOAM anyway ) . text: NNP 's first moon rover has touched DT lunar surface and left deep traces on its loose soil , NN NN reported on Sunday , several hours after DT country successfully carried out DT NN 's first soft landing of a space probe on DT moon in nearly four decades . DT 140 - kilogram ( 300 - pound ) " Jade Rabbit " rover separated from DT much larger landing vehicle early Sunday , around seven hours after DT unmanned Chang'e 3 space probe touched down on a fairly flat , NNP - facing part of DT moon . PRP VBD DT lander and rover , both bearing Chinese flags , MD take photos of each other on Sunday evening . Later , DT six - wheeled rover will survey DT moon 's geological structure and surface and look for natural resources for three months , while DT lander will carry out scientific explorations at DT landing site for CD NN . DT mission marks DT next stage in an ambitious space program WDT aims to eventually put a Chinese astronaut on DT moon . NNP 's space program is an enormous source of pride for DT country , DT third to carry out a lunar soft landing - which does not damage DT craft and DT equipment PRP carries - after DT NNP NNPS and DT former Soviet Union . As PRP was just hundreds of meters ( yards ) away , DT lander 's camera broadcast images of DT moon 's surface . DT Chang'e 3's solar panels , which are used to absorb sunlight to generate power , opened soon after DT landing . DT mission blasted off from southwest NNP on Dec. 2 on a Long March - 3B carrier rocket . PRP is named after a mythical Chinese goddess of DT moon and DT " Yutu " rover , or " Jade Rabbit " in English , is DT goddess ' pet . NNP 's military - backed space program has made methodical progress in a relatively short NN , although PRP lags far behind DT NNP NNPS and Russia in technology and experience . NNP sent its first astronaut into space in 2003 , becoming DT third nation after Russia and DT NNP NNPS to achieve manned space travel independently . In 2006 , PRP sent its first probe to DT moon . text: Editor 's Note : An original version of this article , written by Natalie Wolchover , appeared on Live NNP Oct. 26 , 2012 . An updated version by Live NNP staff was republished on NNP 30 , 2017 . Members of DT Flat NNP Society claim to believe DT NNP is flat . Walking around on DT NN 's surface , PRP looks and feels flat , so PRP deem all evidence to DT contrary , such as satellite photos of NNP as a sphere , to be fabrications of a " round NNP NN " orchestrated by NASA and other NN agencies . DT belief IN DT NNP is flat has been described as DT ultimate NN theory . According to DT Flat NNP Society 's leadership , its ranks have grown by 200 NNS ( mostly Americans and Britons ) per NN since 2009 . Judging by DT exhaustive effort flat - earthers have invested in fleshing out DT theory on their website , as well as DT staunch defenses of their views PRP offer in NN interviews and on Twitter , PRP MD seem IN these NNS genuinely believe DT NNP is flat . But in DT 21st century , can PRP be serious ? And if so , how is this psychologically possible ? First , a brief tour of DT worldview of a flat - earther : While writing off buckets of concrete evidence IN NNP is spherical , PRP readily accept a laundry list of propositions WDT some MD call ludicrous . DT leading flat - earther theory holds IN NNP is a disc with DT Arctic Circle in DT center and Antarctica , a 150 - foot - tall wall of NN , around DT rim . NASA employees , PRP say , guard this NN wall to prevent NNS from climbing over and falling off DT disc . ( In keeping with their skepticism of NASA , known flat - earther NN theorist Nathan Thompson recently approached a man he VBD was a NASA employee in a Starbucks in mid-May 2017 . In a YouTube video of DT exchange , Thompson , founder of DT Official Flat NNP and Globe Discussion page , shouted IN he had proof DT NNP is flat — apparently saying an astronaut drowning was DT proof — and IN NASA is " lying . " ) NNP 's day and night cycle is explained by positing IN DT sun and moon are spheres measuring 32 miles ( 51 kilometers ) WDT move in circles 3,000 miles ( 4,828 km ) above DT plane of DT NNP . ( Stars , PRP say , move in a plane 3,100 miles up . ) IN spotlights , these celestial spheres illuminate different portions of DT NN in a 24 - hour cycle . Flat - earthers believe EX must RB be an invisible " antimoon " WDT obscures DT moon during lunar eclipses . Furthermore , NNP 's gravity is an illusion , PRP say . Objects do not accelerate downward ; instead , DT disc of NNP accelerates upward at 32 feet per second squared ( 9.8 meters per second squared ) , driven up by a mysterious force called dark NN . Currently , EX is disagreement among flat - earthers about whether or not Einstein 's theory of relativity permits NNP to accelerate upward indefinitely without DT NN eventually surpassing DT speed of light . ( Einstein 's laws apparently still hold in this alternate version of reality . ) As for what lies underneath DT disc of NNP , this is unknown , but most flat - earthers believe PRP is composed of " rocks . " [ Religion and NN : 6 Visions of Earth's Core ] Then , EX 's DT NN theory : Flat - earthers believe photos of DT globe are photoshopped ; GPS devices are rigged to make airplane pilots VB PRP are flying in straight lines around a sphere when PRP are actually flying in circles above a disc . DT motive for NN governments ' concealment of DT true shape of DT NNP has not been ascertained , but flat - earthers believe PRP is probably financial . " In a nutshell , PRP MD logically cost much less to fake a space program than to actually have CD , so those in on DT NN profit from DT funding NASA and other space agencies receive from DT NN , " DT flat - earther website 's FAQ page explains . Who believes DT NNP is flat ? Flat - NN believers are not relegated to DT hidden corners of DT universe : Plenty of celebs have been quite vocal with their beliefs . For instance , on Jan. 25 , 2016 , rapper - singer Bobby Ray Simmons Jr. ( known as B.o.B ) released a track called " Flatline " in which he disses astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson , after DT two had a Twitter battle over DT spherical - ness of DT NN . B.o.B is convinced NNP is flat . A day earlier , DT rapper tweeted : " No matter how high in elevation PRP are ... DT horizon is always eye level ... sorry cadets ... I did n't wanna believe PRP either . " And then EX 's Shaq . In a podcast WDT aired on Feb. 27 , 2017 , former NBA player Shaquille O'Neal proclaimed our home NN is flat , saying IN when he drives from Florida to California " PRP 's flat to me . " Shaq later VBD he was just kidding . [ 5 Scientific Rebuttals of Shaq's Flat - NNP Claims ] Some believers have gotten creative in their quest to prove a flat NN : NN theorist D. Marble posted on YouTube on NNP 1 , 2017 , IN he brought a spirit level aboard a flight from Charlotte , North Carolina to Seattle , Washington , to see whether DT plane 's nose MD dip to " compensate for curvature " of DT NNP , he VBD . On DT video , he VBD : " I recorded a 23 minute and 45 second NN - lapse , which by those measurements means DT plane travelled a little over 203 miles . According to Spherical Trigonometry given to explain DT Heliocentric model , this should have resulted in DT compensation of 5 miles of curvature . As PRP 'll see EX was no measurable compensation for curvature . " ( DT air bubble in his level remained centered , which he VBD proves DT NNP is flat . ) DT theory follows from a mode of thought called DT " Zetetic Method , " an alternative to DT scientific method , developed by a 19th - century flat - earther , in which sensory observations reign supreme . " Broadly , DT method places a lot of emphasis on reconciling empiricism and rationalism , and making logical deductions based on empirical data , " Flat NNP Society vice NN Michael Wilmore , an Irishman , told Life 's Little Mysteries . In Zetetic astronomy , DT perception IN NNP is flat leads to DT deduction WDT PRP must actually be flat ; DT antimoon , NASA NN and all DT rest of PRP are just rationalizations for how DT might work in practice . Those details make DT flat - earthers ' theory so elaborately absurd PRP sounds IN a joke , but JJ of its supporters genuinely consider PRP a more plausible model of astronomy than DT NN found in textbooks . In short , PRP are n't kidding . [ 50 Amazing Facts About NNP NNP ] " DT question of belief and sincerity is CD WDT comes up a lot , " Wilmore VBD . " If I had to guess , I MD probably say IN at least some of our members see DT Flat NNP Society and Flat NNP Theory as a kind of epistemological exercise , whether as a critique of DT scientific method or as a kind of ' solipsism for beginners . ' EX are RB probably some who thought DT certificate MD be kind of funny to have on their wall . DT being VBN , I VBP JJ members personally , and I am fully convinced of their belief . " Wilmore counts himself among DT true believers . " My own convictions are a result of philosophical introspection and a considerable body of data WDT I have personally observed , and which I am still compiling , ” he VBD . Strangely , Wilmore and DT society 's NN , a 35 - NN - old Virginia - born Londoner named Daniel Shenton , both VBP DT evidence for JJ NN is strong , despite much of this evidence coming from satellite data gathered by NASA , DT kingpin of DT " round NNP NN . " PRP RB accept evolution and most other mainstream tenets of NN . As inconceivable as their belief system seems , PRP does n't really surprise experts . Karen Douglas , a psychologist at DT University of Kent in DT NNP Kingdom who studies DT psychology of NN theories , says flat - earthers ' beliefs cohere with those of other NN theorists she has studied . " PRP seems to me IN these NNS do generally believe IN DT NNP is flat . I 'm not seeing anything WDT sounds as if PRP 're just putting DT idea out RB for any other reason , " Douglas told Live NNP . She VBD all NN theories share a basic thrust : PRP present an alternative theory about an important issue or event , and construct an ( often ) vague explanation for why someone is covering up DT " true " version of events . " CD of DT major points of appeal is IN PRP explain a big event but often without VBG into details , " she VBD . " A lot of DT power lies in DT fact IN PRP are vague . " DT self - assured way in which NN theorists stick to their story imbues DT story with special appeal . After all , flat - earthers are more adamant IN DT NNP is flat than most NNS are IN DT NNP is round ( probably because DT rest of PRP feel PRP have nothing to prove ) . " If PRP 're faced with a minority viewpoint WDT is put forth in an intelligent , seemingly well - informed way , and when DT proponents do n't deviate from these strong opinions PRP have , PRP can be very influential . PRP call DT minority influence , " Douglas VBD . In a NN published online March 5 , 2014 , in DT American Journal of Political NNP , Eric Oliver and Tom Wood , political NNS at DT University of Chicago , found IN about half of Americans endorse at least CD NN theory , from DT notion IN 9/11 was an inside job to DT JFK NN . " JJ NNS are willing to believe JJ ideas WDT are directly in contradiction to a dominant cultural narrative , " Oliver told Live NNP . He says conspiratorial belief stems from a human tendency to perceive unseen forces at work , known as magical thinking . [ Top 10 Unexplained Phenomena ] However , flat - earthers do n't fit entirely snugly in this general picture . Most NN theorists adopt JJ fringe theories , even ones WDT contradict each other . Meanwhile , flat - earthers ' only hang - up is DT shape of DT NNP . " If PRP were IN other NN theorists , PRP should be exhibiting a tendency toward a lot of magical thinking , such as believing in UFOs , ESP , ghosts , DT Devil , or other unseen , intentional forces , " Oliver wrote in an email . " PRP does n't sound IN PRP do , which makes them very anomalous relative to most Americans who believe in NN theories . " Editor 's Note : This article was first published on Oct. 26 , 2012 , and then updated on NNP 30 , 2017 .

text: Ever since DT NN spread across DT NN , suspicions have proliferated about what is really VBG on . Questions arose about DT origins of DT NN , DT way PRP makes NNS sick , DT mitigation measures taken , DT suspended civil rights , DT connection with 5G , possible cures and medications , and about DT role of Bill Gates in PRP all . These ideas are commonly framed as NN theories . Yes , PRP MD all distrust DT mainstream narrative and share certain characteristics , but PRP are not CD of a kind . PRP take so JJ different forms and have such varying degrees of plausibility WDT I question how useful PRP is to bracket them all under DT same banner . To understand and effectively respond to DT various NN NN theories , PRP need to dig deeper . Listen to our Expert guide to NN theories , a series by DT Conversation ’s DT Anthill podcast . DT dominant explanation for DT popularity of NN NN theories is remarkably similar : these dark and unsettling ideas help NNS make sense of a complex and uncertain NN . PRP provide sufficiently large explanations for tragic events , and give back feelings of agency and control . Since these ideas sometimes have real - NN consequences , from 5G masts set on fire to ignoring NN mitigation measures , various commentators condemn these NN theories . Officials now need not only fight a NN pandemic , so their story goes , but an infodemic too . DT problem with DT generalising approach is threefold . PRP does not account for DT motivations of NN theorists themselves ; nor for DT different forms and plausibility of DT various NN theories ; nor for their relations with various political and societal issues . Providing uniform explanations for NN theories fails to seriously consider their contents or underlying concerns . Similarly , PRP leaves untouched how certain NN theories are weaponised in various propaganda wars . A closer look at these theories or – even better – actual engagement with DT NNS propagating them , shows NN theories not so much as a uniform coping strategy in unsettling times , but rather as a wide array of cultural expressions . These include suspicions of planned efforts to impose mass vaccinations , doubts about DT origins of DT NN , expressions of disgust for DT ruling elite , geopolitical insinuations , pointers to an inflated NN panic , DT scapegoating of certain societal groups ( Chinese or Jews ) , critiques on DT methods and measurements of NN - CD symptoms and deaths , discontents with powerful philanthropists , worries about DT expansion of authoritarian NN policies , or concerns about corporate intrusion in DT search for effective medications . This means , as I argue in my recent book , IN PRP need to focus on DT meaning , diversity and context of different NN theories , as well as DT NNS who subscribe to them . During my ethnographic research projects on contemporary NN cultures , I encountered a wide variety of NNS , ideas , practices and communities . Because NN NN theories have yet to settle down , let ’s turn to some markedly different NN theory subcultures WDT have been around for longer . PRP illustrate how different NN theories and DT NNS who subscribe to them can be . Starting with DT anti-vaccination movement – of great concern to JJ . Because JJ anti-vaxxers in DT western NN are highly educated urban hipsters , PRP is difficult to reject them as ignorant deplorables . Read more : Throwing NN at anti-vaxxers just makes them more hardline Next to critiques of Big Pharma , NN hesitancy is informed by holistic and naturalistic ideas about NN and DT body ; ideas rooted in alternative medicine and NNP Age spiritualities . In these subcultural worlds , emotions , feelings , experiences , testimonies and social relations are often more important guides than scientific knowledge . Rather different are those active in DT 9/11 Truth Movement . Broadly interested in geopolitics and NN cover ups , these NNS challenge DT mainstream narrative of 9/11 with competing factual and scientific evidence . PRP advance visual proofs and mathematical calculations of why DT towers MD not have collapsed by DT planes , but indicate controlled demolition instead . These activists profess knowledge of physics , construction and explosives , and ground their legitimacy in this expertise . PRP are focused on “ exposing DT official lies ” . IN true activists , PRP wish revolutionary NN , “ to end DT regime and illicit power structures responsible for 9/11 ” . DT list of markedly different NN subcultures MD VB on . VB of DT Flat Earthers , who deploy various scientific methodologies and perform actual experiments in DT outside NN to show IN PRP is not a globe but a Truman Show - JJ dome . Read more : I watched an entire Flat NNP Convention for my research – here 's what I learnt Favouring rational thinking and scientific methods is , however , no guarantee for brotherhood . 9/11 Truthers generally stay away from them as DT MD harm their credibility . QAnon followers , meanwhile , deploy various strategies to interpret secret messages from their anonymous leader Q . These are known as “ crumbs ” or “ drops ” and are all part of their search for truth and redemption . Sharing JJ characteristics of millenarian NNP Religious Movements , QAnon followers anticipate a violent apocalypse when DT NN will be dismantled and followers will be vindicated . This brief overview already shows DT wide variety of themes , ideologies , plausibilities , origins , NNS and potential dangers of different NN theory subcultures . Regarding NN theories as CD uniform category obscures all these differences and DT various societal dynamics in which NN theories play a role . This inevitably leads to simplistic explanations . Further , PRP has DT political effect of collectively stigmatising certain ideas and NNS – and prematurely excluding them from legitimate political debate . NN theories are not uniform – nor should our engagements with them be .

text: 1 . He was named for a Shawnee chief . William Tecumseh Sherman ( known as “ Cump ” to his friends ) was born in Lancaster , Ohio , on February 8 , 1820 . His father gave him his unusual middle name as a nod to DT Shawnee chief Tecumseh , a magnetic leader who built a confederacy of Ohio Indian tribes and fought with DT British during DT War of 1812 . A relative later wrote IN Sherman ’s father always shook off concerns IN he had given his son a “ savage Indian name ” by arguing , “ Tecumseh was a great warrior . ” After losing his father at DT age of 9 , Sherman was sent to live with Thomas Ewing , a renowned Ohio attorney and family friend who later served as a senator and DT U.S. Secretary of DT Treasury . DT young Sherman grew close with Ewing ’s eldest daughter , Ellen , and PRP regularly corresponded through letters during his tenure at West Point and his early military career . Following a long engagement , DT two were married in 1850 in a Washington , D.C. , ceremony attended by DT likes of NNP Zachary Taylor , Henry Clay and Daniel Webster . DT couple later had eight NNS , two of whom died from sickness while Sherman was serving in DT Civil War . 3 . He played a role in triggering DT California Gold Rush . While stationed in San Francisco in 1848 , Sherman helped convince military governor Richard Mason to investigate CD of DT first reported gold discoveries in California . He was on DT scene during a mission WDT confirmed DT existence of rich gold deposits along DT Sacramento River , and later penned DT letter Mason sent to Washington relaying their findings . Coupled with other early discoveries , Sherman and Mason ’s fact - finding mission inadvertently set off a wave of gold fever in DT NNP NNPS . In less than a NN , California ’s population more than quadrupled after thousands of speculators journeyed west to make their fortune . 4 . He had a rocky career in business . After missing out on combat in DT Mexican American War and enduring a series of lackluster assignments , Sherman left DT military in 1853 to run a San Francisco bank . While he proved a competent businessman , DT move corresponded with DT bursting of DT Gold Rush bubble , and his branch collapsed in DT ensuing financial hysteria . Sherman was left humiliated , in part because JJ military friends — including future Civil War generals Braxton Bragg and George Thomas — had entrusted money to him . To help cover their losses , he eventually liquidated some $ 20,000 worth of his own assets . A despondent Sherman left DT banking NN for good in 1858 . He later signed on as DT first superintendent of DT Louisiana NNP Seminary of Learning and Military Academy — DT school WDT MD become Louisiana NNP University . 5 . He MD have suffered a nervous breakdown during DT Civil War . Following a promising performance at July 1861 ’s First Battle of Bull Run , Sherman was promoted to brigadier general and eventually given command of Union troops in Kentucky and Tennessee . Sherman had n’t wanted DT role , and in short order , DT weight of its responsibilities took a toll on his mental NN . He vastly overestimated DT size of Confederate forces in DT region , griped in his dispatches to NNP Lincoln and appeared constantly on edge . Historians have since speculated IN he was suffering from depression or nervous exhaustion , but whatever its cause , DT general ’s bizarre behavior eventually found its way into DT papers , some of which labeled him insane . Sherman requested to be relieved from his position in early November 1861 , and remained sidelined until DT December , when he was reassigned to DT Western Theater . He was later placed under DT command of General Ulysses S. Grant , and following a crucial victory at April 1862 ’s Battle of Shiloh , DT pair forged a winning partnership WDT lasted for DT remainder of DT war . 6 . He cut off all lines of communication during DT march to DT NN . Sherman ’s March to DT NNP was CD of DT most stunning operations of DT Civil War , yet few NNS outside of Georgia knew anything about PRP while PRP was underway . Before leaving Atlanta , Sherman intentionally severed all telegraph links to DT North to help shroud his moves in secrecy . DT plan meant DT Confederates MD only speculate about where Sherman and his 60,000 - strong rampaging army were headed , but PRP RB left DT Union high command in DT dark about DT mission ’s progress . When asked about Sherman ’s whereabouts , a worried NNP Lincoln is VBN to have responded , “ PRP VBP what hole he went in , but PRP do n’t VB what hole he will come out of . ” Sherman MD finally reappear on December 22 , having slashed and burned his way through DT heart of Georgia . Upon reaching DT NN , he sent a famous message to Lincoln WDT read : “ I beg to present PRP as a Christmas gift DT city of Savannah . ” 7 . He offered lenient terms of surrender to defeated Confederates . Despite his reputation for “ hard ” warfare , Sherman MD RB be surprisingly — perhaps even naively — generous in victory . When he accepted Confederate General Joseph E. Johnston ’s surrender in Durham , North Carolina , in April 1865 , Sherman offered very forgiving terms WDT granted general amnesty to DT rebels and even allowed for DT Southern NNS to immediately re-enter DT Union upon swearing an oath of allegiance . DT sweeping agreement enraged U.S. Secretary of War Edwin Stanton , who rejected PRP out of hand and criticized Sherman for giving up “ all DT advantages PRP had gained from DT war . ” Joseph Johnston was forced to surrender under more conventional terms , but he went on to become a good friend to Sherman , and even served as a pallbearer at his old adversary ’s funeral in 1891 . 8 . He RB used his “ scorched NN ” brand of warfare against Native Americans . After DT Civil War , Sherman was given command of DT Military Division of DT Mississippi and tasked with pacifying DT Plains Indians during DT building of DT transcontinental railroad . Sherman took to DT job with characteristic vigor , orchestrating DT relocation of DT tribes and warning their chiefs , “ PRP cannot stop DT locomotive any more than PRP can stop DT sun or DT moon , and PRP must submit . ” To help break DT natives ’ spirit , Sherman took a page from his Civil War playbook and set his sights on destroying CD of their primary resources : DT buffalo . Beginning in DT late 1860s , he organized DT killing of some 5 million bison in an effort to drive DT creatures to DT brink of extinction . Sherman continued his harsh policies after becoming commanding general of DT army in 1869 , and by DT 1870s , he had helped force most of DT Plains peoples onto reservations . 9 . He repeatedly declined to run for NN . Sherman made no secret of his disdain for politics , once quipping IN he MD rather spend four NNS in jail than in DT White House . Nevertheless , during DT 1870s and 1880s , Washington D.C. , movers and shakers often tried — and failed — to convince him to make a run at DT presidency . Sherman tried to stamp out DT speculation once and for all in 1884 , when he turned down an invitation to become DT Republican candidate by saying , “ I will not accept if nominated and will not serve if elected . ” His unequivocal response has since become famous in political circles , where similar flat refusals are often dubbed “ Shermanesque statements . ”

text: War is not about " nation building " " bringing democracy to dictatorships " " stopping terror " or any other claptrap . War is about killing human beings . PRP see , I am a killer . I have participated in killing other human beings . DT Vietnamese soldiers were trying to kill PRP . PRP were all young and brainwashed , and were n't smart enough ( yet ) to VB what PRP were being asked to do . I was on a firebase next to Highway NNP , a main thoroughfare in south Vietnam WDT ran through a portion of DT country known as DT Elephant 's Ear . PRP was called DT Elephant 's Ear because of DT shape of DT border 's protrusion into Cambodia . Ours was an artillery station WDT carried a battery ( 6 ) of 105 mm howitzers and a battery of 155 mm howitzers . These are very big guns . PRP were RB camp to others : mortar squads , infantry units and sundry support services . This was in 1968 , DT NN of DT " Tet Offensive " , DT great push by DT North Vietnamese Army and DT Viet Cong ( civilian anti-American guerrilla forces ) to rid DT country of DT " foreign invaders " ( PRP ) . PRP was CD peaceful Sunday evening in March , a cooler day in DT hottest part of DT NN . Everyone was VBG on their usual routines of duty and maintenence when DT shit hit DT fan . Mortars began to whistle in . DT cry , " Incoming , incoming " went over DT landing zone 's p.a. system . Everyone went to DT trenches , or found whatever cover PRP MD . I was caught out in DT open . My only alternative was lay flat on DT hard NN , not far from DT trench dug for our unit . Shells rained down all around . Explosions went off everywhere , and my unit remained in DT trench . I screamed " PRP better VB up here and do something , " to DT guys in DT trench . I thought PRP were cowering . PRP were not cowering . PRP had not received orders yet , and PRP does nothing in DT military without orders . Nearby , CD or two of DT fire pits , where excess round charges were kept , went up in pillars of fire . Gaining some self control , I went to DT NN supply and poured NN on DT fire pits WDT were close to my unit to prevent them from VBG up in flames . DT other members of my unit were still in DT foxhole awaiting orders . DT orders came . " Battery , adjust . Shell H.E. , lot six , fuse NN , deflection 1540 , azimuth 320 . " This told DT unit how to adjust DT aim of DT huge guns . PRP all went about our tasks of preparing DT big guns efficiently , heedless in this hour of necessity of DT death whistling nearby , blind to everything but our task . Our hope only was group survival . This violence and shelling and death went on all night . As various units ran out of ordinance , PRP went through open areas to deliver fifty pound rounds on our shoulders . PRP were aware of , but not reacting to , DT threat of instant death or injury all around PRP . After a number of hours ( who can say how JJ or how few ) exhaustion set in , and me and a buddy crawled into a culvert to sleep , DT battle still raging all around , but PRP were too exhausted to care . When I awoke , all was quiet , but DT aftermath of DT battle was RB . EX was devastation all around . I found IN DT perimeter had been broached a number of times but superior firepower had stopped DT NNS trying to break in , leaving their bodies to pile up inbetween DT outer ring of wire and DT inner . EX were bodies all around , or parts of bodies , or bodies blown in half , or bodies with heads split open looking for all DT NN IN some kind of watermelon , with their bright red insides . Hundreds of parts or half or whole bodies . Numbers impossible to estimate accurately , due to DT dismembered NN of DT dead . EX were probably hundreds . I stopped and gazed down at DT corpse of a young boy , a dead N.V.A. soldier , and I saw someone very much IN myself . Unlike others nearby , he was whole . No apparant cause of death visible . I stared into his face , wondering about him . What kind of person was he ? Who was DT family he had left behind ? Now I VBP IN his family MD be left wondering forever whatever happened to him , because PRP MD never have his remains . PRP , after NNS of hope and greif , MD have to either assume him dead , or maybe lost , him only a memory . I still see his face these JJ NNS later , a brother unto me , me alive , him dead . He was as if sleeping , still free from obvious corruption if not for DT pallor of his skin or DT flies moving in and out of his nose . Shortly after dawn , PRP were called to order . Some names did not answer to roll call . No explanations at DT NN were forthcoming . Tasks were given out . " Who wants body detail ? " VBD DT sargeant . Only CD or two volunteered . " Ok , PRP , PRP , PRP , PRP and PRP , VB out RB and clean up . " DT men were divided into teams , given wheelbarrows , and were sent out to bring DT bodies and parts to a specific place . DT went on all morning . PRP took a few days for DT bulldozer to be shipped in by flying crane , and when PRP arrived , a giant pit was dug and all DT human remains WDT were collectable were buried RB . Our dead , about seven , were shipped home to DT NNS . JJ of DT enemy dead were not able to be collected . PRP were in enemy territory , and were left to DT enemy . JJ had been wounded and crawled to hidden areas in DT surrounding jungle where PRP died later . Some were near unexploded ordinance and were extremely dangerous . DT end result was DT stench of death . God , what a stench . PRP was all - pervading . Another result was a plague of flies . PRP had to eat anyway , knowing IN DT flies WDT were living on DT human carnage were DT same ones WDT were landing on your sandwich . EX were clouds of white termite - IN flies WDT presumably fed on DT dead , and these were called " body bugs " and were avoided as much as possible . DT white flies were probably taking DT blame for DT other , more ordinary flies , who were more easily tolerated but who were in actuality RB feeding off DT same " table . " With NN and burial , DT plague of flies and DT stench lessened . As DT weeks went by , DT battle was just another psychological scar torn through DT distance of self , to be buried in DT press of duty , to emerge NNS later , leaving PRP weeping unexpectedly at jovial occasions , much to DT puzzlement of your family or friends . Some of DT enemy had gotten through DT perimeter , and had in a suicidal paroxysm , tried to do as much damage as possible before being killed . CD private , recently promoted to " temporary corporal " in lieu of his later promised advancement , ( PRP called them " candy stripers " as PRP wore a black band with their future rank on PRP ) was able to put an end to CD of these invaders . He had shot him through DT back , DT automatic weapons fire ( m16 ) moving through his body in a pattern , making a series of holes through from DT back to DT front of DT body IN buttons on a jacket . This individual took polaroid photos of his " trophy " and gave them to me for safe keeping . Why he had selected me for this task was n't clear , but I was DT wrong person to give them to . I buried them , repelled by DT concept of human dead as trophy material . I got into a big fight when he tried to VB his photos and I VBD IN I had " lost " them . Lots of others were not so squeamish , however . Some kept photos , or articles of clothing , weapons , medals or body parts , mostly ears , dried in DT sun to a leather IN texture , from DT ones PRP killed . I remember Sgt. Hirshberg telling me IN he had to boil a belt WDT he got from a N.V.A. soldier 's corpse for two days to VB DT stink of death out of PRP . Soon after , Sgt. Hirshberg himself was found dead . Perhaps an N.V.A. soldier boiled his belt . DT kind of thing WDT was as common as bread , then . Death . Human beings lowered to DT basest impulses within themselves , killed other human beings for DT thrill of PRP , easily and without thought as easily as PRP MD fish in your pocket for NN to take DT bus . Killing is legal , RB . PRP MD VB to prison here , or perhaps VB DT death penalty for DT killing and and DT mutiliation . In Vietnam PRP was sport . No morality . No ethics about who shall die and live . Nope . Death was sport . Or revenge . Often , DT enemy MD horribly mutilate our dead , to instill terror or just to say " fuck PRP " in DT worst way possible . PRP MD retaliate in kind . I remember a group of infantry men telling how PRP cut off DT penises of their enemy and shoved them in DT mouths of DT newly dead as a kind of " fuck PRP back " gesture . Death then becomes a kind of communication , a grisly " postcard " if PRP will . Forget about right and wrong . PRP does n't exist . Only survival , hatred , revenge and killing . In DT crucible of war , PRP all boils down to DT lowest denominators . EX is little mercy . When PRP human beings are placed in a kill or be killed situation , PRP can only become killers . PRP see our friends die and revenge is our only outlet . PRP make DT most of DT situation by becoming DT most beautiful artistic killer possible . Right and wrong ? A just war ? DT military was engaged in a psychological war as well , entreating by helicopter equipped with speakers for DT enemy to " give up , give up . PRP will be treated fairly and those of PRP who are innocent will be sent back to your families " . PRP flew over DT countryside calling out in DT Vietnamese language , " Chiu hoi , chiu hoi ... " PRP RB dropped leaflets with DT same message by DT thousands over DT land . I saw firsthand DT benefits of this " mercy program . " I was watching as an N.V.A. soldier was cornered in DT nearby countryside and had decided to give in to DT cries of " chiu hoi " WDT our soldiers were making . He put his weapons on DT ground . He stood up with his hands behind his head . A burst of gunfire and a " Take DT , motherfucker " and PRP was over . PRP was n't a puzzle to me why DT program met with little success . I have n't even gotten to DT non combatants yet . Men , women and NNS , innocents all , falling to DT stray bullet , being blown apart by DT hidden mine , town destroyed by DT misplaced bomb , or worse . PRP seems IN PRP have forgotten about Lt. William Calley and DT village of Mi Lai . William Calley was court martialed and found guilty of DT massacre of a number of innocent men women and NNS . He rounded up DT inhabitants of this small hamlet , collected them together as possible enemy collaborators and ordered them all to be killed , burning DT village after . DT men who refused to fire upon DT NNS who played a major part in his conviction . William Calley was an offering to DT millions who were protesting DT war here at home . JJ others followed his methods and were not punished for their crimes . PRP suffer only DT nightmares WDT doubtless still haunt them . PRP is estimated by some IN CD to three million non-combatants , civilians , died as a direct or indirect result of DT Viet Nam conflict . I must believe IN EX are other ways . I must believe IN PRP can find other means . To VB otherwise MD be anathematic to my very life , and I MD either retreat into irreversible insanity or suicide , as so JJ of my fellows have done . Is PRP any wonder IN DT war veteran has DT highest rate of " non-functionality " : drug addiction , alcholism and suicide , of any other group ? Do PRP VB IN war veterans comprise DT largest part of DT homeless ? I VBP why PRP " drop out " . For NNS , I was unemployed , way , way into drugs . I found PRP impossible to work a job WDT paid taxes to DT Death Machine . By DT grace of God I escaped DT fate of so JJ , to be reduced to a voiceless suffering shell of what I MD be . I came back alive from this cauldron of death to tell PRP IN EX must be another way . So JJ others did not come back , will not come back , and I speak for them . Let PRP pray for peace .

text: Asian stocks ended DT week with a mixed session Friday , but off their earlier lows . Japan closed almost flat despite making sharp losses in DT morning . South Korea finished just slightly lower . Shares in exporters dropped , derailing a rally in Asian markets DT previous day WDT saw Japanese stocks post their biggest daily gain in six NNS on optimism about DT JJ economy . DT financial sector RB slid after Moody 's Investors Service on Thursday cut its top " AAA " rating on a unit of FGIC Corp by six notches , raising fears about selloffs in DT debt guaranteed by DT U.S. bond insurer . Bond insurers face billions of dollars in payouts after PRP guaranteed repackaged subprime mortgages and other risky debt . text: Environmental groups have blasted draft text of DT Trans - Pacific Partnership ( TPP ) released yesterday by WikiLeaks as potentially devastating to DT environment and wildlife . DT massive 12 - nation free trade agreement has been negotiated in secret now for almost four NNS , and DT information release by WikiLeaks shows IN key environmental safeguards in DT agreement are being stripped away , including a ban on shark fining and illegal logging , as well as legally - enforced pollution regulations . “ If DT environment chapter is finalized as written in this leaked document , NNP Obama ’s environmental trade record MD be worse than George W. Bush ’s , ” Michael Brune , executive director of DT Sierra Club , VBD bluntly . “ This draft chapter falls flat on every single CD of our issues — oceans , fish , wildlife , and forest protections — and in fact , rolls back on DT progress made in past free trade pacts . ” DT TPP has been CD of DT Obama Administration ’s top priorities for DT Pacific region , but green groups say IN PRP looks IN DT administration has given significant ground on crucial environmental issues in a desire to VB DT deal signed , which has already run past its goal of finalization by 2013 . JJ past free trade agreements have wholly lacked any legally - binding environmental safeguards , but in 2007 then U.S. NNP George W. Bush struck an agreement with democrats to include environmental safeguards in all future free trade agreements . However , environmentalists are now concerned IN this requirement will bring about little environmental gains in DT TPP . For example , DT draft text completely lacks any enforcement . An analysis by Jane Kelsey with DT University of Aukland finds IN DT draft text “ falls far below DT standards ” set by DT U.S. Congress in 2007 . “ Negotiators are allowing a unique opportunity to protect wildlife and support legal sustainable trade of renewable resources to slip through their fingers . these nations account for more than a quarter of JJ trade in fish and wood products and PRP have a responsibility to address trade ’s impact on wildlife crime , illegal logging , and overfishing , ” VBD Carter Roberts , NNP of NNP Wildlife Fund ( WWF ) , who called DT information leak a “ peek behind DT curtain . ” According to DT release by WikiLeaks , DT TPP as PRP stands does not even require member nations to uphold commitments to JJ environmental agreements , such DT Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species ( CITES ) . Criticism of DT TPP goes well - beyond environmental issues , however . JJ groups have complained of DT investor - NN settlement agreement in DT plan WDT allows corporations to sue NNS when contracts are breached . Critics of this model say PRP benefits foreign investors as PRP expense of human rights , working conditions , and DT environment . Negotiations have RB been blasted for being held completely behind closed doors , with some U.S. Senators complaining IN multinational corporations are privy to DT negotiations while DT U.S. Congress is left in DT dark . In addition to DT U.S. , TPP member NNS include Australia , NNP Zealand , Canada , Mexico , Chile , Japan , Singapore , Malaysia , Brunei , Vietnam and Peru .
