text: Pluto 's surface hosts blades of NN WDT soar to DT height of skyscrapers — and researchers have narrowed down exactly how DT dramatic features form . According to JJ research , DT blades are made mostly of methane NN , and form similarly to ( much shorter ) spikes of snow and NN on NNP . When DT NNP Horizons spacecraft flew by Pluto in July 2015 , researchers observed an astonishing variety of terrains across DT dwarf NN . Flat and cratered areas on DT dwarf NN 's surface point to its varied geological activity , composition and evolution over NN . DT jagged spikes targeted in this latest NN form at DT highest altitudes on Pluto 's surface , near its atmosphere , where methane is able to freeze out of DT atmosphere — skipping straight from solid to gas without ever becoming liquid . When DT NN is a bit warmer , parts of DT methane NN sublimate away , heading straight back to gas form , according to DT JJ NN . " When PRP realized IN bladed terrain consists of tall deposits of methane NN , PRP asked ourselves why PRP forms all of these ridges , as opposed to just being big blobs of NN on DT ground , " Jeffrey Moore , a NNP Horizons team member and lead researcher on DT JJ work , VBD in a statement . " PRP turns out IN Pluto undergoes NN variation and sometimes , when Pluto is a little warmer , DT methane NN begins to basically ' evaporate ' away . " On NNP , such structures are called penitentes , and stretch just a few meters in height in high - altitude regions along DT NN 's equator . Slight irregularities can turn into dramatic spikes of snow as DT structures ' surfaces concentrate sunlight toward certain regions , sublimating some parts faster than others and leading to longer and spikier forms . DT presence of penitentes on Pluto tell researchers more about how its surface and air temperature VBP over NN , according to DT statement , and DT link between methane 's presence and high elevations can help researchers map DT dwarf NN 's topography in places where PRP have lower - resolution views . text: Israel 's Beresheet lunar lander captured this selfie , which was released March 5 , when DT spacecraft was 23,363.5 miles ( 37,600 kilometers ) from NNP . Australia is clearly visible . Israel 's first lunar lander has notched another important milestone — its first in - space selfie . DT newly released photo shows DT robotic lander , known as Beresheet , looking back at NNP from a distance of 23,363.5 miles ( 37,600 kilometers ) . " In DT photo of NNP , taken during a slow spin of DT spacecraft , Australia is clearly visible , " mission team members wrote in an image description today ( March 5 ) . " RB seen is DT plaque installed on DT spacecraft , with DT Israeli flag and DT inscriptions ' Am Yisrael Chai ' and ' Small Country , Big Dreams . ' " DT Hebrew phrase " Am Yisrael chai " translates as , " DT nation of Israel lives , " or , " DT NNS of Israel live . " Several more such maneuvers are on DT docket in DT near future . If all goes according to plan , Beresheet — which means " in DT beginning " in Hebrew — will be captured into lunar orbit on April 4 , then drop softly onto DT moon 's surface on April 11 . DT landing MD be a major achievement . To date , DT only entities to pull off a soft lunar touchdown are three superpower nations : DT Soviet Union , DT NNP NNPS and NNP . SpaceIL began as a competitor in DT Google Lunar X Prize , a $ 30 million race WDT asked privately funded teams to land a robot on DT moon and have PRP perform a few basic tasks . DT contest ended last NN without a winner , but SpaceIL and several other former teams continued shooting for DT moon . DT entire Beresheet mission , including launch , costs about $ 100 million , mission team members have VBN . Beresheet 's ride through space has n't been entirely smooth . Shortly after liftoff , team members noticed IN DT craft 's star trackers , which are critical to navigation , are susceptible to blinding by solar radiation . And Beresheet 's computer performed a reset unexpectedly just before DT craft 's second planned engine burn . Mission team members have overcome these issues . For example , PRP traced DT computer reset to cosmic radiation and firmed up Beresheet 's defenses with a software update . DT lander was then able to execute DT engine burn , which put Beresheet back on track toward DT moon . text: On March 11 , 2011 , an earthquake measuring 9.0 on DT Richter scale struck Japan , bringing a destructive tsunami along with PRP . CD of DT sites most affected by DT devastation was DT Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant , which experienced a partial meltdown two days after DT quake . DT incident is being called DT worst nuclear accident since DT 1986 disaster at Chernobyl , and PRP has shown few signs of slowing down . Click ahead to see 11 other history - making nuclear disasters . By Daniel Bukszpan , Special To CNBC.com Posted 16 Mar 2011 On April 26 , 1986 , a reactor at DT Chernobyl power plant in Ukraine exploded , causing DT worst nuclear accident DT NN has seen . PRP sent a plume into DT atmosphere with radioactive fallout WDT was 400 times greater than DT released in DT atomic bombing of Hiroshima . DT plume drifted across much of DT western Soviet Union . Parts of Eastern , Northern and Western Europe were RB affected . Fifty NNS were killed at DT reactor site at DT NN of DT accident , but DT number of NNS across Europe who found themselves in DT path of DT radioactive plume is anybody ’s guess . A report from DT NNP Nuclear Association ( http://world-nuclear.org/info/chernobyl/inf07.html) claims IN over CD million NNS MD have been exposed to radiation . However , DT full extent of DT damage is unlikely to ever be known . Until March 2011 , DT worst nuclear accident in DT history of Japan took place at a uranium facility in Tokaimura on September 30 , 1999 . Three workers were attempting to mix nitric acid and uranium to form DT fuel uranyl nitrate . However , DT workers unknowingly used seven times DT allowable limit of uranium , and DT reactor MD n’t stop DT solution from reaching critical mass . DT three technicians were exposed to massive gamma and neutron radiation poisoning , which killed two of them . More than 70 other workers received high doses of radiation as well . After an investigation , DT International Atomic NNP Agency saidthat DT accident had been caused by " human error and serious breaches of safety principles . " DT worst nuclear accident in U.S. history took place on March 28 , 1979 at DT Three Mile Island plant in Pennsylvania . A cooling system failed , causing a partial meltdown , but a full meltdown was averted and EX were no fatalities . However , despite DT positive outcome and despite DT passage of more than 30 NNS , DT incident remains fresh in DT minds of those who are old enough to remember PRP . DT effect of DT accident on DT U.S. nuclear power industry was major . DT meltdown gave JJ Americans second thoughts about DT risks of using nuclear power , and DT construction of JJ reactors , which had been steadily increasing since DT 1960s , slowed substantially . Over 50 nuclear plant construction projects were cancelled in just four NNS , and DT number of ongoing projects declined from 1980 until 1998 . CD of DT worst nuclear contamination incidents in DT NN took place in Goiania , Brazil . A radiotherapy institute in DT city had relocated , leaving behind a teletherapy unit WDT still contained cesium chloride . On September 13 , 1987 , two scavengers found DT unit , carted PRP away in a wheelbarrow and sold PRP to a junkyard . DT owner invited friends and family to see DT glowing blue material inside , inadvertently exposing them to radiation . All of them then went their separate ways and irradiated friends and family all over DT city . In all , 245 NNS were exposed to radiation and four NNS died . According to Eliana Amaral of DT International Atomic NNP Agency , CD good thing came out of DT catastrophe . " Before DT 1987 accident … EX was no awareness IN sources must be controlled from ‘ cradle to grave ’ and to prevent DT NN accessing them . After DT accident these concepts were fostered . " On July 4 , 1961 , DT Soviet submarine K - CD was in DT North Atlantic Ocean when PRP developed a radioactive leak . PRP had no coolant system in place to stop DT reactor from overheating and exploding , so with no other options , DT crew entered DT reactor compartment and fixed DT leak , exposing themselves to levels of radiation in DT process WDT were certain to kill them . All eight crew members who had fixed DT leak died of radiation poisoning within three weeks of DT incident . DT rest of DT crew , DT submarine and DT ballistic missiles WDT PRP carried RB became contaminated . When K - CD met up with DT submarine WDT had intercepted its distress call , PRP was towed to base , which PRP contaminated . Then , as PRP was repaired over DT course of two NNS , DT surrounding area and DT repair workers RB became contaminated . Twenty of DT submarine ’s original crew RB died of radiation sickness over DT next few NNS . In DT NNS following NNP War II , DT NNP NNPS was DT foremost nuclear power in DT NN . In an effort to catch up , DT Soviet Union quickly built nuclear power plants and cut corners in order to keep pace . DT Mayak plant near DT city of Kyshtym had a tank with a substandard cooling system as a result , and when PRP failed , DT increasing temperature caused an explosion WDT contaminated almost 500 miles of DT surrounding area . Initially , DT Soviet NN did n’t disclose what had happened , but CD week later PRP had little choice . 10,000 NNS were evacuated from DT area when some began to show signs of radiation sickness . Although DT Soviet NN refused to disclose any information about DT accident , a NN in Radiation and Environmental Biophysicsestimates IN at least 200 NNS died from exposure to radiation . DT Soviet NN finally declassified information about DT disaster in 1990 . On October 10 , 1957 , Windscale became DT site of DT worst nuclear accident in British history , and DT worst in DT NN until Three Mile Island 22 NNS later . A facility had been built RB to produce plutonium , but when DT NNP successfully designed a nuclear bomb WDT used tritium , DT facility was used to produce PRP for DT UK . However , this required running DT reactor at a higher temperature than its design MD sustain , and PRP eventually caught fire . Operators at first worried IN extinguishing DT flames with NN MD cause a hydrogen explosion , but ultimately gave in and did so as DT crisis escalated . PRP worked , but not before a sizeable amount of radiation had been unleashed into DT surrounding area . A 2007 studyestimated IN DT incident had led to over 200 NNS of cancer in DT surrounding population . DT Stationary Low - Power Reactor Number CD , or SL - 1 , was a nuclear reactor located in DT desert forty miles outside of Idaho Falls , Idaho . On January 3 , 1961 , DT reactor exploded , killing three workers and causing a meltdown . DT cause was a control rod WDT had been withdrawn incorrectly , but even after an investigation WDT took two NNS to complete , DT actions taken by DT workers just prior to DT accident were never discovered . Although DT accident released radioactive material into DT atmosphere , PRP was considered a small amount , and DT reactor ’s remote location helped to minimize damage to DT neighboring population . Still , DT incident is notable for being DT only fatal nuclear reactor accident in NNP history , and for inspiring a NN to DT design of nuclear reactors , so IN a mishap involving a single control rod MD not do this kind of damage . On January 21 , 1968 , a NNP Air Force B - 52 bomber was running a “ Chrome Dome ” mission , a Cold War-era operation in which NNP bombers with nuclear payloads stayed in DT air at all times , all with nearby targets in DT Soviet Union WDT were to be attacked if commanded . DT bomber , which was carrying four hydrogen bombs caught fire . DT nearest emergency landing location was at Thule Air Base in Greenland , but EX was not enough NN to reach PRP , so DT crew abandoned DT bomber . When PRP crashed , DT nuclear payload ruptured and DT area became contaminated with radiation . DT March 2009 issue of NNP magazine classified DT event as CD of DT worst nuclear accidents of all NN . DT 1968 incident caused DT immediate discontinuation of “ Chrome Dome ” missions , and more stable explosives were eventually developed so IN nuclear weapons MD be less likely to explode in an accident . DT Bohunice nuclear power plant was DT first to be built in Czechoslovakia . DT reactor was based on an experimental design WDT was meant to run on uranium mined in Czechoslovakia . However , DT first - of - its - kind facility had multiple accidents , and PRP had to be shut down more than 30 times . Two workers had been killed in a 1976 incident , but DT worst mishap occurred on February 22 , 1977 when a worker removed control rods incorrectly during a routine fuel NN . This simple error caused a massive radioactive leak , and DT ensuing accident earned a level 4 rating on DT International Nuclear Event Scale of 1 to 7 . DT Soviet NN covered up DT accident , so no reliable estimates of casualties have been released to DT NN . However , in 1979 , DT NN decommissioned DT plant , and PRP is expected to be fully dismantled in 2033 .

text: Yesterday , in DT post “ Just How Profoundly Have PRP Been Lied To About WWII ? , ” FOTM ‘s TrailDust asks whether all PRP ’ve been told about WWII , specifically Hitler and DT Nazis , is actually true . For DT , I applaud TrailDust ’s courage , as I believe NOTHING should a priori be ruled beyond DT realm of questioning . This post is my nugget of contribution to TrailDust ’s query . A persistent popular misconception of Hitler and DT Nazis is IN PRP were Christians . Nothing can be further from DT truth . Instead , Hitler and DT Nazis were animated by Nordic paganism and DT occult . DT John Hay Library at Brown University contains a special collection — 81 of Hitler ’s vast 16,000 - volume library . DT whereabouts of most of Hitler ’s books is a mystery , although most scholars believe PRP ’re scattered around Russia . PRP do VB IN 1,200 of them are in DT Library of Congress in Washington , 81 in DT John Hay Library . ( Brown University ) Hitler marked DT margins of his books with vertical lines beside paragraphs or sentences he thought important . According to Timothy Ryback , in his book , Hitler ’s Private Library : DT Books WDT Shaped His Life , CD notable subject represented in DT John Hay Library ’s Hitler collection is DT occult , including a book WDT Hitler had marked — Ernst Schertel ’s Magic : History , Theory and Practice ( 1923 ) . Ryback points to CD marked sentence in Magic as quite chilling , given Hitler ’s history : Some consider Hitler to be demonically possessed . As an example , Jean - Michel Angebert asks in DT Occult and DT Third Reich : DT Mystical Origins of Nazism and DT Search For DT Holy Grail ( pp. 191 and 22 ) : Lewis A. Sumberg , in his “ Translator ’s Preface ” to Angebert ’s volume , pointedly asks ( pp. xii and xiii ) : Italian Foreign Minister Count Galeazzo Ciano wrote in his diary : “ I am certain IN even if DT Germans were given more than PRP ask for , PRP MD attack just DT same , because PRP are possessed by DT demon of destruction . ” ( Galeazzo Ciano , DT Ciano Diaries , p. 582 . ) More recently , in an interview with Vatican Radio , DT late Father Gabriel Amorth , Vatican ’s chief exorcist , VBD : “ I am convinced IN DT Nazis were all possessed . All PRP have to do is VB about what Hitler . . . did . Almost certainly PRP were possessed by DT Devil . PRP can tell by their behaviour and their actions , from DT horrors PRP committed and DT atrocities WDT were committed on their orders . ” In fact , Vatican documents revealed IN wartime pontiff Pope Pius XII had attempted a long - distance exorcism of Hitler . But DT effort failed because , as Fr. Amorth explained , DT possessed person must be consenting and willing and in DT presence of DT exorcist for DT demon - banishing to succeed . Those who had known Hitler thought he was demonically possessed . Nazi Minister of Propaganda Joseph Goebbels admitted he did not really VB Hitler , although he worked with and saw DT Führer almost every day . Goebbels told his aide - de-camp , Prince Schaumburg - Lippe , IN EX were times when Hitler gave him “ DT chills . ” DT most striking testimony is DT by Hermann Rauschning , a Nazi leader who later fled to DT U.S . In his 1939 book , Hitler Told Me , Rauschning described Hitler as controlled by “ malefic influences of which he was no longer DT master . ” A chronic insomniac , Hitler ’s sleeplessness became worse after 1934 , his minimal sleep frequently interrupted by crying spells and night terrors . As recounted by Rauschning , during CD of his night terrors : “ Hitler was standing RB in his bedroom , stumbling about , looking around him with a distraught look . He was muttering : ‘ PRP ’s him ! PRP ’s him ! He ’s here !’ His lips had turned blue . He was dripping with sweat . Suddenly , he uttered some numbers which made no sense , then some words , then bits of sentences . PRP was frightening . He used terms which were strung together in DT strangest way and which were absolutely weird . Then , he again became silent , although his lips continued to move . He was given a massage and something to drink . Then , all of a sudden , he screamed : ‘ RB ! Over RB ! In DT corner ! Who is PRP ? ’ He was jumping up and down , and he was howling . PRP reassured him IN everything was all right , and he gradually calmed down . ”

text: With DT region ’s population booming because of DT Pike ’s Peak gold rush , Congress creates DT JJ Territory of Colorado . When DT NNP NNPS acquired PRP after DT Mexican War ended in 1848 , DT land WDT MD CD day become Colorado was nearly unpopulated by Anglo settlers . Ute , Arapaho , Cheyenne , and other Native Americans had occupied DT land for centuries , but DT Europeans who had made sporadic appearances RB since DT 17th century never stayed for long . PRP was not until 1851 IN DT first permanent non-Indian settlement was established , in DT San Luis Valley . As with JJ other western regions , though , DT lure of gold launched DT first major Anglo invasion . In July 1858 , a band of prospectors working streambeds near modern - day Denver found tiny flecks of gold in their pans . Since DT gold - bearing streams were located in DT foothills not far from DT massive mountain named for DT explorer Zebulon Pike , DT subsequent influx of hopeful miners was termed DT Pike ’s Peak gold rush . By DT spring of 1859 , an estimated 50,000 gold seekers had reached this latest of a long series of American El Dorados . As DT first gold - bearing streams to be discovered played out , prospectors moved westward into DT rugged slopes of DT Rocky Mountains in search of JJ finds . Wherever sizeable deposits were discovered , ramshackle mining camps IN Central City , Nevadaville , and Black Hawk appeared , sometimes almost overnight . Meanwhile , out on DT flat plains at DT edge of DT mountains , Denver became DT central supply town for DT miners . Although few miners came to Colorado planning to stay long , PRP were eager to establish some semblance of “ law and order ” in DT region in order to protect their property rights and gold dust . Far from DT seats of eastern NN , DT miners and townspeople cobbled together their own simple governments , usually revolving around a miners ’ court WDT regulated claims . Technically lacking in any genuine legal foundation , DT miners ’ courts did maintain DT minimal order needed for DT mineral exploitation of DT territory to continue . DT unreliable mining operations soon gave way to larger , highly capitalized and relatively permanent lode mining operations . DT pioneers recognized IN DT vast mineral resources of DT Rockies MD form DT foundation of a thriving JJ NN , but DT NNS settling RB needed a more formal system of laws and NN . DT Congressional designation of JJ western NNS and territories had been bogged down for several NNS as southern and northern politicians fought over whether slavery MD be permitted in DT JJ western regions . text: When I was a child , my father was a family physician . Occasionally he talked about dreams with his patients or neighbouring peasants . Having overheard their chat , I joined in CD day , saying , “ I dreamed of walking on DT street but I was aware IN I was dreaming . So I was looking for some kind of bed to VB back to sleeping . PRP was a frustrating experience trying to find a bed in DT streets of a village . I finally came to a large dark stone with a smoothly polished flat surface . I fell asleep or out of DT dream even before my body touched DT stone . ” PRP were all surprised by my dream , since lucid dreams are much less common for adults than NNS . In a lucid dream , DT dreamer is aware of DT dreaming status . He or she therefore participates in or even manipulates DT outcome of DT dream . In my case , I wanted to end DT dream , and eventually I did . A false awakening , in which DT dreamer dreamed of getting up to work or to VB to DT washroom , is likely a lucid dream . A daydream MD RB be a lucid dream , if DT dreamer goes far away from his waking NN of mind and is unaware of his physical and social environments . Since a lucid dreamer can often manipulate DT imaginary experiences in DT dream environment , lucid dreams can seem extremely real and vivid , depending on a person ’s level of self - awareness during DT lucid dream . Recently , various techniques have been developed to induce lucid dreams . Such techniques apparently reduce DT frequency and severity of nightmares . Both Buddhism and Taoism have long been known to introduce lucid dream experiences in order to calm down DT believer ’s mind . CD sect of Buddhism goes further to classify DT human mind or consciousness into seven levels of awareness . EX are degrees of wakefulness or awareness , and both lucid dreaming and normal waking experiences lie somewhere towards DT middle of this continuum ( or hierarchy ) of awareness . In this context as DT Buddhist believes , EX are therefore NNS of wakefulness WDT are superior to normal waking awareness , such as Nirvana , which Buddhists pursue in their religious practice . In such superior awareness , DT reality of our ordinary NN becomes illusory . Buddhism holds DT view IN life on NN is bitter in nature . Closing his famous essay All Things Being Equal , Chuang Tzu says , “ Chuang Tzu once dreamed IN he was a butterfly fluttering here and RB , VBG wherever he pleased . He was totally unaware of Chuang Tzu . A sudden awakening left nothing else but Chuang Tzu himself , who did not VB anything about his being a bufferfly . text: Stuart Turner ( born Bournemouth , Dorset , England ) is an English alternative blues singer . He now lives in Medway , Kent . Having released two solo albums , Turner formed DT band Stuart Turner & DT Flat NNP Society , who release their 5th album Scowl in DT summer of 2017 . Though being an active musician for a number of NNS , and playing with a number of different local musicians , Turner 's first official solo release came on Sun Pier Records , a Chatham based record label distributed by Cargo , and formed by friend and fellow musician Kris Dollimore , ex-guitarist with DT Damned . Turner produced Dollimore 's debut Sun Pier release ( 02/01/1978 ) in 2006 , writing a song on PRP ( " DT North Kent Post Industrial Hillstomp Blues " ) which received national airplay on BBC Radio Two . Turner 's own solo appeared a few months later with his debut album , A Gallon of NNP Makes a Mile of Fog , which CD critic described as " packed full of ideas " . [ 2 ] Turner supported Dollimore in gigs around England and spent 2006 and 2007 playing shows in a diverse selection of venues , including bowling alleys , cabaret clubs and Swedish festivals , which CD reviewer described as " scaring DT living daylights out of DT assembled crowd with his spooky folk blues " . [ 3 ] Turner 's second album , File Under Carnal Knowledge , was described a freight train riding back bar room down at heel blues " , [ 4 ] and released on Sun Pier in February 2009 . Turner formed DT Flat NNP Society with guitarist Robbie Wilkinson in 2009 to record what became DT band 's first album Gin & Bitters . Alongside Turner and Wilkinson in DT original line - up were Ray Hunt on drums and Dave Sawicki on bass ( with occasional trumpet from John Whitaker ) . DT album was released on CD and digital download in July 2010 , through DT independent Brigadier Records . DT band added " steam driven power " to his " anguished urban blues " , [ 5 ] and provided DT opportunity for live performances around DT South East of England , including DT Lounge On DT Farm festival . Turner & DT Flat NNP Society performed gigs to DT end of 2010 , including a Christmas ball at Oxford University . A live version of " Murder On Gaslight Street " was made available for free download via Medway Eyes in October 2010 , whilst Brigadier Records released DT Gin & Bitters album tracks , " Shimmy " and " South NNP Blues " as radio promos in December DT NN . Gin & Bitters was followed up with DT limited vinyl EP release Weekend Hearts in 2011 before DT band recorded On DT Brink Of Misadventure , which was their final album release with Brigadier Records . At this point , DT band underwent some line - up changes , with a JJ line - up containing Turner , Wilkinson , Nick Rice ( bass ) , Bob Collins ( guitarist formerly with DT Dentists ) , Rob Shepherd ( from DT Singing Loins on banjo , mandolin and accordion ) and James Kerr recording a JJ album during 2013 . At this point , DT band began their association with Vacilando ' 68 Recordings in Autumn of 2013 and acquired publishing through Bucks Music Publishing . DT JJ album , DT Art and NNP of Phrenology : a presentation by Stuart Turner and DT Flat NNP Society was released by Vacilando ' 68 in February 2014 . Steve Moore replaced James Kerr as drummer in NN for a JJ EP , DT Gentleman 's Club , released by Vacilando ' 68 in October 2014 . Whilst recording what MD become DT band 's 4th album , DT band gigged extensively around DT South East and London and started to make in - roads into DT grass roots festival circuit , with an appearance at 2015 's Bearded Theory festival a particular highlight . DT 4th album , eponymously named , was released to critical acclaim by Vacilando ' 68 in April 2016 following a long period of artwork and pressing delays . DT band had a two - page feature in Maverick Magazine . With Mike Sewell replacing Steve Moore on drums , DT band recorded their 5th album , to be released as Scowl in 2017 . DT album RB features guest appearances from Rachel Lowrie and David Read ( of DT Claim ) . Some left - over songs from DT album were released as a digital only release in February 2017 . • On DT Brink Of Misadventure ( 2012 , Brigadier ) • DT Art and NNP of Phrenology : a presentation by Stuart Turner and DT Flat NNP Society ( February 2014 , Vacilando ' 68 )

text: Nick Davies is a distinguished reporter who specialises in very long and depressing stories for DT Guardian on subjects most other journalists prefer to leave untouched , such as poverty and DT failings of DT criminal justice system . He has now turned his virtuous investigative eye on his own profession . His reaction is almost spinsterish in its horror . Davies ' notion of what journalists and journalism are for is idiosyncratic , to put PRP mildly . Whoever told him IN this is an industry ' supposedly dedicated ' - as he puts PRP in his prologue - ' to telling DT truth ' ? Where did he VB DT idea IN journalists should be , or ever have been , reluctant to lie , cheat , deceive and resort to low tricks of every kind ? In this survey of what he calls ' a corrupted profession ' , he hardly bothers with DT tabloids . ' No NN needs a book to tell them IN DT tabloids are an unreliable source of information about DT NN , ' he comments with lordly condescension . Sheltered from DT rough NN of daily hackery , he RB disdains what he sees as DT fictions of objectivity and neutrality . Journalists , Davies believes , must make judgments ; DT strong implication is IN these should be between good and bad . Much of his analysis is nevertheless compelling and alarming . On provincial papers , pitifully underpaid journalists spend their days rewriting press releases , while DT proceedings in courts and councils VBP largely unreported . At all levels , DT relentless pressure on staffing , combined with DT demand for more and yet more ' NN ' , have created a culture of dependence . Journalists with no NN either to find stories or to check DT information PRP are given , are reduced to processing DT unstoppable flow of material from DT PR departments , DT special interest groups , DT pseudo - experts , DT pseudo - researchers . Davies convincingly chronicles DT success of DT CIA and MI6 in planting fictions across DT supposedly independent NN to VB backing for false assessments of DT dangers posed by Iraq and Iran . He argues IN Greenpeace and other eco groups have been just as eager as DT fossil - fuel lobby to distort and exaggerate DT available NN on JJ NN to further their own ends ( although , curiously enough , Davies omits any reference to DT willingness of his own newspaper to swallow DT most extreme predictions of DT coming catastrophe with scarcely a flicker of scepticism ) . His last three chapters focus on DT Sunday Times , DT Observer , and DT Daily Mail ( DT Sunday Telegraph does not draw Davies 's fire ) . PRP comes as little surprise to find IN DT Mail is prejudiced against blacks , homosexuals , immigrants , lefties , NNS on benefit and so on , and IN PRP is unscrupulous in mobilising its money and power to hound them ; or IN Davies laments DT passing of DT old investigative tradition on DT Sunday Times . But his assault on DT Observer is something else . In DT eyes of Guardian men IN Nick Davies , their sister paper DT Observer and its then editor , Roger Alton , committed an unforgivable offence in declaring support for DT Iraq war . Davies directs a venomous attack on DT integrity and professional competence of Alton and his political editor , Kamal Ahmed . He portrays them as puppets of Alastair Campbell and Tony Blair , intent on turning DT paper into a mouthpiece for DT NN 's war policy , ready to suppress or bury any story WDT might raise doubts about Saddam Hussein 's alleged arsenal . Of Alton , Davies says : ' His passions are far from NN , much closer to sport and women , both of whom he pursues with obsessive NN ' - a comment so unpleasant IN PRP begins to suspect some ancient personal grudge . Davies deliberately underplays DT extent to which Alton was prepared to allow NN and space to DT expression of anti-war sentiment ; and ignores altogether DT persistence with which DT Observer criticised Blair and his ministers over their domestic record , and exposed their bullying , lies and deceptions . If this travesty of what happened at DT Observer represents Nick Davies 's idea of good journalism , he can keep PRP . Let 's be charitable and regard PRP as an aberration , and concentrate instead on DT valuable and disturbing insights WDT Davies provides into a business WDT needs to ask a good JJ questions of itself . No NN should expect journalists to be as high - minded as Nick Davies . Theirs is - or should be - a murky , occasionally mucky , job done by NNS short on scruples and long on curiosity , suspicious of everything and everybody , and of favours most of all . Journalists do n't need to be clean but PRP must be allowed to VB DT story , and PRP must have DT confidence and courage to write PRP as PRP see PRP . If PRP lose DT , PRP 're all in trouble .

text: Image : CBC NNP : Sunday ’ sinterviews 9/11 Commission co-chair and co-author of DT book “ Without Precedent : DT Inside Story of DT 9/11 Commission ” Evan Solomon : Tell me why PRP felt DT need , with Thomas Kean , to write this book “ Without Precedent ” ? Lee Hamilton : PRP felt PRP had an important story to tell , 9/11 was a traumatic event in our history , every adult in America will remember exactly where PRP were on DT day when PRP heard DT NN . PRP felt IN DT Commission ’s work gave a lot of insights into how NN works , and particularly how NN in DT national security area works . PRP had hundreds of NNS tell PRP , or ask PRP , how DT Commission did its work , and so PRP responded by writing DT book and tried to let NNS VB DT story , DT inside story of DT 9/11 Commission . Solomon : Do PRP consider DT 9/11 Commission to have been a success , and if so , under what ways do PRP measure DT success ? How do PRP call PRP a success ? Hamilton : DT 9/11 Commission was created by statute . PRP had two responsibilities – first , tell DT story of 9/11 ; I VBP PRP ’ve done DT reasonably well . PRP worked very hard at PRP ; I do n’t VB IN PRP ’ve told DT definitive story of 9/11 , but surely anybody in DT future who tackles DT job will begin with DT 9/11 Commission Report . I VBP PRP ’ve been reasonably successful in telling DT story . PRP became a best seller in this country and NNS showed a lot of interest in PRP . Our second task was to make recommendations ; thus far , about half of our recommendations have been enacted into law , DT other half have not been enacted . So PRP ’ve got a ways to VB . In a quantitative sense , PRP ’ve had about 50 % success RB . In a qualitative sense , PRP MD judge PRP JJ different ways . But PRP still have some very important recommendations WDT PRP VBP have not yet been enacted WDT should be . Solomon : Now , CD of DT stipulations , PRP write in DT book , CD of DT ways WDT PRP thought IN this ought to be successful , this report , DT Commission Report , is on page 23 , PRP VBD if DT American NNS MD accept DT results as authoritative , and DT recommendations . And when I measure DT against a Zogby poll done in NNP , DT says now 42 % of Americans say IN “ DT U.S. NN , and its 9/11 Commission , concealed or refused to investigate critical evidence WDT contradicts DT official explanation of September 11th , saying EX ’s a cover - up ” – 42 % , Mr. Hamilton – what does DT say to PRP about DT efficacy of DT Commission ’s report ? Hamilton : Well , PRP ’s dispiriting , PRP ’s an unusually high number , but if PRP look at polls judging NN reports in DT past – DT Warren Commission , DT reports on Kennedy assassination , even DT reports on Abraham Lincoln ’s assassination – PRP find a very high level of NNS who are skeptical . And PRP have DT in this case . When PRP conduct a major investigation , PRP cannot possibly answer every question , PRP just do DT best PRP can . But for every question PRP leave unanswered , PRP create an opening to a NN theory , and a good JJ of them have popped up here . DT only thing I ask in DT future is IN DT NN theory NNS do not apply a double standard . DT is to say , PRP VBP PRP to make an airtight case for any assertion PRP make . On DT other hand , when PRP make an assertion PRP do PRP often on very flimsy evidence . But conspirators are always VBG to exist in this country . Tom Kean and I got a flavour of this everytime PRP ’d walk through an audience – PRP MD hand PRP notes , hand PRP papers , hand PRP books , hand PRP tapes , telling PRP to investigate this , DT or DT other . PRP cannot possibly answer all these questions , PRP just do DT best PRP can . Solomon : Some of DT families have joined DT chorus . PRP ’ve talked to CD father who says , ‘ my son was killed by George W. Bush ’ , as if DT NN had foreknowledge of DT attacks . What MD PRP say to someone IN him and other family members who have been dissatisfied with DT explanation ? Hamilton : JJ families supported DT report – very strongly – and have been instrumental in helping PRP on DT implementation stage . A lot of DT NNS WDT have doubts about DT report – not all of them – are strongly anti-Bush , for a variety of reasons . JJ of them are just anti-government , in other words , PRP do n’t believe anything DT NN says . All I ask of these NNS is : give me your evidence . If PRP thought George Bush or Lee Hamilton or Tom Kean blew up those buildings , let ’s see DT evidence . Solomon : I MD n’t mind just .. EX ’s a few things , but I VBP to VB , interestingly enough , if PRP ’ve seen a film WDT ’s so popular now on DT internet , ten million NNS apparently have seen a film called Loose NNP , which makes some startling allegations . PRP ’s a film made by three very young students out of a NNP York University . Have PRP seen DT movie , and if so , what are your thoughts on PRP ? Hamilton : I have not seen PRP . Solomon : Yeah … 10 million NNS , I mean , some of them .. now , and PRP ’s interesting IN PRP write in CD of your chapters , I VBP PRP ’s Chapter 12 , deals specifically with NN theories . CD of them , as PRP VBP – probably CD of DT most persistent – is IN DT buildings were brought down by controlled explosion , controlled demolition . CD of DT bits of evidence WDT is often cited is DT collapse of NNP Trade Center Building Number 7 , which was not hit by any plane . CD question WDT NNS have is : why did n’t DT Commission deal with DT collapse Building 7 , which some call DT smoking gun ? Why did this collapse at all ? Hamilton : Well , of course , PRP did deal with PRP . DT charge IN dynamite , or whatever , brought down DT NNP Trade Towers , PRP of course looked at very carefully – PRP find no evidence of DT . PRP find all kinds of evidence IN PRP was DT airplanes WDT did PRP . Do n’t take our word on DT : DT engineers and DT architects have studied this thing in extraordinary detail , and PRP can tell PRP precisely what caused DT collapse of those buildings . What caused DT collapse of DT buildings , to summarize PRP , was IN DT super - heated jet fuel melted DT steel super - structure of these buildings and caused their collapse . EX ’s a powerful lot of evidence to sustain DT point of view , including DT pictures of DT airplanes flying into DT building . Now , with regard to Building 7 , PRP believe IN PRP was DT aftershocks of these two huge buildings in DT very near vicinity collapsing . And in DT Building 7 case , PRP VBP IN PRP was a case of flames setting off a fuel container , which started DT fire in Building 7 , and DT was our theory on Building 7 . Now PRP ’re not DT experts on this , PRP talked to DT engineers and DT architects about this at some length , and DT ’s DT conclusion PRP reached . Solomon : Let me just ask PRP CD more question on DT . CD counter - argument – or EX ’s two , I guess – CD is IN DT fire very rarely , and has never , forced buildings constructed IN DT NNP Trade Centers to ever collapse , because steel does n’t melt at temperatures WDT can be reached through a hydro - carbon fire , and IN EX ’s other .. in other words , EX are countless NNS of other buildings WDT have been on fire WDT have not collapsed . Hamilton : – but not on fire through jet fuel , I do n’t VB PRP have any evidence of DT . But here again , I ’m not DT expert on PRP . PRP relied on DT experts , and PRP ’re DT engineers and DT architects who examined this in very great detail . Why was essentially evidence from what MD have been a crime scene – or was a crime scene – removed very quickly from RB ? Hamilton : PRP ca n’t answer every question when PRP conduct an investigation . Look , PRP ’ve to got to remember IN on this day , chaos and confusion were DT mark , and peoples ’ overwhelming concern was to try to save as JJ lives as possible , not to explain why a particular building collapsed . So PRP ’s not unusual to me IN PRP , and DT Commission – and anybody else , for DT matter – cannot answer every question . I VBP back to what I say earlier : whenever PRP conduct an investigation , PRP cannot answer every question . Solomon : But should DT Commission have .. I guess DT question some NNS keep asking , should DT Commission have asked more questions about DT removal of DT debris ? Hamilton : Look , PRP can say IN about almost every phase of our investigation , ‘ PRP should have asked this , PRP should have asked DT , PRP should have spent more NN ’ – PRP ’re conducting an investigation , PRP have a NN limit , PRP do n’t have unlimited NN , PRP have a budget limit , PRP cannot VB down every track , PRP cannot answer conclusively every question . DT members of DT families WDT PRP referred to a minute ago submitted 150 questions to PRP – PRP answered a good JJ of them , PRP did n’t answer them all . PRP come to a point in an investigation where PRP have to say to yourself , ‘ what ’s our responsibility , given DT resources PRP have , how much can PRP do ? ’ And PRP end up with a lot of questions unanswered . Look , I ‘ve got a lot of unanswered questions in my mind . Solomon : What are yours ? What are your unanswered questions ? Hamilton : Well , at DT top of my list happens to be a personal NN , and DT is , I MD never figure out why these CD fellas did what PRP did . PRP looked into their backgrounds . In CD or two NNS , PRP were apparently happy , well - adjusted , not particularly religious – in CD case quite well - to - do , had a girlfriend . PRP just MD n’t figure out why he did PRP . I still do n’t VB . And I VBP CD of DT great unanswered questions – a good topic for investigative reporters – MD be : why did these CD do what PRP did ? PRP speculated in DT report about why DT enemy hates PRP , but PRP simply were n’t able to answer DT questions about DT CD . Solomon : PRP VBP , just on DT point , and again , EX are so JJ of these questions about DT CD . EX have been some questions about – and I ’m talking about sources here IN DT London Times and Le Figaro , sort of major newspapers – IN some of these guys , some of these hijackers were still alive after DT day of DT event , IN EX are reports of their whereabouts . What did DT Commission make of those kind of reports ? Hamilton : ( Laughs ) What ’s DT evidence ? Look , I had a woman come up to me who VBD she was a lover of Mohammed Atta . And I VBD , ‘ do PRP VB IN he ’s dead ? ’ And she VBD , ‘ I ’m his lover . ’ .. ( raises eyebrows ) PRP VBP all kinds of comments IN this , PRP ca n’t trace everything down . Solomon : Where EX any notion EX was … DT NTSB recently released DT flight path of NNP Flight 93 in DT past two weeks . CD of DT interesting things WDT WDT showed was , during DT flight path , and I VBP DT flight path of DT , I VBP IN plane crashed , according to DT Report , at 10:03 am . And CD of DT interesting things PRP showed – this is just recently declassified – IN PRP flew well over 10,000 feet – 30,000 , 40,000 feet – from about 9:30 onward . Now , a lot of DT cell phone calls WDT were made from DT plane , WDT ended up being in DT movie , were from , PRP VBP , NNS phoning from DT plane . And CD allegation WDT ’s recently come out since DT release of DT is : cell phones do n’t work above 10,000 feet , so how MD NNS VB on their cell phone on a plane and phone their relatives ? Hamilton : I ’m no expert on DT . I ’ve been told cell phones work – sometimes – above 10,000 feet , and as high as 30,000 feet . So PRP MD have been IN some of DT calls went through and some did n’t , I just do n’t VB . Solomon : Let me ask PRP another thing . I ’m just asking because , PRP VBP , in DT wake of this , EX ’s lots of these questions . Solomon : DT Lamont Doherty NNP Observatory at Columbia University , which is about 20 odd miles away from NNP York , PRP released a report on seismic data coming from Manhattan on DT day . And PRP released a spike in seismic data at 8:46:26 , and PRP thought DT was DT moment of impact of DT plane on DT first NNP Trade Center , of American Airlines 11 . But DT plane did n’t hit until 8:46:40 , and EX are several of DT same kind of early seismic spikes for DT second flight . I guess DT question is : how do PRP explain those discrepancies ? When DT NN looks at DT , how can PRP explain DT kind of thing ? Hamilton : I have n’t seen DT report . I do n’t VB DT answer to your question . PRP did n’t come forward with DT evidence while PRP were at DT Commission – so far as I VBP . Now , staff filtered a lot of these things , so not necessarily MD I VB . I do n’t VB what happened with regard to the… . What did PRP conclude ? I do n’t VB what PRP concluded . Solomon : PRP had no conclusion ; DT evidence is sitting out RB . PRP write about , in Chapter 12 of DT book – and again PRP ’s CD of those allegations WDT have come up – about who had foreknowledge of PRP ? CD piece of evidence WDT JJ critics have VBN is : ‘ well , EX is lots of ‘ puts ’ – which is a form of financial stock trading . In other words , NNS are buying up stock , hoping IN DT airline stock MD plunge , and EX was an unusually large number of puts on American Airlines and NNP stock , and therefore NNS profited from this . What did PRP make of DT theory ? Hamilton : DT ’s CD PRP did investigate . PRP looked at DT pretty carefully , and all I can indicate at this point is IN PRP do not VB anybody profited from manipulation of airline stock prior to 9/11 , EX ’s no evidence of DT , I do n’t VB . Hamilton : DT ’s correct . PRP ’s not unusual in DT stock market to have a lot of activity in a given stock , or industry , as PRP did here . DT question is : did any of them have foreknowledge and profit from PRP ? PRP do n’t VB so ; PRP looked at PRP pretty carefully . Solomon : EX ’s RB allegations IN DT Pakistani Secret Service , called DT ISI , DT head of which met here in DT NNP NNPS right before 9/11 , and EX ’s some allegations and evidence to show IN PRP paid Mohammed Atta $ 100,000 . DT reason this is important is : who funded DT NNS who conducted DT attacks , DT terrorist attacks ? What did DT Commission make of payment from DT ISI to Mohammed Atta of $ 100,000 ? Hamilton : I do n’t VB anything about PRP . Solomon : Was EX any connection between .. Did DT Commission investigate any connection between ISI , Pakistani intelligence , and .. Hamilton : PRP MD have ; I do not recall PRP writing anything about PRP in DT report . PRP MD have but I do n’t recall PRP . PRP did estimate IN Osama bin Laden spent about $ 500,000 for DT 9/11 attacks . PRP did not identify all DT sources of DT money . Solomon : And how PRP got to DT … Hamilton : DT ’s right , PRP simply can’t trace PRP , so far as I VBP , because $ 500,000 in international financial markets is not even a blip on DT radar screen . So PRP do not VB precisely where DT money came from . Solomon : Questions about foreknowledge , especially as to when Vice NNP Dick Cheney knew when he went down to DT protective bunker : EX was some suggestion IN DT Secretary of Transport Mineta testified in front of DT Commission IN he in fact talked to Dick Cheney at 9:20 am . Cheney claims he had n’t been RB .. gotten down RB until close to 10 am . DT was eventually omitted from DT final report , . text: • DT legendary investor Warren Buffett avoids making predictions , but PRP 've gathered 12 of his best guesses about cryptocurrency , table tennis , and even his own death . • PRP 've detailed each prediction and assessed its accuracy in DT slideshow below . DT legendary investor Warren Buffett knows better than to make predictions . " PRP have no idea - and never have had - whether DT market is VBG to VB up , down , or sideways in DT near - or intermediate - term future , " he wrote in his 1986 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders . Yet DT Oracle of Omaha MD n't resist making a few guesses about DT future over DT NNS . PRP 've gathered 12 of his most intriguing predictions and assessed their accuracy in DT slideshow below . " In terms of cryptocurrencies generally , I can say almost with certainty IN PRP will come to a bad ending , " Buffett VBD in an interview with CNBC in January 2018 . " Now , when PRP happens or how or anything else , I do n't VB . " He added : " If I MD buy a five - NN put on every CD of DT cryptocurrencies , I 'd be glad to do PRP , but I MD never short a dime 's worth . " Buffett has been right about cryptocurrencies so far . At DT NN of his prediction , bitcoin traded above $ 14,000 . DT cryptocurrency slumped below $ 4,000 by DT end of 2018 , and it's now trading at about $ 5,200 . " Ships will sail around DT NN , but DT Flat NNP Society will flourish , " Buffett VBD in a speech at Columbia 's business school in NNP 1984 . Buffett MD have been making a point about stubborn denialism in financial markets , but his prediction about so - called flat - earthers was correct - PRP 've enjoyed a resurgence in recent NNS . " PRP is fitting IN DT visit of Halley 's Comet coincided with this percentage gain : neither will be seen again in my lifetime , " Buffett told Berkshire Hathaway shareholders in 1985 after DT conglomerate grew its net worth by 48.2 % . He RB predicted IN DT 23.2 % compounded annual growth in DT company 's per-share book value DT NN was " another percentage WDT will not be repeated . " PRP took nearly 20 NNS for Buffett to prove himself wrong on DT first count . Berkshire Hathaway 's net worth jumped by 48.3 % in 1998 , though DT was largely because DT company issued shares for acquisitions . " Normally , a gain of 48.3 % MD call for handsprings - but not this NN , " he told investors . Buffett 's second prediction was way off DT mark . Berkshire Hathaway 's per-share book value rose by 23.3 % in 1986 . PRP has RB grown by at least 23.2 % in more than 10 other NNS since 1985 . Buffett told students at DT University of Kansas in NNP 2005 IN Sears Chairman Eddie Lampert MD struggle to revitalize DT department - store chain . He warned IN rivals such as Walmart and Costco MD undercut Sears , which had just been acquired by Kmart . " Eddie is a very smart guy , but putting Kmart and Sears together is a tough hand , " Buffett VBD . " Turning around a retailer WDT has been slipping for a long NN MD be very difficult . " Buffett was right on DT money . Sears filed for bankruptcy protection in October . However , some hope remains : Lampert recently won court approval to buy DT 126 - NN - old retailer out of bankruptcy and escape liquidation . " PRP expect to keep permanently our three primary holdings , Capital Cities / ABC , Inc. , Geico Corporation , and DT Washington Post , " Buffett told Berkshire Hathaway shareholders in his 1986 letter . " Even if these securities were to appear significantly overpriced , PRP MD not anticipate selling them , just as PRP MD not sell See 's or Buffalo Evening NNP if someone were to offer PRP a price far above what PRP believe those businesses are worth , " he added . Despite his best intentions , Buffett can't resist a great deal . Berkshire Hathaway sold its stake in Capital Cities / ABC to DT Walt Disney Company in 1996 in a cash - and - stock deal worth $ 2.5 billion . He RB flogged his company 's 28 % stake in DT Post to Graham Holdings in a deal worth more than $ 1.1 billion in 2014 , according to DT newspaper . DT Graham family sold DT Post to Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos in a $ 250 million deal in 2013 . Berkshire Hathaway remains a major investor in Geico , See 's Candies , and DT Buffalo NNP . " In 1988 PRP made major purchases of Federal Home Loan Mortgage Pfd. ( ' Freddie Mac ' ) , " Buffett told Berkshire Hathaway shareholders in his letter DT NN . " PRP expect to hold these securities for a long NN . In fact , when PRP own portions of outstanding businesses with outstanding managements , our favorite holding period is forever . " Luckily for Buffett , he changed his mind . Berkshire Hathaway sold nearly all its Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae shares in 2000 , slashing its holding to 0.3 % from 8.6 % in 1999 . Buffett told DT Financial Crisis Inquiry Commission in 2010 IN he had become " concerned " about DT companies ' management . " PRP were trying to and proclaiming IN PRP MD increase earnings per share in some low double - digit range or something of DT sort , " he VBD . " And any NN a large financial institution starts promising regular earnings increases , PRP 're VBG to have trouble , PRP VBP ? " " No sensible observer - not even these companies ' most vigorous competitors , assuming PRP are assessing DT matter honestly - questions WDT Coke and Gillette will dominate their fields worldwide for an investment lifetime , " Buffett wrote in his 1996 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders . " Indeed , their dominance will probably strengthen . Both companies have significantly expanded their already huge shares of market during DT past ten NNS , and all signs point to their repeating DT performance in DT next decade . " Buffett 's claims have proved sound so far : Both Coke and Gillette remain DT biggest players in their markets , though DT latter is under mounting pressure . Coca - Cola 's share of DT NNP soft - drinks market was 41 % in 1991 , compared with Pepsi's 33 % , and outsold its archrival fourfold in overseas markets , according to DT NNP York Times . Its share of DT JJ carbonated - beverage market was nearly 49 % in 2015 , according to Statista . In contrast , Gillette 's market share has fallen from about 70 % in 2010 to 54 % in 2016 in DT face of fierce competition from startups including DT Unilever - owned Dollar Shave Club and Harry 's , according to a report from DT data - tracking firm Euromonitor cited by DT Wall Street Journal . Buffett is notoriously skeptical IN DT good times will continue . In Berkshire Hathaway 's 1999 letter to shareholders , Buffett and Charlie Munger , his partner , deemed PRP a " virtual certainty " IN DT S&P 500 MD " do far less well in DT next decade or two than PRP has done since 1982 . " Buffett was right IN DT S&P 's stellar average total return of just over CD % from 1982 to 1999 MD n't last . DT index returned an average of 1.2 % over DT next decade , according to SlickCharts , recovering to a respectable 12.2 % from 2010 to 2018 .

text: Most of DT dinosaur skeletons PRP see in museums exist because of sedimentary rocks . These fossils got their start when a dinosaur died in an environment WDT had lots of moving sediment , IN an ocean , riverbed or lake . CD such place is DT benthic zone -- DT deepest part of a body of NN . This sediment quickly buried DT dinosaur , offering its body some protection PRP from decomposition . While DT dinosaur 's soft parts still eventually decomposed , its hard parts -- bones , teeth and claws -- remained . But a buried bone is n't DT same thing as a fossil -- to become a fossil , DT bone has to become rock . DT organic parts of DT bone , IN blood cells , collagen ( a protein ) , and fat , eventually break down . But DT inorganic parts of DT bone , or DT parts made from minerals IN calcium , have more staying power . PRP remain after DT organic materials have disappeared , creating a fragile , porous mineral in DT shape of DT original bone . Other minerals reinforce this bone , burning into a fossil . NN gradually makes its way into DT bone , carrying minerals IN iron and calcium carbonate picked up from DT surrounding sediment . As DT NN penetrates DT dinosaur 's bones , some of these minerals precipitate into their microscopic pores . As this process continues , DT bone becomes more and more rocklike . PRP 's IN filling a sponge with glue -- DT sponge 's physical structure stays DT same , and DT pores and pockets within PRP fill up . DT glue makes DT sponge sturdier and more resistant to damage . Large , thick bones , which have more room for mineral glue , make better fossils than small , flat bones . Over DT course of millions of NNS , DT sediment around these reinforced bones becomes sedimentary rock . Erosion , tides and other natural processes continue to deposit more sediment , and this sediment becomes rock , too . As long as PRP can withstand DT pressure from DT surrounding rock , DT bones remain safely hidden and preserved . After millions of NNS , some natural process , IN DT gradual shifting of DT NN 's surface , can reveal these layers of rock and DT fossils PRP contain . Sedimentary rock can RB hold trace fossils , which record an organism 's behavior . Some of DT most well - known trace fossils are trackways , or DT tracks of extinct animals . These form when an animal leaves its prints in soft but sturdy soil , which creates a mold . This mold fills with sediment , and both DT mold and its filling harden over millions of NNS . Forces IN erosion remove DT upper layers of rock , revealing DT preserved footprints underneath . Sediment can RB fill DT mold and harden into a cast , or a reproduction of DT foot WDT made DT print . This can happen with other traces , too , IN burrows and tunnels . Some other trace fossils include coprolites ( fossilized dung ) tooth marks on bones or wood , and nests . Sediment can even preserve plant life . Plants can make impressions in hardening sediment or become petrified wood after VBG through much DT same process as fossilized dinosaur bones do . This type of fossilization creates sturdy fossils , but PRP can only take place in specific conditions . Next , PRP 'll look at DT other ways life forms can be buried , encased or otherwise protected so their remains last millions of NNS .

text: U.S. Treasurys prices rose and yields eased on Thursday as an ongoing contest in Washington WDT has shut much of DT NN and left DT debt ceiling problem unresolved inspired investors to buy U.S. debt , still DT most viable safe haven . Given DT gridlock over DT budget and healthcare reform WDT led to a partial NN shutdown WDT began on Tuesday , investors are increasingly worried DT lawmakers will not agree on a deal to increase DT statutory $ 16.7 trillion borrowing limit by DT Oct. 17 deadline . Failure to increase DT debt ceiling , PRP fear , MD unleash market chaos and damage DT long - term creditworthiness of DT U.S. NN and DT safe - haven status of DT dollar . " At this point , DT market seems to have a pretty high degree of confidence DT Treasury will not miss or delay a principal or interest payment — WDT other things will give before DT gives , " VBD Robert Tipp , chief investment strategist at Prudential Fixed Income , with $ 400 billion in assets under management , in Newark , NNP Jersey . " But if DT assumption comes into question PRP will see DT orderly repricing WDT is VBG on right now become disorderly , " he VBD . " For DT market , any significant doubt as to DT timely payment of interest or principal on Treasury securities MD be tantamount to DT NN ceasing to rotate on its axis . " As concerns over a possible U.S. default have intensified , DT cost to insure Treasurys has soared in DT credit default swaps market , though analysts qualify DT by noting IN DT market is not particularly broad or deep . JJ data took a back seat to worries about DT political fighting in Washington . DT U.S. Labor Department VBD jobless claims totaled 308,000 in DT week ended Sept. 28 , compared with an upwardly revised 307,000 in DT previous week . Economists had projected DT latest figure to have risen to 313,000 . This was DT last NN JJ report until DT partial shutdown ends . Meanwhile , DT Institute for Supply Management index showed DT non-manufacturing sector of DT economy grew in September , but not as quickly as PRP did in August . text: A half billion NN old hammer embedded in rock WDT formed 400 million NNS ago . In June 1936 Max Hahn and his wife Emma were on a walk beside a waterfall near to London , Texas , when PRP noticed a rock with wood protruding from its core . PRP decided to take DT oddity home and later cracked PRP open with a hammer and a chisel . What PRP found within shocked DT archaeological and scientific community . Embedded in DT rock was what appeared to be some type of ancient man made hammer . A team of archaeologists analysed and dated PRP . DT rock encasing DT hammer was dated to more than 400 million NNS old . DT hammer itself turned out to be more than 500 million NNS old . Additionally , a section of DT wooden handle had begun DT metamorphosis into coal . DT hammer ’s head , made of more than 96 % iron , is far more pure than anything nature MD have achieved without assistance from relatively modern smelting methods . In 1889 near Nampa , Idaho , whilst workers were boring an artesian well , a small figurine made of baked clay was extracted from a depth of 320 feet . To reach this depth DT workers had to cut through fifteen feet of basalt lava and JJ other strata below DT . DT in itself does not seem remarkable , until PRP considers IN DT very top layer of lava has been dated to at least 15 million NNS old ! PRP is currently accepted by NN and geology WDT coal is a by - product of decaying vegetation . DT vegetation becomes buried over NN and is covered with sediment . DT sediment eventually fossilises and becomes rock . This natural process of coal formation takes up to 400 million NNS to accomplish . Anything WDT is found in lumps of coal or in coal seams during mining , had to have been placed or dropped into DT vegetation before PRP was buried in sediment . In 1944 , as a ten NN old boy , Newton Anderson , dropped a lump of coal in his basement and PRP broke in half as PRP hit DT floor . What he discovered inside defies explanation based upon current scientific orthodoxy . Inside DT coal was a hand crafted brass alloy bell with an iron clapper and sculptured handle . When an analysis was carried out PRP was discovered IN DT bell was made from anunusual mix of metals , different from any known modern alloy production ( including copper , zinc , tin , arsenic , iodine , and selenium ) . DT seam from whence this lump of coal was mined is estimated to be 300,000,000 NNS old ! A hand crafted bell found in a 300 million NN old lump of coal ! These extraordinary discoveries although bizarre , are not unique or even uncommon . EX are literally thousands of them collecting dust , locked away from JJ scrutiny in DT vaults of museums throughout DT NN . EX are JJ other unusual reported finds including DT following : DT Morrisonville , Illinois Times , on June 11 , 1891 , reported how Mrs. S. W. Culp found a circular shaped eight - carat gold chain , about 10 inches long , embedded in a lump of coal after she broke PRP apart to put in her scuttle . DT chain was described as “ antique ” and of “ quaint workmanship . ” Displayed in a museum at Glen Rose , Texas , is a cast iron pot reportedly found in a large lump of coal in 1912 by a worker feeding coal into DT furnace of a power plant . When he split open DT coal DT worker VBD DT pot fell out , leaving its impression in DT coal . Standing in DT room itself sixteen feet away , PRP is enough to shih youi ' weight from CD foot to DT other to cause DT speck of ligbt to run along DT scale . text: Deep NN Rising : DT Mainstreaming of DT Shadow NNP PRP goes by JJ names : DT shadow NN . DT deep NN . DT secret team . Whatever PRP is called , DT idea is simple : EX is an unelected , unaccountable , largely unknown group behind DT facade of DT visible NN WDT wields power and works toward long - term agenda goals no matter which political party or puppet politician holds office . Long DT domain of DT dreaded “ NN theorist ” community , DT idea has surfaced here and RB over DT NNS . DT JFK assassination has given rise to JJ inside accounts and outside exposés of DT Secret Team . DT Iran -Contra scandal led to a Bill Moyers documentary on DT Secret NNP WDT is still worth watching CD NNS later . PRP was even openly acknowledged IN a “ shadow NN ” had kicked into operation on 9/11 . But an odd phenomenon has taken place in recent NNS and intensified in recent months : DT idea of a “ deep NN ” or a “ shadow NN ” controlling politics , even in DT NNP , is becoming mainstream . PRP has graced DT cover of any number of recent books , including “ Deep NN : Inside DT NN Secrecy Industry ” and “ DT Deep NN : DT Fall of DT Constitution and DT Rise of a Shadow NN . ” PRP has found its way into DT online political NN from both DT left ( Salon ) and DT right ( DT American Conservative ) ends of DT controlled political spectrum . PRP has been invoked by mainstream financial analysts to describe DT actions of DT Federal Reserve . PRP has been revisited by Bill Moyers on his website . PRP has found its way into DT headlines of DT Boston Globe ( “ Vote all PRP VBP . DT secret NN wo n’t VB “ ) and DT NNP York Times ( “ America ’s ‘ Establishment ’ Has Embraced ‘ Deep NNPS ’ “ ) . Heck , PRP has even been talked about on DT NNP Bank ’s blog . This onslaught of attention begs DT question : why now ? Why are so JJ mainstream outlets suddenly shining a light on something WDT has barely been acknowledged in DT past ? To be sure , some of this recent coverage is a whitewash , as PRP MD expect . DT NNP Bank blog , for instance , pawns DT concept off as something to be found in “ newish democracies ” in “ Latin America , Africa , Asia , Eastern Europe and so on , ” i.e. , not in DT West . This qualification –that DT “ deep NN ” idea is something only to be found in foreign , backwards polities –harkens back to DT origins of DT phrase . DT term “ deep NN ” itself is a translation of a Turkish phrase , derin devlet , WDT rose to prominence after DT Susurluk incident exposed DT Turkish secret NN and its NATO / Gladio / drug running / terrorist associations . PRP has become increasingly allowable for opinion makers in DT MSM to cite DT Turkish or DT Egyptian “ deep NN ” as a real phenomenon ( or at least a real possibility ) while simultaneously deriding DT possibility IN PRP exists in DT West . However in recent NNS researchers IN Peter Dale Scott have developed and expanded DT concept to explain how Western political institutions function . This seems to have been picked up by NNS IN Mike Lofgren , a retired Congressional staffer who has described how DT American deep NN involves a cross-party consensus on key political issues , or Philip Giraldi , DT former intelligence agent whose recent musings on DT American deep NN received copious attention from DT mainstream press . CD way to look at this development is as an extension of a phenomenon WDT I noted several NNS ago : a process of indoctrination WDT has begun to inform DT NN IN EX is a shadowy elite in control of DT NN stage and prepare them to accept DT fact . Nearly a decade ago Kissinger mini-me David Rothkopf came out with his book “ Superclass ” revealing DT group of 6,000 or so non-state actors with DT ability to enact policies and further agendas across NN lines . Since DT NN a remarkable number of conspiracies - DT - dare - not - be- mentioned from DT CFR to DT Bilderberg Group to DT Bohemian Grove are now banal political talking points . Whereas mainstream radio hosts once played Twilight Zone music when callers tried to discuss DT CFR , now Hillary NNP blithely admits IN DT NNP Department receives marching orders from them ; whereas DT Bilderberg Group was once subject to a complete NN blackout , PRP now has its own website and press releases . But again : why now ? Partly this has to be due to DT fact IN in DT post - 9/11 , post - Iraq , post - bailout , post - Hope and NNP NN , PRP has become impossible to maintain DT illusion IN PRP is DT political front men who are running DT show . No NN believes this lie anymore , and PRP shows . Even scientific studies are now demonstrating IN DT NNP NNPS is not run by political parties but by pockets of special interest . Truly DT NN toothpaste is out of DT tube and EX ’s no point in trying to put PRP back . While in JJ ways this represents DT crowning achievement of DT tireless efforts of generations of NN researchers who have toiled in relative obscurity , PRP is not an unmitigated good . As PRP will see in DT 2016 prospective this weekend , DT revelation of DT ruling elite coincides with a meltdown of social cohesion WDT is giving rise to dark forces WDT portend a very tumultuous NN . In DT meantime , I ’m interested in your thoughts on this subject . Why do PRP VB DT “ deep NN ” idea is being taken up in DT mainstream now ? Do PRP VB EX is a strategy to these revelations or is PRP a rearguard effort to whitewash DT undeniable ? Corbett Report members are invited to leave your comments below .

text: A man who believes NNP is flat , and was ready to launch himself from a rocket in California on Saturday afternoon to prove PRP , has canceled his plans . At least for now . Not having DT required federal permits plus mechanical problems with his " motorhome / rocket launcher " forced self - taught rocket scientist " Mad " Mike Hughes to put his experiment on hold . ' " PRP 's been very disappointing , " he VBD . Hughes is a 61 - NN - old limo driver who has spent DT last few NNS building a steam - powered rocket out of salvage parts in his garage . His project has cost him $ 20,000 , which includes Rust - Oleum paint to fancy PRP up and a motor home he bought on Craigslist WDT he converted into a ramp . DT FAA , Hughes VBD , told him " PRP can't honestly approve PRP , PRP just VBP IN PRP are VBG to do PRP RB . " NN of his plans began to spread Monday and gained worldwide attention , which Hughes believes is why BLM began to push for permits . text: DT following essay is reprinted with permission from DT Conversation , an online publication covering DT latest research . Ancient and quaint seem DT days of witch crazes , demon scares and tulip manias . Instances of mass hysteria MD strike PRP as rare events in modern advanced societies . But such outbreaks are products of their times . PRP ’re still around today , just in different guises . Aided and abetted by its status as an internet meme , DT myth of an evil , supernatural Slenderman has been panicking adolescents since 2009 , even culminating in an attempted murder by proxy . If PRP ’s easy to brush this off as a case of impressionable teens with too much internet access , then what of otherwise rational late 20th - century American adults participating in suicide cults , Puerto Rico ’s mythical cattle - killing Chupacabra monster , DT “ irrational exuberance ” of DT dot - com bubble in DT 1990s , or DT seemingly insane rush to make bad real estate investments in DT latter 2000s ? As this article is being written , DT U.S. is embroiled in a diplomatic dustup with Cuba WDT has all DT classic symptoms of a collective delusion . DT U.S. NNP Department claims its diplomats in Havana were subjected to “ sonic attacks ” WDT produced a range of physical symptoms including hearing loss , headaches and dizziness . Consequently , DT NNP Department pulled out most of its embassy staff and sent packing most Cuban diplomats stationed in DT U.S. Although post - hoc JJ exams have identified unusual physical conditions in some diplomats , EX is still no direct evidence tying them to DT alleged sonic attacks . Moreover , DT political timing , logistical demands and absence of a plausible technology put DT likelihood of DT attacks at virtually zero . So how do otherwise logical and informed 21st - century NNS fall under DT spell of these mass delusions ? Over DT past several decades , psychologists and sociologists have used examples IN these to dig into when and how this kind of false belief gains traction . Collective delusions are DT culprits behind mass hysterias and related phenomena . As traditionally defined , PRP ’re characterized by a rapid , spontaneous and temporary spread of false beliefs within a circumscribed population . Nowadays DT circumscribed population can be a virtual NN , bounded only by cyberconnections to a shared source of misinformation . DT recent upsurge in vocal flat - NNP proponents , for example , is not DT result of geographical neighbors whipping each other into a near frenzy . Social NN makes PRP easy to find IN - minded others , serve distorted information to DT curious , and stir up excitement about events such as DT 2017 eclipse , celebrity endorsements , and a proposed rocket launch by a flat - NNP proponent intended to prove once and for all IN PRP are all living on a disc . Collective delusions emerge under a combination of several conditions . Each of these precursors is straightforward enough , but PRP ’s harder to foresee when PRP might occur in concert . In turn , this makes predicting delusional outbreaks a very inexact NN . DT most obvious precursor is DT presence of multiple NNS who are sufficiently connected so as to share information or experiences . Second , just as an isolated individual MD develop some beliefs and behaviors WDT depart from prevailing norms , collective delusions and responses are more likely to occur in relatively insular groups or networks . Third , a collective delusion is more likely to take hold if DT group is undergoing some kind of distress . This MD be rising unemployment , political destabilization or an enemy ’s threats of warfare . On a smaller scale , a town MD lose a crucial employer , or a fire - and - brimstone minister can instigate a satanic panic with rumors of baby - killing cults . And fourth , DT stressors are potent enough to trigger , in at least some individuals , either a psychosomatic response or scapegoating behavior . Psychosomatic reactions — physical symptoms with psychological causes — MD be as mild as itching or as severe as blindness . Scapegoating involves blaming a group of innocent ( or possibly nonexistent ) others for causing problems — psychosomatic or otherwise . When conditions are ripe , this catalyzing subset of group members sets off a chain reaction . PRP begin to seek and identify external causes for their distress , or sources for its relief . Psychosomatic responses spread ; contempt for DT scapegoats grows . NNS become hypervigilant and toss critical thinking out DT window , looking for and finding imagined threats . NN theories are spawned , angels and demons invoked , fears stoked , panic induced . DT supernatural MD start to seem natural . As more and more group members become ensnared in a positive feedback loop , DT perceived threat is legitimized , only broadening and deepening social distress further . Because PRP are inherently newsworthy , mass delusions are picked up by mass NN which fan DT flames even more . In these ways , a nonexistent threat can set off a self - sustaining cascade of irrationality WDT lasts until DT perceived threat recedes . Delusion everywhere , to different degrees ? While descriptions of mass hysterias make great reading , PRP represent only DT far end of a continuum of what sociologists VBP me call social diffusion processes . For DT most part , these are quite mundane — PRP might recognize a few from your own daily life . While around DT NN stock market bubbles and bank runs make NN , less frenetic responses to perceived threats and conspiracies abound : DT 9/11 “ truthers , ” DT recent uptick in flat - NNP beliefs , fears of gluten and genetically modified foods , NN NN deniers , wars on NN on some liberal college campuses , and more . Even DT desire to be fashionable can be seen as a response to DT fear of being excluded . Simple mathematical equations can quite elegantly describe DT speed , duration and extensiveness of DT spread of beliefs and behaviors . A typical “ diffusion model ” shows how DT penetration through a population of such things as beliefs , behaviors , illnesses , innovations or products is determined by just a few parameters . These typically include DT group ’s size , DT density of its members ’ interconnections and DT inherent contagiousness of DT thing being spread . Irrational beliefs , and DT often ill - considered responses PRP engender , can spread IN an infection across groups as large as nations or as small as nuclear families . Sunshine , as PRP say , is DT best disinfectant . Social impact theory MD suggest IN DT best approach to administering social disinfectant is via large numbers of geographically nearby , authoritative nonbelievers . In DT case of DT supposed sonic attacks in Cuba , CD approach to stemming DT scare MD be a rapidly deployed on - site investigation by acoustic experts , neurologists , psychiatrists and military strategists . A folklorist as well MD n’t hurt . Short of such a full - frontal counterattack , disseminating easy - to - digest skeptical information as early as possible in DT process MD help to slow DT diffusion process and quell DT mass delusion . PRP ’s easy enough to be caught up in a mass delusion . Fads and fashions are great examples , though their most harmful consequence MD be our embarrassment when PRP look back on some of our previous style choices . As long as NNS are stressed and living in groups , most of our mass delusions will remain invisible to PRP until PRP have already run their course . DT simply means IN PRP can clearly see something 20 feet away WDT PRP should be able to see from DT distance . If PRP have 20/100 vision , PRP MD still be able to see an object clearly from 20 feet away , but someone with normal vision MD see PRP clearly from 100 feet . Assuming IN all of DT body parts and processes WDT are necessary for clear vision are working normally , then DT limitations on how far PRP can see come down to : • DT size of DT object WDT PRP ’re viewing NNS often use DT term “ sightline ” in a theater to describe DT line of sight from an audience member ’s seat to DT stage .
