text: PRP is stunning IN I have to write this article , but I do . A popular rapper has launched a GoFundMe to prove IN DT NNP is flat . Several professional basketball players have RB weighed in with their perspective . DT picture of NNP below is pretty definitive , but EX are basic meteorological " pieces of evidence " too . Herein , I explore three of DT most important ones . Sunsets : Have PRP ever watched a sunset ? If so , PRP is a compelling " duh " WDT DT NNP is not flat . If PRP observe DT horizon at sunset , typically DT sun disappears from your view in a bottom - up direction . In a very simple experiment described on DT PBS website , This fact is how ancient sailors knew IN NNP was spherical ( and DT fact IN PRP did not sail off of some mythical edge ) . As DT sun falls increasingly below DT horizon , more of DT shorter wavelength light is scattered out as PRP travels through more of DT atmosphere . This scattering leaves DT longer wavelength colors of reddish - orange . General circulation of DT atmosphere : PRP is intuitive to most NNS IN PRP is warm in DT tropical regions of DT NN and cool in DT polar regions . Because of DT NNP 's curvature , DT mid-section of NNP receives more of DT direct radiation from DT sun . This means IN EX is more heat concentrated in DT tropical atmosphere and ocean . DT NASA satellite maps below illustrate IN this radiation imbalance is prevalent irrespective of season . DT NNP is continually trying to remove DT excess heat in DT tropics . CD way IN NNP tries to put itself on a " heat " diet to remove excess heat in DT mid-section is through poleward - moving ocean currents . A good example in DT NNP NNPS is DT Gulf Stream . PRP is a warm , poleward flowing current . Hurricanes are another mechanism WDT transports excess heat from DT tropics to DT poles . DT general circulation of DT atmosphere RB evolves because of DT net imbalance of heating . In its simplest form , DT air rises over DT warmer tropics and sinks over DT cooler polar regions . This is a thermally - direct circulation . In reality , PRP is a bit more complex as described on NOAA website , Since DT NN rotates , DT axis is tilted , and EX is more land mass in DT northern hemisphere than in DT southern hemisphere , DT actual JJ pattern is much more complicated . Instead of CD large circulation between DT poles and DT equator , EX are three circulations . ( 1 ) Hadley cell - Low latitude air movement toward DT equator WDT with heating , rises vertically , with poleward movement in DT upper atmosphere . This forms a convection cell WDT dominates tropical and sub-tropical climates . ( 2 ) Ferrel cell - A mid-latitude mean atmospheric circulation cell for weather named by Ferrel in DT 19th century . In this cell DT air flows poleward and eastward near DT surface and equatorward and westward at higher levels . ( 3 ) Polar cell - Air rises , diverges , and travels toward DT poles . Once over DT poles , DT air sinks , forming DT polar highs . At DT surface air diverges outward from DT polar highs . Surface winds in DT polar cell are easterly ( polar easterlies ) . This general circulation model is directly tied to JJ patterns of high - low pressure , jet streams , and weather systems . Weather radar : I cut my teeth as a radar meteorologist . Some of my earliest graduate work at Florida NNP University developed weather radar algorithms to track hurricanes . I RB teach a radar and mesoscale meteorology course at DT University of Georgia . CD of DT fundamental concepts WDT PRP discuss is how curvature of DT NNP impacts rainfall detection . DT example at a National Weather Service website describes PRP well , A storm between DT Birmingham ( BMX ) and Maxwell AFB ( MXX ) radars ( see image below ) . If DT storm is a good distance away from BMX , due to DT fact IN DT radar beam is straight and does n't follow DT NNP 's surface , DT lowest elevation scan from BMX MD only be able to " see " into DT middle portion of DT storm . If DT same storm is closer to MXX , this will allow PRP to " look " into DT lower portion of DT same storm , possibly allowing PRP to detect a rotational couplet closer to DT NNP 's surface . From this , PRP MD infer IN given DT right circumstances , DT formation of a tornado is possible . By DT way , I still cannot believe I had to write this .

text: Mapping CD of DT flattest parts of DT NN will help satellite calibration . A precise topographical map has been made of CD of DT flattest places on NNP : DT salar de Uyuni , a vast plain of white cemented salt in DT mountains of Bolivia . DT ground survey , aided by JJ positioning systems ( GPS ) , shows variations in elevation of less than a metre across an area almost half DT size of Wales . Intriguingly , DT work reveals bumps in DT salt WDT lie above lumps of dense rock buried several kilometres below , just as NN will bulge over a bump on DT ocean floor . Knowing exactly where these bumps lie will help researchers to use DT flat as a giant calibration device for satellite - based radar and laser altimeters . Adrian Borsa , a geophysicist at DT NNP Geological Survey in Pasadena , California , led DT work WDT is now reporting DT most precise GPS characterization yet of DT salt flat , accurate to 2.2 centimetres . Borsa and his colleagues began DT research in 2002 , with a campaign WDT combined data from fixed GPS stations with ‘ kinematic GPS ’ data obtained by crisscrossing DT salar in trucks fitted with GPS antennae . “ PRP ’s as if PRP ’re on a white ocean with no waves , ” says Borsa . “ PRP see DT horizon , DT curvature of NNP . PRP ’s absolutely featureless . ” DT NN was commissioned specifically as a way to calibrate NASA ’s ICESat , launched in 2003 to VB NN sheets in Antarctica and Greenland . Satellites can calibrate their altimeters by bouncing signals off DT ocean surface , DT height of which is well established . But because of atmospheric interference , tides and waves , EX are uncertainties . Borsa says DT salar , now so accurately mapped and with dry , clear skies , is about five times better than DT ocean as a reference point . DT results have been helpful , says Sinead Farrell , a researcher at DT NNP National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration who is using ICESat to measure changes in NN NN . “ PRP ’s DT first calibration surface WDT PRP look at , ” she says . “ DT information WDT PRP provide is useful to all DT other teams . ” She adds IN DT salt flat is RB being used for Envisat , a European satellite , and MD be used to calibrate future orbiters such as Cryosat - 2 , a planned European NN - monitoring mission . DT strength of gravity varies from place to place around NNP — imperceptibly to humans but in ways WDT NNS have mapped precisely — owing to DT density of objects nearby . Borsa found IN DT salt had created faint mounds of some 40 centimetres in height over regions of slightly higher gravity , owing to high - density volcanic rocks kilometres below . “ PRP found a rare breed of topography , ” says Borsa , who says IN this is DT first NN a land surface has been shown to undulate in step with DT gravitational field IN this . “ Here ’s a place where PRP see DT imprint of DT gravitational field due to buried mountain ranges . ” Borsa has a theory as to how this happened . When DT salar floods , as PRP does every five NNS or so , salt dissolves and , in solution , flows to regions of higher gravity , he says . This phenomenon is already known to oceanographers : DT free - standing ocean surface changes slightly to match DT pull of gravity underneath . So EX are slight bulges in DT ocean in places directly above submarine seamounts . “ PRP VBP IN ocean surfaces follow DT gravitational potential surface : DT geoid , ” says Farrell , who was not a part of DT NN . “ PRP is a JJ result to show IN DT salt flat RB follows DT geoid . ” DT next step for those with a geological interest , Borsa says , is to take out DT portion of DT elevation variations WDT are due to gravity and see what ’s left . So far , he is seeing a strange , regularly patterned checkerboard surface . He does n’t VB what MD produce PRP , but speculates IN PRP MD reflect DT imprint of periodic pressures due to prevailing winds . text: “ Community – How to live together ? How to communicate effectively ? Who knows how PRP ’ve experienced a sense of community in other dimensions , once upon a long NN ago ? By being informed about their impact on others who make an effort to offer feedback , honouring their own value as much as DT value of DT person on DT other side of DT screen , or table . DT desire IN PRP ’s presence matters in a community , can lead to different expressions , depending on a force of will , making a point for DT sake of fanatism , a need for attention or competition , by challenging an authority , or a warm - hearted service as a means to fulfilment of PRP ’s own desire in sync with PRP ’s desire to serve a general sense of wellbeing in all . Issues WDT are rising between 2 NNS , showing up in their CD - on - CD communication online , or in DT practice of working together in DT physical NN , should best be kept in DT close encounter of a duet . PRP takes two to tango and not CD or more than 2 , for is n’t stepping on each other ’s toes sufficient pain to pay attention properly ? To me , PRP ’s an interesting subject to discuss community - creation and without expecting PRP or others here to address all of them , here are a couple of questions : – How does PRP look IN , your favoured community ? How MD PRP describe your life in PRP ? – What makes or breaks a community ? – What ’s DT difference in a virtual and physical community ? text: ( Reuters ) - Apple Inc ’s JJ iPhones will use recycled rare NN elements in a key component , DT company VBD on Wednesday . Apple VBD PRP will use recycled rare earths in its “ Taptic Engine , ” a part WDT lets iPhones mimic a physical button click despite being a flat pane of glass . DT part is about CD - quarter of DT rare NN elements inside DT iPhone models . Rare earths , a group of 17 specialized minerals , have become a flash point in trade tensions between DT NNP NNPS and NNP . DT elements are used in weapons , consumer electronics and other goods . NNP dominates DT processing of DT raw minerals , and has implied through its NN - controlled NN WDT PRP MD restrict rare earths sales to DT NNP NNPS , just as PRP did to Japan after a diplomatic dispute in 2010 . Lisa Jackson , Apple ’s vice NN of environment , policy and social initiatives , VBD Apple ’s use of recycled rare earths was “ not related ” to trade tensions but MD help PRP maintain a steady supply . “ This is CD of those happy coincidences where what is good for DT NN is really good for business at DT same NN , ” Jackson told Reuters . “ CD of DT things PRP talk about a lot internally , just in general , is how much more resilient this makes our supply chain . ” In consumer electronics , rare earths reside in tiny speakers and actuators . DT parts are so small IN collecting them for recycling is difficult and expensive . For now , Apple will use recycled rare earths from an outside supplier , not from previously used iPhones . Apple declined to name DT supplier or say what products DT rare earths were recovered from , though DT company did say DT source was post - industrial , meaning material generated during manufacturing processes rather than from discarded consumer products . Jackson VBD IN Apple ’s scale - JJ iPhone models are typically sell tens of millions of units per NN - helped make DT project economically viable . “ PRP have essentially made a market for this entrepreneur , this innovator , who found a way to recycle rare earths , ” Jackson VBD . DT company previously disclosed IN cobalt recovered from iPhone batteries disassembled by robots at its recycling labs in Texas is put into JJ iPhone batteries . Apple is experimenting with ways to recover rare earths from its phones using its robots , which can remove tiny parts and separate them into collection bins to aggregate enough material to make recycling viable . DT company is RB researching ways IN conventional recyclers , who shred devices and separate out DT various materials , MD tweak their lines to recover DT elements , information WDT Jackson VBD Apple is open to sharing . “ EX are some innovations of ours WDT PRP actually VBP NNS to copy . So as much as possible - as long as PRP does n’t give away some of our other design and engineering innovation - PRP are happy to bring along DT recycling industry , ” Jackson VBD . “ PRP have started to be much more transparent around this technology development than PRP usually are . ”

text: Come here , Imma gonna told PRP something . Gonna teach PRP about DT Monster today ! Instead of my usual review of DT week , I ’m VBG to put up for your reading pleasure , five of my articles PRP MD , or MD not have seen from DT five hundred sum odd pieces DT Tea Party Tribune has been kind enough to publish for me over DT last three NNS . When PRP write an article PRP tend to VB PRP ’s a masterpiece . I bury “ Easter Eggs ” in every NN . A good example of DT is in “ NNP Baby and DT Trip To Bountiful , ” where in CD line I replaced “ DT Principal ” with DT words “ DT Principle ” alluding to polygamy . PRP got by a lot of NNS but DT principal who let my grandson VB skipping across Main Street in Brigham City got my point , and he ’s been mad ever since . Sorry for Party rocking Dude ! I RB include at least CD mistake for liberals who search my stuff to challenge my literacy . An PRP ’s for its or a comma for a period . For every fifty to CD hundred articles WDT are penned , PRP will be DT “ monster ! ” While on a typical run an article will struggle for reads , these certain works will take off a bit faster . Then PRP ’ll notice a comment later on DT article , but not from DT Trib . PRP ’ll come from USA Today , or some other publication where part or all of DT article was used or cited . DT ’s when PRP VBP back and check DT numbers and VBD article will move into DT “ DAYUM ” section . These five are those types of works . I did n’t learn journalism in any college . I learned to spin a yarn in Nashville . DT same methods WDT make a song “ cook ” will chicken fry an article . Methods UH make a point and return to PRP toward DT end to reinforce DT theme . Do n’t keep repeating “ ands ” and “ buts . ” Write IN PRP speak . I do n’t have a big problem with spelling because I ’m ignorant and do n’t use a whole lot of big words . I try not to lie . . . much , but I ’ll use innuendo to worm around a subject or person ( such as DT principal ) to make my point . FYI : DT reason my five NN old grand baby got out in DT street unsupervised was he was too infatuated with a certain teacher . Little light hearted jab on an embarrassing era of Mormon history , add a dash of innuendo and voila ! Principal soup ! But PRP VBP I ’m bad . While I ’m on DT subject , I VBP to explain why I pick on Mormons so often . Even though I ’m an old “ Reptile Bait ” I ’ve been covered UP with Latter Day Saints for over thirty NNS . My wife ’s and for DT matter my daughter in law ’s family are Temple Worthy all DT way back to Joseph Smith . I did write Joseph Did PRP VB about DT Mormon culture , and I ’m fascinated with their history , but if I ever stepped into a Temple my hair MD catch on fire . I use DT same method when addressing race baiters , Political Correctness , and NNS who are confused by common sense . I read my stuff out loud . DT ’s an old songwriter ’s trick . My friends VBP I ’m crazy because I always seem to be talking to myself . If PRP wo n’t roll smoothly off your tongue PRP will irritate or confuse DT reader . Finding subjects to write about is not hard . I can actually write about things I VBP very little of . When I began to write for Raging Elephants Radio on Doc Greene ’s show I actually knew very little about DT Texas movements of secession and nullification . In NN I learned , but for about six months PRP was mostly style , style , style . I do research . Usually on YouTube . I will sometimes spend up to a week familiarizing myself with a subject before I write anything about PRP . CD subject I never MD really cope with was DT Flat NNP Society . I tried , but I simply MD n’t drink enough whiskey to make any sense out of PRP . I try not to rag on DT Cartels or Muslims too much because I do n’t VB to VB bombed or shot . DT all having been VBN , I VBP PRP will enjoy these pieces . IN a hit song I MD feel them coming off my pen , so to speak . Each NN directly addresses some facet of DT human experience . Each NN promoted itself to DT “ DAYUM ” status . I do n’t buy into inspiration but I will say these five came out of nowhere , so I guess EX is someone out RB looking out for PRP . PRP has been my honor and my joy to share with PRP guys and gals . PRP strive to make DT articles informative , entertaining , and diverse . All PRP see will cause PRP to stop and consider . PRP try not to drone on with DT same old day after day clap trap WDT MD have driven PRP away from mainstream NN . PRP will read things here IN PRP will see nowhere else . PRP are from London to Austin to DT Escalanté . So , what ’s your cut of meat ? Shop around . DT Butcher Shop is happy to fill your order . For 7 NNS PRP have not asked for any donations , and have built this project with our own funds as PRP grew . PRP are now experiencing ever increasing growing pains due to DT large number of websites and projects PRP represent . So PRP have just installed donation buttons on our websites and ask IN PRP consider this when PRP visit them . Nothing is too small . text: Sometimes when PRP 're reading Neal Stephenson , he does n't just seem IN CD of DT best novelists writing in English right now ; he seems IN DT only NN . No other author embeds characters in an authentically contemporary Web of technological connections DT way Stephenson does . His characters text and tweet and play massively multiplayer games . PRP can see why other writers let this stuff slide . PRP have to come up with JJ kinds of stories in a networked NN . DT usual missed connections and mistaken identities do n't cut PRP  how JJ Shakespearean tragedies MD have been averted with GPS and Facebook ? Not IN PRP do n't have problems now , God knows , but when PRP take our modern technological predicament seriously , PRP realize IN those old problems have to be rerouted , and IN DT stories have to VB shape accordingly . PRP start to become less about missed connections and more about overconnectedness . PRP start to look IN Reamde . Reamde is Stephenson 's 10th novel ( not counting his occasional collaborations and DT unclassifiable online fiction project DT Mongoliad ) , and he has yet to write an uninteresting NN . text: What is Term Structure Of Interest Rates ? Term structure of interest rates , commonly known as DT yield curve , depicts DT interest rates of similar quality bonds at different maturities . Essentially , term structure of interest rates is DT relationship between interest rates or bond yields and different terms or maturities . When graphed , DT term structure of interest rates is known as a yield curve , and PRP plays a crucial role in identifying DT current NN of an economy . DT term structure of interest rates reflects expectations of market participants about future changes in interest rates and their assessment of monetary policy conditions . In general terms , yields increase in line with maturity , giving rise to an upward - sloping , or normal , yield curve . DT yield curve is primarily used to illustrate DT term structure of interest rates for standard U.S. NN - issued securities . This is important as PRP is a gauge of DT debt market 's feeling about risk . DT most frequently reported yield curve compares DT three - month , two - NN , five - NN , 10 - NN , and 30 - NN U.S. Treasury debt . ( Yield curve rates are usually available at DT Treasury 's interest rate web sites by 6:00 p.m. ET each trading day ) , DT term of DT structure of interest rates has three primary shapes . • Upward sloping — long term yields are higher than short term yields . This is considered to be DT " normal " slope of DT yield curve and signals IN DT economy is in an expansionary mode . • Downward sloping — short term yields are higher than long term yields . Dubbed as an " inverted " yield curve and signifies IN DT economy is in , or about to enter , a recessive period . • Flat — very little variation between short and long term yields . Signals WDT DT market is unsure about DT future direction of DT economy . This yield curve is considered DT benchmark for DT credit market , as PRP reports DT yields of risk - free fixed income investments across a range of maturities . In DT credit market , banks and lenders use this benchmark as a gauge for determining lending and savings rates . Yields along DT U.S. Treasury yield curve are primarily influenced by DT Federal Reserve ’s federal funds rate . Other yield curves can RB be developed based upon a comparison of credit investments with similar risk characteristics . Most often , DT Treasury yield curve is upward - sloping . CD basic explanation for this phenomenon is IN investors demand higher interest rates for longer - term investments as compensation for investing their money in longer - duration investments . Occasionally , long - term yields MD fall below short - term yields , creating an inverted yield curve WDT is generally regarded as a harbinger of recession . DT Outlook for DT Overall Credit Market DT term structure of interest rates and DT direction of DT yield curve can be used to judge DT overall credit market environment . A flattening of DT yield curve means longer - term rates are falling in comparison to short - term rates , which MD have implications for a recession . When short - term rates begin to exceed long - term rates , DT yield curve is inverted , and a recession is likely occurring or approaching . When longer - term rates fall below shorter - term rates , DT outlook for credit over DT long term is weak . This is often consistent with a weak or recessionary economy , which is defined by two consecutive periods of negative growth in DT gross domestic product ( GDP ) . While other factors , including foreign demand for U.S. Treasuries , can RB result in an inverted yield curve , historically , an inverted yield curve has been an indicator of an impending recession in DT NNP NNPS .

text: A honeycombed cave formed untold millennia ago beneath what is now southeastern Minnesota . Larry Edwards is standing in a subterranean chamber , his headlamp illuminating a series of mineral formations . From DT cathedral - IN ceiling dangle tubes known as soda straws . Along a waist - high ledge squats a trio of stout stalagmites , their surfaces slick with ecru-colored ooze . “ Now DT ’s DT kind of thing PRP might be interested in , ” Edwards says , bending to peer at CD . I hear DT plink , plink , plink of falling droplets . Drop by drop DT stalagmite has grown to its present height — about 18 inches — over who knows how JJ centuries . Edwards , a geochemist at DT University of Minnesota and a pioneer in DT use of cave formations to document ancient NN , is not planning to collect stalagmites today . But two specimens severed from their moorings when DT owner of DT cave complex , Spring Valley Caverns , opened a deeper passageway recently provided Edwards and his colleagues with a record of extreme rainfall events over DT past 3,000 NNS . Edwards wonders if some of Spring Valley ’s stalagmites MD contain older records still , dating back to when giant glaciers covered much of DT Northern Hemisphere or even to CD of DT distant warm periods , or interglacials , WDT punctuated DT NN age NN . A short NN later , PRP retrace our steps , navigating DT sequence of walkways and ladders WDT leads to DT cave ’s entrance . As PRP step into DT light , Edwards turns to me . “ Do PRP notice all DT sounds , all DT smells ? ” he says . “ When PRP come up , PRP seem so pronounced . ” Edwards , renowned among paleoclimatologists for his cave findings , is n’t much of a spelunker . “ PRP ’s not IN I ’m claustrophobic , ” he says with a shrug , “ I just VBP PRP better up here . ” To Edwards , a stalagmite is more than a chunk of geology WDT looks IN a modern sculpture : PRP ’s a collection of NN sensors , rather IN tree rings but extending often hundreds of thousands of NNS back in NN . Perhaps DT only other earthly archives WDT have provided such a high - resolution portrait of DT past half - million NNS are NN cores . But unlike NN , caves can be found all over DT NN . “ I MD VB so far as to say IN these are among DT most important paleoclimate records PRP have , ” David Battisti , a University of Washington atmospheric scientist , says of DT cave data . From Edwards ’ lab is emerging a high - resolution picture of precipitation patterns long ago . Just as important , his work is providing DT scientific community with an increasingly precise NN scale , CD WDT is bringing other records into alignment . Edwards and his colleagues have used cave formations to tighten up DT timing for ancient rises in carbon dioxide locked into Antarctica ’s NN . PRP ’ve even used them to date skeletal remains WDT trace human migration routes . Why should PRP care about what happened so long ago ? A reason can be found in DT mounting nervousness over DT consequences of JJ NN . With heat - trapping carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere already reaching levels not seen for at least 800,000 NNS , NNS IN Edwards worry IN weather patterns MD undergo sudden , destabilizing changes . NN cores from Greenland , for instance , reveal a sequence of abrupt temperature oscillations over DT past 140,000 NNS , with severe cold snaps leavened by a series of sudden , if ephemeral , warmings . Eerily similar oscillations are now showing up in DT precipitation records from caves . In a landmark NN , Edwards and his collaborators compared DT precipitation swings captured by Hulu Cave on DT outskirts of Nanjing , NNP , with temperatures encoded by Greenland ’s NN . Plotted as graphs , and positioned side by side , DT dips and valleys in both records are sharp and — for DT 60,000 - NN period covered by DT stalagmites — synchronous .

text: DT biggest solar flare since 2017 and JJ sunspots suggests our star MD be ' waking up ' , according to Nasa . DT NNP space agency 's Solar Dynamics Observatory ( SDO ) recently spotted DT largest flare to come from DT Sun since October 2017 . A solar flare is a flash of radiation from sunspots , cooler patches on DT Sun 's surface . Nasa has RB observed more of these sunspots and thinks DT giant star MD be about to enter a JJ cycle . DT Sun actually has an 11 NN cycle and increased activity hints PRP MD be moving towards a more active stage . However , DT strong solar flare spotted recently posed no threat to NNP and was n't heading in our direction . Nasa VBD DT flare was RB not strong enough to alert NNS at DT Space Weather Prediction Center . PRP 've had a few months of very little solar activity so astronomers have been keeping their eye on DT Sun to see what happens next . Nasa says PRP wo n't VB whether DT JJ sunspots indicate increased activity for a JJ more months . DT space agency VBD : " PRP takes at least six months of solar observations and sunspot - counting after a minimum to VB when PRP 's occurred . " Because DT minimum is defined by DT lowest number of sunspots in a cycle , NNS need to see DT numbers consistently rising before PRP can determine when exactly PRP were at DT bottom . text: “ Josie and DT Pussycats ” is a “ girl band movie ” aimed at NNS and young adolescents , especially young girls . At first glance , DT flick seems to be CD of those generic , God-awful teen movies . However , a closer look reveals how its overall tone and message are in sharp contrast to stereotypes of DT genre . “ Josie and DT Pussycats ” is indeed an acerbic critique of a morally bankrupt music industry . DT most surprising thing about this 2001 movie is its frighteningly accurate predictions regarding today ’s pop music and its Illuminati agenda : mind controlled artists , hypnotized masses , subliminal messages … PRP ’s all RB . This article will examine DT movie ’s themes and their relation to today ’s music business context . Josie and DT Pussycats was released in 2001 by Universal . In music industry terms , 2001 is ancient history . Just to put PRP back in DT context of DT era : N’Sync were still singing Bye Bye Bye , Cisco wanted to see your thong and everybody was wondering Who Let DT Dogs Out . Teens were VBG crazy for boy bands IN DT Backstreet Boys and everybody was dancing to Ja Rule . So , yes , PRP was a long NN ago . Josie and DT Pussycats came out during DT period , but PRP seems to foretell DT death of DT era . DT movie starts with members of DT boy band “ Du Jour , ” a spoof on DT Backstreet Boys , dying in a forced plane crash . DT group is then replaced by a girl band with a semi- punky attitude and non-threatening pop rock music . This pretty much reflects what actually happened in DT NNS following DT release of this movie : N’Sync and DT Backstreet Boys disappeared from DT preteen music market and were replaced by Miley Cyrus , Hilary Duff , DT Jonas Brothers , and so on . Despite DT movie ’s apparent lightheartedness , PRP displays a harsh and sustained judgment of DT music business . PRP is RB severely critical of DT NN of America ’s youth . Teens and preteens are constantly depicted as a herd of brainless drones who are incapable of independent thinking and prone to hysteria . But behind DT usual “ OMG these big corporations are so corporation - y ” criticism , Josie and DT Pussycats tackles , in an odd and humorous way , some of DT darker sides of DT music industry . These include DT mind control of DT masses and entertainers and even DT assassination of artists who rebel or ask too JJ questions . DT Boy Band WDT Knew Too Much As stated above , DT movie starts with Du Jour ( DT boy band “ of DT day ” ) enjoying their enormous success . In their private jet , DT vain and half - witted group of singers complain about petty things to their record executive Wyatt , who acts more IN a legal guardian . Or , in mind control terms , a handler . DT band then asks Wyatt about strange sounds PRP heard in DT acapella tracks of their latest song … and PRP VBP some answers . Wyatt ’s answer is quite extreme : He straps on a parachute and jumps off DT plane , leaving Du Jour to die in what NN will refer to an “ accidental ” plane crash . This has actually happened in reality numerous times . Artists who start uncovering DT darker side of DT entertainment business , who ask too JJ questions , or worse , who plan to reveal these things to DT NN , are often dropped , publicly humiliated and scorned . And , as in Du Jour ’s case , PRP are RB sometimes killed for displaying such behavior . Du Jour was signed with DT NN ’s biggest record label , Mega Records . PRP soon learn IN DT company is much more than a record label . Mega Records is , in fact , “ in business ” with DT American NN and DT FBI to brainwash DT “ most influential demographic in DT entire population ” : DT youth . While giving a tour of DT label ’s headquarters to visitors from foreign NNS ( who are RB to learn how PRP ’s done ) , Fiona , DT eccentric CEO of Mega Records , has this to say : Fiona ’s office then turns into an elevator and starts descending into a secret underground facility . DT label ’s headquarters is , in fact , a control center for manipulating DT minds of DT American youth . PRP creates JJ fads , decides everything from “ what clothes are in style to what slang is in vogue , ” with DT ultimate goal of making DT youth continually spend money on CD temporary trend after another . Reality is , of course , more complex than DT . Trends are ( probably ) not created in an underground control center in NNP York City . EX is , however , truth in this near - cartoonish depiction of DT music business . DT entertainment industry is indeed connected to “ higher powers ” ( as personified in DT movie by DT FBI agent ) in order to sell DT youth on DT JJ elite ’s agenda . Popular culture not only attempts to sell products and brands to DT audience but RB ideas , values , and attitudes . In previous articles on DT Vigilant Citizen , PRP have established IN today ’s agenda focuses on concepts such as transhumanism , Illuminati symbolism , premature sexualization , police NN / militarization , and so forth . Fiona then explains IN her label inserts subliminal messages in pop music in order to manipulate DT youth into buying products and ideas . DT label thus goes beyond DT simple advertising of products . PRP conceals hidden messages in DT music WDT bypass DT audience ’s conscious minds in order to directly reach their subconscious . After DT presentation , a foreigner asks Fiona “ How can PRP control DT rock bands ? What if CD of them discovers PRP are placing hidden messages in their music ? ” This is what she answers : EX are numerous real - life examples of celebrities who have been silenced , CD of DT most shocking and evident being Michael Jackson . After decades of being controlled by DT entertainment business , he attempted to break free in DT late 90s . He even spoke out about PRP . He then endured NNS of scandals , trials , JJ ridicule and financial difficulties . Michael Jackson still managed to keep singing and dancing , even organizing a NN tour for 2010 . Since previous attempts to destroy him failed , MJ got silenced … by force . So , PRP MD seem IN ten NNS after DT release of this movie , shady celebrity sacrifices are still happening . In an attempt to “ take things to DT next level , ” Mega Records develops a JJ technology called “ 3DX Surround Sound . ” This JJ technology “ makes DT music feel IN PRP is happening all around PRP . ” All DT kids who attend Josie and DT Pussycat concerts or watch them on TV have to purchase this headgear in order to hear DT music . Back in real life , PRP are seeing DT commercialization of a very similar technology … Josie and DT Pussycats : From Nobodies to Sex Kittens Programming Stars After DT killing of Du Jour , record exec Wyatt is instructed to find a JJ band as soon as possible . DT movie makes PRP clear IN talent is absolutely irrelevant . DT label just needs a good - looking group and PRP will take care of DT rest . Then PRP are introduced to DT Pussycats … and their lack of fans . DT rock band comprises three young ladies who wear leopard ears as a prop . PRP is quite obvious IN nobody wants to hear their music and even their manager Alexander does n’t seem to VB PRP . After hearing about Du Jour ’s plane crash on television , DT Pussycats leader , Josie , is motivated to “ VB out RB ” and obtain a record contract . At DT same NN , Wyatt is driving around in DT small town of Riverdale , looking for a band to sign . Then PRP happens . Wyatt sits down with DT girls and tells them how happy he is “ to be sitting down with DT Pussyhats . ” He obviously knows nothing about DT band and does not care . He then offers them a record contract with Mega Records . Josie wonders briefly why her band is being offered a contract by a label WDT did not even hear them play . However , her hunger for fame dispels all her doubts and DT band signs DT contract . DT Pussycats ’ story is classic : A broke , struggling band attempts to become big by performing gigs ; a record label offers a shady contract ; DT desperate and fame - hungry band signs , not knowing what PRP are getting into . For DT band , PRP ’s either taking a chance and signing DT contract or VBG back to eating Ramen noodles in a crappy apartment . So , PRP sign DT contract . Right after PRP sign , DT label subjects DT group to a complete metamorphosis : a make - over to “ sexy them up , ” and a name NN , from DT Pussycats to Josie and DT Pussycats . DT group is now completely owned by DT label . PRP has lost control of its image , its name , and even its music , as PRP has been modified to contain subliminal messages . But those changes pay off , as PRP become a # 1 band in less than a week . DT movie RB contains numerous references to mind control programming . As stated in previous articles , numerous celebrities have been subjected to mind control in order for them to become more easily manageable by their handlers . In bolder words , PRP become slaves of DT industry . Monarch mind control includes numerous types of programming , CD of them being Beta ( or Sex Kitten programming ) . PRP is DT type of programming WDT is DT most used in DT entertainment industry and PRP is coded with references to “ cats , ” “ kitties , ” “ pussycats , ” and RB with DT wearing of feline print clothing . This might explain why DT producers chose to base DT girl band on DT Archie Comic of DT same name . DT symbolism was just too perfect . So , in less than a week , with DT help of subliminal messaging , DT group produces a # 1 hit and sells out a huge concert . DT group even earns DT honor of meeting DT label ’s CEO , Fiona . DT girls soon realize IN Fiona acts in a strange , dissociative matter as if she were herself under some sort of mind control . After DT meeting , Fiona spies on DT group using hidden cameras and learns IN two members of DT group , Melody , and Valerie , are creeped out by her and flat - out do not trust her . So she decides to VB with another tactic PRP often see in DT music business : to keep DT star of DT group and drop DT other band members . In order to carry out this operation , DT label proceeds to use mind control on Josie by making her listen to subliminal messages in her own music . DT process completely changes her attitude and personality : Josie turns from a sweet and down - to - NN girl into an attention - hungry diva who is convinced IN her friends are worthless . This scene subtly describes DT hidden , mind control aspect WDT happens in DT music business : label execs use mind control programming to create an alter persona in Josie , which PRP can control and manage at will . Fortunately , Josie manages to snap out of her hypnotic NN and learns everything about DT 3D , mass mind control concert . Unfortunately , her bandmates Melody and Valerie have been kidnapped by DT label and Josie must perform in DT mind control concert to avoid DT “ accidental killing ” of her friends . I will spare PRP DT details of DT ending , but I can tell PRP IN PRP involves catfights and DT girls playing generic pop rock in front of a crowd WDT has learned to VB for itself . Thank PRP , Josie ! DT least PRP can say is IN Josie and DT Pussycats is an odd movie . PRP strongly criticizes some aspects of DT entertainment business while perpetuating more of DT same . CD example of this paradoxical situation is DT ridiculous amount of product placements in DT movie . Some of those placements are pretty hilarious ( see DT box of Tide above ) , but in DT end , PRP too perpetuate DT market ideology . Imagine me repeatedly punching someone in DT face . Then when asked to stop , imagine me replying : “ Ca n’t PRP see IN I ’m pushing this face punching to an absurd level ? PRP ’re obviously not getting DT brilliant second - degree message here , I ’m actually denouncing violence ! So sit RB and VB about violence in society while I keep pounding this guy ’s face . ” Despite what is being VBN , DT fact remains IN pounding someone in DT face is itself perpetuating violence … and this movie keeps punching DT viewers in DT face with product placements . In fact , DT entire movie ’s message gives DT same odd feeling . Its clever “ behind - DT - scenes ” look at DT music industry makes DT viewers feel PRP ’re “ in on DT joke , ” making them comfortable enough to let their guard down . However , at DT end of DT day , DT young viewers are still DT butt of DT joke : all of DT sleazy and gimmicky tactics are being used on real - life viewers in order to sell them mind controlling music . Furthermore , DT movie fictionalizes some of DT darker aspects of DT entertainment business , for example by making mind controlled artists something WDT PRP can “ only see in DT movies . ” At DT end of DT film , Mega Records ’ mass hypnosis plans are uncovered , and DT FBI ( who funded DT project ) immediately attempts to dissociate from DT label , even arresting Fiona “ on charges of NN against DT youth of America . ” DT agent then privately says to Fiona : “ PRP were shutting down your entire project anyways … PRP found out IN subliminal messages work much better in movies ! ” This is DT movie ’s way of saying IN even though PRP has let PRP in on DT joke , DT movie is still part of DT plans . In other words , DT biggest joke in DT movie… is PRP .

text: YouTube has announced IN PRP will no longer recommend videos WDT " come close to " violating its community guidelines , such as NN or medically inaccurate videos . On Saturday , a former engineer for Google , YouTube 's parent company , hailed DT move as a " historic victory . Up until DT NN , DT same scenario MD apply to NN videos . When a user was enticed by multiple NN videos , DT AI not only became biased by DT content DT hyper - engaged users were watching , PRP RB kept track of DT content WDT those users were engaging with in an attempt to reproduce DT pattern with other users , Chaslot explained . " DT AI NN will have a huge impact because affected channels have billions of views , overwhelmingly coming from recommendations , " Chaslot VBD , adding IN DT platform 's decision to make this NN affect thousands of JJ users . text: Toward DT end of DT 14th century A.D. , a handful of Italian thinkers declared IN PRP were living in a JJ age . DT barbarous , unenlightened “ Middle Ages ” were over , PRP VBD ; DT JJ age MD be a “ rinascità ” ( “ rebirth ” ) of learning and literature , art and culture . This was DT birth of DT period now known as DT Renaissance . For centuries , scholars have agreed IN DT Italian Renaissance ( another word for “ rebirth ” ) happened just DT way : IN between DT 14th century and DT 17th century , a JJ , modern way of thinking about DT NN and man ’s place in PRP replaced an old , backward NN . In fact , DT Renaissance ( in Italy and in other parts of Europe ) was considerably more complicated than DT : For CD thing , in JJ ways DT period PRP call DT Renaissance was not so different from DT era WDT preceded PRP . However , JJ of DT scientific , artistic and cultural achievements of DT so - called Renaissance do share common themes , most notably DT humanistic belief IN man was DT center of his own universe . Fifteenth - century Italy was unlike any other place in Europe . PRP was divided into independent city - NNS , each with a different form of NN . Florence , where DT Italian Renaissance began , was an independent republic . PRP was RB a banking and commercial capital and , after London and Constantinople , DT third - largest city in Europe . Wealthy Florentines flaunted their money and power by becoming patrons , or supporters , of artists and intellectuals . In this way , DT city became DT cultural center of Europe and of DT Renaissance . DT NNP Humanism : Cornerstone of DT Renaissance Thanks to DT patronage of these wealthy elites , Renaissance - era writers and thinkers were able to spend their days doing just DT . Instead of devoting themselves to ordinary jobs or to DT asceticism of DT monastery , PRP MD enjoy worldly pleasures . PRP traveled around Italy , studying ancient ruins and rediscovering Greek and Roman texts . To Renaissance scholars and philosophers , these classical sources from Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome held great wisdom . Their secularism , their appreciation of physical beauty and especially their emphasis on man ’s achievements and expression formed DT governing intellectual principle of DT Italian Renaissance . This philosophy is known as “ humanism . ” Humanism encouraged NNS to be curious and to question received wisdom ( particularly DT of DT medieval Church ) . PRP RB encouraged NNS to use experimentation and observation to solve earthly problems . As a result , JJ Renaissance intellectuals focused on trying to define and understand DT laws of nature and DT physical NN . For example , Renaissance artist Leonardo Da Vinci created detailed scientific “ studies ” of objects ranging from flying machines to submarines . He RB created pioneering studies of human anatomy . Likewise , DT scientist and mathematician Galileo Galilei investigated CD natural law after another . By dropping different - sized cannonballs from DT top of a building , for instance , he proved IN all objects fall at DT same rate of acceleration . He RB built a powerful telescope and used PRP to show IN DT NNP and other planets revolved around DT sun and not , as religious authorities argued , DT other way around . ( For this , Galileo was arrested for heresy and threatened with torture and death , but he refused to recant : “ I do not believe IN DT same God who has endowed PRP with senses , reason and intellect has intended PRP to forgo their use , ” he VBD . ) However , perhaps DT most important technological development of DT Renaissance happened not in Italy but in Germany , where Johannes Gutenberg invented DT mechanical movable - type printing press in DT middle of DT 15th century . For DT first NN , PRP was possible to make books–and , by extension , knowledge–widely available . Michelangelo ’s “ David . ” Leonardo da Vinci ’s “ DT Last Supper . ” Sandro Boticelli’s “ DT Birth of Venus . ” During DT Italian Renaissance , art was everywhere ( just look up at Michelangelo ’s “ DT Last Judgment ” painted on DT ceiling of DT Sistine Chapel ! ) . Patrons such as Florence ’s Medici family sponsored projects large and small , and successful artists became celebrities in their own right . Renaissance artists and architects applied JJ humanist principles to their work . For example , DT architect Filippo Brunelleschi applied DT elements of classical Roman architecture–shapes , columns and especially proportion –to his own buildings . DT magnificent eight - sided dome he built at DT Santa Maria del Fiore cathedral in Florence was an engineering triumph–it was 144 feet across , weighed 37,000 tons and had no buttresses to hold PRP up–as well as an aesthetic NN . Brunelleschi RB devised a way to draw and paint using linear perspective . DT is , he figured out how to paint from DT perspective of DT person looking at DT painting , so IN space MD appear to recede into DT frame . After DT architect Leon Battista Alberti explained DT principles behind linear perspective in his treatise “ Della Pittura ” ( “ On Painting ” ) , PRP became CD of DT most noteworthy elements of almost all Renaissance painting . Later , JJ painters began to use a technique called chiaroscuro to create an illusion of three - dimensional space on a flat canvas . Fra Angelico , DT painter of frescoes in DT church and friary of San Marco in Florence , was called “ a rare and perfect talent ” by DT Italian painter and architect Vasari in his “ Lives of DT Artists . ” Renaissance painters IN Raphael , Titian and Giotto and Renaissance sculptors IN Donatello and Lorenzo Ghiberti created art WDT MD inspire generations of future artists . DT End of DT Italian Renaissance By DT end of DT 15th century , Italy was being torn apart by CD war after another . DT kings of England , France and Spain , along with DT Pope and DT Holy Roman Emperor , battled for control of DT wealthy peninsula . At DT same NN , DT Catholic Church , which was itself wracked with scandal and corruption , had begun a violent crackdown on dissenters . In 1545 , DT Council of Trent officially established DT Roman Inquisition . In this NN , humanism was akin to heresy . DT Italian Renaissance was over .

More recent , Charlie Duke , who RB was part of DT team WDT arrested Simpson , had a bit part in “ Heat . ” He played a cop who mistakenly allows robbery suspect Val Kilmer to VB free . text: PRP employed DT OsiriX freeware ( Pixmeo SARL , Bernex , Switzerland ) image - viewing platform to generate a standardised method of producing curved reconstructions of DT paediatric brain . MRI scans of 10 NNS with known cortical atrophy caused by hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained during term delivery were selected alongside 8 age - matched controls who had normal MRI findings . DT research was approved by DT University of Bristol Ethics Committee ( case reference 27741 ) and has been performed in accordance with DT ethics standards laid down in DT 1964 Declaration of Helsinki and its later amendments . PRP selected data from T1 - weighted 3 - D turbo spin-echo or 3 - D fluid - attenuated inversion recovery ( FLAIR ) imaging . Using DT 3 - D curved MPR function in OsiriX , multiple curved reformatting techniques were tested , then formalised and standardised . PRP performed reconstructions from all three planes ( coronal , sagittal and axial ) using different landmark slices ( e.g. , foramen of Monro , pineal gland ) , angles of reconstruction ( e.g. , following DT course of DT Sylvian fissure , central sulcus ) and at various depths to DT cortical surface . Two images ( CD reconstructed from DT coronal plane and CD from DT sagittal plane ) were determined to give DT best overview of DT cortical regions most frequently damaged in hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained at term delivery ( i.e. DT watershed zones , and perisylvian and perirolandic regions ) . PRP describe an optimal method for creating these reconstructions . For reconstructions from DT coronal 3 - D T1 - weighted data set , DT slice demonstrating DT foramina of Monro is selected for generating DT flat - NN map . DT pathway for generating DT curved reconstructions is plotted 1 - cm deep to DT surface of DT brain by depositing cursors at 12 landmarks ( 6 on either side of DT midline ) as described in Fig. 1 . DT resultant image has been likened to a Mercator map of DT NN [ 3 , 4 ] . For reconstructions from DT sagittal 3 - D T1 - weighted data , DT landmark midline slice demonstrating DT aqueduct of Sylvius is selected . DT pathway for generating DT curved reconstructions is plotted 1 - cm deep to DT cortical surface by depositing cursors at 8 points starting anteriorly and ending posteriorly as described in Fig. 1 . DT resultant image derived from sagittal images is likened to unrolling a scroll . DT cerebral sulcal anatomy of NNS in DT control group from DT Mercator brain maps was identified using work by Wagner et al . [ 4 ] . No equivalent anatomical work exists for scroll brain maps , and DT sulcal anatomy was identified de novo from an online anatomy atlas [ 5 ] . DT sulcal anatomy and expected regions of abnormality were then plotted on DT Mercator and scroll maps in CD of DT control patients as a reference source ( Fig. 2 ) . Flat - NN maps ( Mercator and scroll projections ) of DT brain were then generated for 10 NNS with previous hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy . These were displayed alongside those of age - matched healthy controls for comparison . Two readers ( S.A. , a paediatric radiologist with 15 NNS ’ experience in neuroimaging , and E.S. , a 5th - NN radiology trainee ) assessed each flat - NN map for DT presence of ( 1 ) widening of DT Sylvian fissure ; ( 2 ) widening of DT longitudinal fissure , noting whether such widening was localised ( indicating regional watershed - zone , or perisylvian or perirolandic volume loss ) or generalised ; ( 3 ) cortical atrophy in characteristic locations ( perirolandic , perisylvian or watershed distribution ) , and ( 4 ) ulegyria . Discrepancies were arbitrated by a third reader ( A.C. , a qualified general radiologist 3 NNS post completion of training ) . No abnormal features were identified on any of DT eight controls ( mean age 3 NNS 11 months ; 5 boys , 3 girls ) . DT abnormal findings WDT were visible in NNS with hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained at term delivery ( mean age 3 NNS 6 months ; 6 boys , 4 girls ) are shown in Table 1 . DT flat - NN map generated by DT curved reconstruction displays DT structures along a region adjacent to DT plotted path at DT expense of structures at DT extremes of DT axis perpendicular to DT path ; two maps are generated from perpendicular curved lines , so different structures are seen optimally on each map . DT following general observations were made : • DT perisylvian and perirolandic regions were better demonstrated on DT Mercator maps . DT scroll maps demonstrated DT lateral structures poorly . • More of DT frontal lobe anatomy was seen consistently on DT Mercator maps . • DT central posterior parietal and occipital lobes were better demonstrated on DT scroll maps . • Watershed zones were well demonstrated on both Mercator and scroll maps . DT following observations were made from review of flat - NN maps in NNS who sustained hypoxic–ischaemic injury at term delivery : • Widening of DT longitudinal fissure was seen on all abnormal NNS on Mercator and scroll maps , consistent with parasagittal / parafalcine watershed atrophy .
